original: tasmād vayaṃ tavājñayā varamāryaviṣayaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ, śītāhimavatordakṣiṇaṃ laṅkādīpāntaram iti

original: teṣāṃ brahma ṛṣīṇāṃ vacanena sūryaratho yaśo narendra vijñāpayati - he mahārājādhirāja, parameśvara, dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣa- lakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāṅgaparipūrṇa, śrīśākyakulatilaka, paramakāruṇika, karuṇāṃ kuruṣva kuśala meṃ pravṛttānām

original: athāsmābhiravaśyaṃ tavājñā kartavyā

original: atha sūryarathavacanāt yaśorājā āha - śīghraṃ sambhalaviṣayānnirgacchantu bhavanto yena śītānadyuttare ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsinaḥ sarve sattvāḥ prāṇātipātādyakuśa- lakarmapathān parityajya kālacakrabhagavato'dhiṣṭhānena samyakjñānamārgalābhino bhaviṣyanti iti

original: tena yaśorājājñayā sarve amī brahma ṛṣayaḥ kalāpagrāmānnirgatāḥ ; daśame dine vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ

original: teṣāṃ vanamadhye praviṣṭānāṃ pañcābhijñābalena yaśorājñā jñātam, yathaiṣāṃ brahma ṛṣīṇāṃ āryaviṣaye gamanena ṣaṇṇavatikoṭigrāmanivāsināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vaiṣamyacittaṃ bhaviṣyati, iha yena kāraṇena vajrayānoktaḥ samyagjñānamārgo na bhavati, tena kāraṇena amī ṛṣayaḥ śroyaśorājño bhayena svasthānaṃ parityajya svakuṭumbādi gṛhītvā āryaviṣayaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: teṣām vana madhye praviṣṭānām pañca abhijñā balena yaśaḥ rājñā jñātam yathā eṣām brahma ṛṣīṇām ārya viṣaye gamanena ṣaṇṇavati koṭi grāma nivāsinām sarva sattvānām vaiṣamya cittam

original: sarva mokṣārthina iti kṣatriyādayo janāścintayanto durbhagā bhaviṣyanti, gambhīroṃ- dāradharmābhājane ' abhavyacittāt
analyzed: mokṣa arthinaḥ iti kṣatriya ādayaḥ janāḥ cintayantaḥ durbhagāḥ bhaviṣyanti dāra dharma abhājane abhavya cittāt

original: evaṃ ' 'sarvajanānāṃ svacittābhiprāyaṃ jñātvā yaśonarendraḥ sarvaviṣṇubrahmarudrakulamohanaṃ nāma samādhi samāpannaḥ
analyzed: evam sarva janānām sva citta abhiprāyam jñātvā yaśaḥ narendraḥ sarva viṣṇu brahma rudra kula mohanam nāma samādhi samāpannaḥ

original: tena samādhinā devatādhiṣṭhānabalena sarve te ṛṣayastasminneva vane mohitāḥ santastasmin vananivāsibhi sa ( rā ) barādibhiḥ sarva ṛṣayo bandhayitvā punareva mahāmaṇḍala gṛhamānītāḥ, yaśonarendrasya pādamūle prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ prabuddhā yaśonarendraṃ paśyanti
analyzed: tena samādhinā devatā adhiṣṭhāna balena sarve te ṛṣayaḥ tasmin eva vane mohitāḥ santaḥ tasmin vana nivāsibhiḥ sa bara ādibhiḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ bandhayitvā punar eva mahā maṇḍala gṛham ānītāḥ

original: tadeva maṇḍalagṛhaṃ malayodyāne taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannā idaṃ vacanamāhuḥ - aho mahāṃścaryamidam, vayaṃ mahāvanādaprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kenānītā mahāmaṇḍala- gṛhe ? ityevametadvacanaṃ śrutvā brahma ṛṣīṇāṃ yaśorājño mantriṇā nirmitakāyena sāgarama- tinoktam - he sūryarathādayo brahma - ṛṣayo mā vismayaṃ kuruta
analyzed: tat eva maṇḍala gṛham malaya udyāne tam dṛṣṭvā vismayam āpannāḥ idam vacanam āhuḥ aho mahā īścaryam idam vayam mahā vanāt aprabuddhāḥ santaḥ kena ānītāḥ mahā maṇḍala gṛhe iti

original: ayaṃ yaśorājā dvīpāntara paṭale ] sunasā deśakādhyeṣakamūlatantralaghutantrasambandhoddeśaḥ prādeśiko na bhavati
analyzed: ayam yaśaḥ rājā dvīpa antara paṭale sunasā deśaka adhyeṣaka mūlatantra laghutantra sambandha uddeśaḥ prādeśikaḥ na bhavati

original: ko'pi mahābodhisattvo yuṣmākamanugrahārthī buddhādhiṣṭhānenābhūt, tasmādasya pādayoḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā āddhibuddhatantrarāje laukikalokottarasiddhisādhanamārgābhi- ṣekādhyeṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti

original: atha tena sāgaramativacanena buddhādhiṣṭhānena sūryarathādayo brahma- ṛṣayaḥ prabuddhā idaṃ vacanamāhuḥ - sādhu sādhu sāgaramate, yena te vacanenāsmākaṃ cittaprabo- dho'bhūt, tasmādidānīṃ ratnatrayaśaraṇaṃ gatvā kālacakratantrarāje laukikalokottarasiddhi - sādhanamārgābhiṣekādhyeṣaṇāṃ kuryyāḥ', sakalasattvānāṃ samyaksambuddhatvalābhāye haiva janmani” iti
analyzed: atha tena sāgara mati vacanena buddha adhiṣṭhānena sūryaratha ādayaḥ brahma ṛṣayaḥ prabuddhāḥ idam vacanam āhuḥ sādhu sādhu sāgara mate yena te vacanena asmākam citta prabodhaḥ bhūt tasmāt

original: evamuktvā taiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ brahmakule sūryaratho rājā'mantritaḥ - he sūryaratha, tvaṃ vedādiśāstrakapustaka sarvalaukika lokottaraśāstraprameyagrāhakahṛdayaḥ, tenāsmākamadhyeṣaṇāvaca- nena yaśorājño'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kuru
analyzed: evam uktvā taiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ brahma kule sūryarathaḥ rājā mantritaḥ he sūryaratha tvam veda ādi śāstraka pustaka sarva laukika lokottara śāstra prameya grāhaka hṛdayaḥ tena asmākam adhyeṣaṇā vaca

original: vayamapi maṇḍalapūrvaṅgamaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā sarve'dhyeṣaṇāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ
analyzed: vayam api maṇḍala pūrvaṅgamam śaraṇam gatvā sarve dhyeṣaṇām kariṣyāmaḥ

original: atha tena brahma ṛṣivacanena sūryaratho ratnasuvarṇamayaiḥ puṣpaimaṃṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā yaśonare- ndrasya pādamūle ratnapuṣpāñjaliṃ prakṣipya jānuyugmena bhūgatena hastayugmena śirasi gatena brahma- ṛṣibhiḥ sārddhaṃ yaśaḥ pādau praṇamya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ saṃsthāpya lalāṭe karapuṭaṃ datvā yaśonarendramadhyeṣayati- deśayatu bhagavāṃstantrarājamādibuddham, yasmin buddhatvāya pañcānantaryakāriṇo'pi vyākṛtā ihaiva janmani vajradharabhagavatā paramākṣarasukhena saṃgṛhītā mahāmudrālābhino vyākṛtāḥ
analyzed: atha tena brahma ṛṣi vacanena sūryarathaḥ ratna suvarṇa mayaiḥ puṣpaiḥ maṇḍalam kṛtvā yaśaḥ nare indrasya pāda mūle ratna puṣpa añjalim prakṣipya jānu yugmena bhū gatena hasta yugmena

original: iyaṃ ṣaḍdvādaśasāhasrikāṃ ādibuddhaṃ sucandrarājñastathāgatena idaṃ yada deśitam
analyzed: iyam ṣaṣ dvādaśa sāhasrikām ādibuddham sucandra rājñaḥ tathāgatena idam deśitam

original: tadevālpagranthenādibuddhamalpatantrarājaṃ saṅgīti kṛtvā deśayatu brahma ṛṣīṇāṃ śāsye (ste) iti

original: atha sūryarathādhyeṣaṇaṃ śrutvā brahma ṛṣīṇāmadhimukticittavaśāt tathāgatādhiṣṭhānabalena laghusaṅgītikāra katvena sragdharāvṛtteḥ sarvajñadeśakādisaṃgrāha- kaistantrarājaṃ deśayati

original: teṣāṃ ca suśabdavādināṃ suśabdagrahavināśāya arthaśaraṇatāmāśritya kacidavṛtte'pa- śabdaḥ; kacid vṛtte yatibhaṅgaḥ kacidavibhaktikaṃ padam

original: kacidvarṇasvaralopaḥ kacid vṛtte dīrgho hrasvaḥ, hrasvo'pi dīrghaḥ kacit pañcamyarthe saptamī, caturthyarthe ṣaṣṭhī; kutracit parasmai- padini dhātāvātmanepadam, ātmanepadini parasmaipadam; kacidekavacane bahuvacanam, bahuvacane ekavacanam, pulliṅge napuṃsakam, napuṃsake pulliṅgam; kacit tālavyaśakāre dantyamūrddhanyau; kacit mūrddhānye dantyatālavyau; kacid dantye tālavyamūrddhanyau

original: ( nā sa evaṃ skandhadhātubhedena ṣaṭkulātmako'bhidheyaḥ; śatakulātmako'pi vaktrabhedena vatokta iti viśuddhadharmadhātvantimaślokapādena sārddhaṃ ādarśajñānastave prathamaślokena; tadyathā- vajrabhairavabhīkaraḥ | krodharāṭ ṣaṇamukho bhīmaḥ ṣaṇṇetraḥ ṣaḍbhujo balī | daṃṣṭrākarālakaṅkālo halāhalaśatānanaḥ || iti | ato bhagavato vacanāt tantratantrāntareṣvabhidheyastrimukhaścaturmukhaḥ pañcamukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ śatamukho'vagantavya iti | iha samājādike ekāreṇa yat sthānaṃ bhagavatoktaṃ tadeva sthānaṃ rahasyetyādiśabdena lakṣābhidhānādike bhagavatoktam | yo vaṃkāreṇābhidheya uktaḥ sa eva mahāsukhaśabdena vajra- sattva ukta iti | evamuktakrameṇa catuḥkulātmake paramādibuddhe ṣaṭkulātmake catuḥkulātma- ko'bhidheyaḥ ṣaṭkulātmakaśceti | sarvajñetyādibhiḥ trayoviṃśatyakṣarairbhagavatoddiṣṭaḥ śūnyatā- karuṇābhinno' bodhicittavajjo mahāsukha iti | iha siṃhāsanaśabdenākāśadhātuḥ sarvā - kāraḥ , tasmin siṃhāsane sthitaḥ siṃhāsanasthaḥ buddha iti vajrasattvaḥ | yoga iti mahārthaḥ paramākṣara iti | asau yogo nāmasaṅgītyāṃ vajradhātumaṇḍalastave caturdaśa- ślokaiḥ saṅgīta:- tadyathā bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddho'kārasambhavaḥ | akāraḥ sarvavarṇāgrayo mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ || mahāprāṇo hyanutpādo vāgudāhāravarjitaḥ | sarvābhilāpahetvagrayaḥ sarvavāksuprabhāsvaraḥ || mahāvidyottamo nātho mahāmantrottamo guruḥ | mahāyānanayā rūḍho mahāyānanayottamaḥ” || iti paryantaṃ sarvatantrāntareṣu asāvabhidheyo saṅgītaḥ, madhyottamasattvāśayavaśeneti | tathā śūnyaṃ jñānaṃ cetyādibhiścaturdaśākṣaraiḥ ṣaṭkulātmako'bhidheyaḥ | sa eva saṅgīto nāma- saṅgītyāmapi kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānastave dvitīyaślokenoktaḥ; tadyathā- sarvamantrārthajanako - mahābinduranakṣaraḥ | pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyo binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ || iti | vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ lokadhātu-
analyzed: saḥ evam skandha dhātu bhedena ṣaṣ kula ātmakaḥ bhidheyaḥ śata kula ātmakaḥ u pi vaktra bhedena vatā uktaḥ iti viśuddha dharmadhātu antima śloka pādena sārddham ādarśa jñāna stave prathama lakṣa abhidhāna ādike bhagavatā uktam yaḥ vaṃkāreṇa abhidheyaḥ uktaḥ saḥ eva mahāsukha śabdena vajra sattvaḥ uktaḥ iti evam ukta krameṇa catur kula ātmake parama ādi buddhe ṣaṣ kula caturdaśa ślokaiḥ saṅgīta tat yathā bhagavān buddhaḥ sambuddhaḥ kāra sambhavaḥ akāraḥ sarva varṇa agrayaḥ mahārthaḥ paramākṣaraḥ mahāprāṇaḥ hi anutpādaḥ vāc udāhāra varjitaḥ sarva dvitīya ślokena uktaḥ tat yathā sarva mantra artha janakaḥ mahābinduḥ anakṣaraḥ pañca akṣaraḥ mahāśūnyaḥ binduśūnyaḥ ṣaṣ akṣaraḥ iti vimalaprabhāyām lokadhātu

original: ato'nantasaṃjñābhiḥ dharmadeśakatvād evaṃ mayā śrutam ityādinā deśitaṃ tantrarājaṃ tathāgatadeśitaṃ bhavati, rahasyetyādinā ' sarvajñādinā ca deśitaṃ tathāgatadeśitaṃ na bhavatīti bauddharna vaktavyam, svasiddhānte parasiddhānte doṣagrahaṇāt ṣaṣṭhī mūlāpattirbhavati | tasmāt tantrāntare pūrvāparasambandhaṃ jñātvā guṇadoṣāvagantavyāḥ (vyau ) | anyathā'dṛṣṭadoṣagrahaṇād- vīcigamanaṃ bhavati duṣṭānāryāṇāṃ tathāgatahṛdayabāhyabhūtānāṃ viṣayendriyopabhogāsaktānāṃ mithyāpralāpināmiti | evamuktakrameṇa paramāgamayuktyā pūrvāparāviruddhaṃ sarvajñetyādinā paramādibuddhaṃ tantrarājaṃ bhagavatā sandeśitamiti | nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva buddho bhagavān, dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyāṃ ekabhāvapratipādakatvā- diti bhāvaḥ ; idaṃ kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavato buddhamitīha kasycidabhiprāyo bhavi - ṣyati | tasmāducyate - iha satya [ metad vacanaṃ yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa buddho bhagavān iti | ki tarhi, anye'pi hariharādayaḥ sarvajñatvena balajanaiḥ parikalpitāḥ | teṣāṃ sarva- jñatānirākaraṇāya sarvajño buddho bhagavān iti vacanam | iha nānyaḥ sarvajñastre dhātuke hariharāṇāṃ madhye yaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvarutakairdeśaka iti | iha kasmāt teṣāṃ madhye sarvajñaḥ sarvasattvarutakaiḥ sarvadharmadeśako na bhavatītyucyate | iha ṣaḍgatisaṃsāre devajātī hariharādīnāṃ sambhūtatvāt; buddhabhagavataḥ saṃsārapārakoṭivyavasthitvāditi | iha nāma- saṅgītyāṃ tathāgatenoktaṃ suviśuddhadharmadhātustave trayodaśamena ślokena ; tadyathā- saṃsārapārakoṭisthaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sthale sthitaḥ | kaivalyajñānaniṣṭhataḥ prajñāśastravidāraṇaḥ || iti | ataḥ sarvajño buddho bhagavān buddhamiti punarvacanaṃ na bhavatīti | nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva jñānakāya:, kimarthaṃ jñānakāya iti punarvacanaṃ bhagavataḥ ? tadevocyate | iha yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa eva jñānakāya iti tat satyam | kiṃ tarhi, anye'pi buddhāḥ śrāvakapratyekāḥ santi teṣāṃ samyaksambuddhatvanirākaraṇāya sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān jñānakāya iti punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavataḥ | iha śrāvaka pratyekabu- dudhānāṃ madhye na kaścid jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho'bhūditi | iha kasmānna śrāvakapratyeka- buddhānāṃ madhye kaścit samyaksambuddho'bhūdityucyate | iha śrāvakabuddhānāṃ sopadhini- rvāṇe sthitatvāditi, samyaksambuddhasya sarvopadhivinirmuktatvāt | tathā ca nāmasaṅgītyāṃ bhagavatoktaṃ pratyavekṣaṇājñānastave ekādaśamaślokena; tadyathā- - sarvopādhivinirmukto vyomavartmani susthitaḥ | mahācintāmaṇidharaḥ sarvaratnottamo vibhuḥ || iti | paṭale ] deśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśaḥ ataḥ sarvajño jñānakāyaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān jñānakāya iti punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavata iti | - nanu yo jñānakāya: [ sa eva dinakaravapurajñānāndhakāradhvaṃsakatvāt, kimarthaṃ punaruktavacanaṃ dinakaravapuriti bhagavata iti kasyacid vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati ; tasmāducyate- iha satyamidaṃ vacanaṃ yo jñānakāyaḥ sa eva dinakaravapuḥ, ajñānāndhakāradhvaṃsakatvāditi | kiṃ tarhi, anye'pi vijñānavādino bauddhāḥ santi, teṣāṃ vijñānadharmatānirākaraṇāya jñāna- kāyo dinakaravapuḥ vijñānadharmatātītaḥ samyaksambuddha iti punaruktavacanaṃ dinakaravapu- riti | iha vijñānavādināṃ madhye kaścinna jñānakāyo dinakaravapuḥ samyaksambuddho'bhūt iha kasmād vijñānavādināṃ madhye kaścinna ca jñāna kāyo dinakaravapuḥ samyaksambuddho'bhū- dityucyate ? iha vijñānavādināṃ vijñānadharme sthitatvāt' samyaksambuddhasya vijñāna - dharmatātītatvāditi | tathā ca nāmasaṅgītyāṃ tathāgatenoktaṃ pratyavekṣaṇājñānastave trayovi- titamena ślokena tadyathā - vijñānadharmatātīto jñānamadvayarūpadhṛk | nirvikalpo nirābhogastryadhvasambuddhakāyadhṛk || iti | ato jñānakāyo dinakaravapuḥ samyaksambuddha iti punaruktavacanaṃ bhagavataḥ | nanu yaḥ tantre'bhidheyaḥ sa jñāna kāyo arūpī, yaśca padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ sa rūpī; kimarthaṃ padmapatrāyatākṣamiti bhagavato vacanamiha kasyacidabhiprāyo bhaviṣyati, tasmāducyate - iha hi yad vaktavyaṃ bālajanaiḥ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ tantre'bhidheyo rūpī, tanna, iha padmaśabdena nītā- rthenākāśadhāturucyate, tasmin padme khadhātau padmapatrāṇīva śatakuladīrghasvabhāvatvenāva - sthitāḥ sattvā iti padmapatrāṇi teṣāmantaṃ yāvat; śatākṣīṇi yasya bhagavata āyatāni sa padmapatrāyatākṣa iti | iha nāmasaṅgītyāmuktaṃ bhagavatā ādarśajñānastave ṣaṣṭha ślokena; tadyathā--- vajrajvālākarālākṣo vajrajvālāśiroruhaḥ | vajrāveśo mahāveśaḥ śatākṣo vajralocanaḥ || iti | ato bhagavato vacanāt padmapatrā yatākṣaḥ samyaksambuddho bhagavān rūpa- rahita iti | taṃ buddhaṃ siṃhāsanastham, siṃhāsanaṃ khadhātuḥ; aparaṃ candrasūryāgnimaṇḍalaṃ siṃhāsanam, tasmin sthitaḥ siṃhāsanastha iti | iha mūlatantre bhagavānāha -
analyzed: atas nanta saṃjñābhiḥ dharma deśaka tvāt evam mayā śrutam ityādinā deśitam tantrarājam tathāgata deśitam bhavati rahasya ityādinā sarvajña ādinā ca deśitam tathāgata deśitam na bhavati iti bauddhaḥ pūrva apara aviruddham sarvajña ityādinā parama ādi buddham tantrarājam bhagavatā sandeśitam iti nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ saḥ eva buddhaḥ bhagavān dvābhyām saṃjñābhyām eka bhāva pratipādaka tvāt iti hari harāṇām madhye yaḥ sarva dharmāṇām sarva sattva rutakaiḥ deśakaḥ iti iha kasmāt teṣām madhye sarvajñaḥ sarva sattva rutakaiḥ sarva dharma deśakaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate iha ṣaṣ gati saṃsāre bhavati iti nanu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ saḥ eva jñāna kāya kimartham jñāna kāyaḥ iti punarvacanam bhagavataḥ tat eva ucyate iha yaḥ sarvajñaḥ saḥ eva jñāna kāyaḥ iti tat satyam kim tarhi anye śrāvaka buddhānām sa upadhini rvāṇe sthita tvāt iti samyaksambuddhasya sarva upadhi vinirmukta tvāt tathā ca nāmasaṅgītyām bhagavatā uktam pratyavekṣaṇa ajñāna stave ekādaśama ślokena tat yathā bhagavataḥ iti kasyacid vacanam bhaviṣyati tasmāt ucyate iha satyam idam vacanam yaḥ jñāna kāyaḥ saḥ eva dinakara vapuḥ ajñāna andhakāra dhvaṃsaka tvāt iti kim tarhi anye vijñāna vādinaḥ vijñāna vādinām vijñāna dharme sthita tvāt samyaksambuddhasya vijñāna dharmatā atīta tvāt iti tathā ca nāmasaṅgītyām tathāgatena uktam pratyavekṣaṇa ajñāna stave titamena ślokena tat yathā bhaviṣyati tasmāt ucyate iha hi yat vaktavyam bāla janaiḥ padma patra āyata akṣaḥ tantre bhidheyaḥ rūpī tat naḥ iha padma śabdena nītā rthena ākāśa dhātuḥ ucyate tasmin padme khadhātau padma padma patrā yata akṣaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ bhagavān rūpa rahitaḥ iti tam buddham siṃhāsana stham siṃhāsanam khadhātuḥ aparam candra sūrya agni maṇḍalam siṃhāsanam tasmin sthitaḥ siṃhāsana

original: iha martye loke yadi sarve manuṣyā vedagītā- siddhāntatarkaśāstravido bhavanti śūdrādayaḥ, tadā brāhmaṇānāṃ ko gauravaṃ kariṣyati; vidyādharmajñānasādhāraṇaparijñānāt, sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsināṃ saṃsārabhogāsaktānāṃ viśeṣaguṇābhā- vāt |

original: iha pūrvakāle vedagītāsiddhāntapurāṇa- dharmā na pustake likhitāḥ santi yatīnāṃ mukhe tiṣṭhanti tataḥ pañcakaṣāyakālavaśāt ; mma paṭale ] deśakādhyeṣakasādhanoddeśaḥ pustake likhitāḥ |, prajñāhīnatvād yatibhiriti |

original: iha dhātuke ye sarvajñena sarvajñabhāṣayā deśitā dharmā nānāsattvabhāṣāntareṇa saṅgī- tikārakaiḥ pustake likhitāḥ, vedādilaukikārtha' pratipādakāḥ, yānatrayārthapratipādakāḥ, lokasaṃvṛtisatyena paramārthasatyena deśitāḥ, sarvasattvānāṃ śravaṇāyādhyayanāya ca tadadhimu- ktikāḥ sattvāstān sarvajñadeśitān caturaśītisahasradharmaskandhān laukikalokottarārthaprati- pādakān śṛṇvanti paṭhanti vācayanti dhārayanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayanti prati- ṣṭhāpayanti, pūjayanti nānāpuṣpairnānāgandhairnānādhūpairnānācūrṇairnānāvastrairnānāghaṇṭābhirnānā- patākābhirnānācāmarairnānāchatrairnānāvitānairnānāmuktāhārairnānāratnairnānāpradīpairnānāratnā raṇaiḥ pūjayitvā tebhyaḥ pañcāṅgapraṇāmaṃ kurvanti |

original: paramārthasatyena punaḥ sūtrapātarahitaṃ rajaḥpātarahitaṃ varṇabhujasaṃsthāna- rūpadevatāvikalpabhāvanācittarahitaṃ sarvākāramākāśadhātāvādarśapratisenopamamiti |

original: tataḥ sarvalaghu- tantre mūlatantreṣu caturthaṃ prajñājñānaṃ mahāmudrābhāvanā dhūmādimārgaḥ suguptaḥ, kacinmūlatantreṣu prakaṭa iti |

analyzed: nāgatam iti vimalaprabhāyām lokadhātu idam viśuddha kramam mahāmudrā siddhi dāyakam parama ādi buddhe prakaṭam pustake likhitam śītānadī uttare bhavya sattvānām citta adhimukti jñātvā bhagavatā

original: ato ye paramādibuddhaṃ na jānanti te nāmasaṅgīti na jānanti ye nāmasaṅgīti na jānanti te vajradharajñānakāyaṃ na jānanti ye vajradharajñānakāyaṃ na jānanti te mantrayānaṃ na jānanti, ye mantrayānaṃ na jānanti te saṃsāriṇaḥ sarve vajrarabhagavato mārga rahitāḥ |
analyzed: atas ye paramādibuddham na jānanti te nāma saṅgī iti na jānanti ye nāma saṅgī iti na jānanti te vajradhara jñānakāyam na jānanti ye vajradhara jñānakāyam na jānanti te mantra yānam na

original: iti mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ maṇḍalābhiṣekādisaṃgrahoddeśaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ || 6 ||

original: (7) lokadhātusaṃgrahoddeśaḥ (ka) prativacanasaṃgrahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ bhagavataḥ prativacanaṃ paramādibuddhāt mañjuśriyā saṅgītikāreṇa tṛtīya- vṛttena saṅgītam, tadeva vitanomi tuṣṭo'hamityādinā - tuṣṭo'haṃ te sucandra pravarasuranare rākṣasairdaityanāge- naṃ jñātaṃ vītarāgaiḥ paramamunikulaiyaṃt tvayā pṛṣṭametat |
analyzed: lokadhātu saṃgraha uddeśaḥ ka prativacana saṃgraha uddeśaḥ idānīm bhagavataḥ prativacanam parama ādi buddhāt mañjuśriyā saṅgītikāreṇa tṛtīya vṛttena saṅgītam tat eva vitanomi tuṣṭaḥ ham

original: nirvāṇādyaṃ dharāntaṃ padagatisahitaṃ dehamadhye samastaṃ yogaṃ vyākhyāyamānaṃ ṛṇu sunarapate maṇḍalaṃ cābhiṣekam || 3 ||

analyzed: akāraḥ sarva varṇa agrayaḥ mahārthaḥ parama akṣaraḥ mahāprāṇaḥ sarva abhilāpa hetu agrayaḥ vāc udāhāra varjitaḥ

original: atra mantranaye yānatritayanirjāta ekayānaphale sthito mantrī bhagavatoktaḥ |

analyzed: meroḥ pṛṣṭheṣu dikṣu bhramati durjayaḥ dānavānām mlecchānām yasmin bhūkhaṇḍe vinaṣṭaḥ teṣām viparyāsa dharmaḥ vartate tasmin bhūmi tale bhramati cakrī kali yuge saḥ eva adharmam pravṛttiḥ

original: adharayugahatamiti

original: tadeva māsapiṇḍamadha upari rāśau adho rāśau māsapiṇḍaṃ kṛtvā adhikamāsagrahaṇārthaṃ yugahataṃ caturguṇitaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tat eva māsa piṇḍam adhas upari rāśau adhas rāśau māsa piṇḍam kṛtvā adhika māsa grahaṇa artham yuga hatam catur guṇitam bhavati

original: khāgnicandravibhaktamiti
analyzed: kha agni candra vibhaktam iti

original: atra sūryasya dvātriṃśatsāddha māsairadhikamāso'māvasyāṃ saṃkramaṇābhāvāt
analyzed: atra sūryasya māsaiḥ adhika māsaḥ māvasyām saṃkramaṇa abhāvāt

original: tena bhogo na syāt, tasmāt rāśi caturguṇitā bhāgarāśirbhavati
analyzed: tena bhogaḥ na syāt tasmāt bhāga rāśiḥ bhavati

original: bhāgarāśeścaturguṇite sati 'nimittābhāve naimittakasyābhāva' iti nyāyāt vibhajya rāśiścaturguṇī bhavati
analyzed: bhāga rāśeḥ catur guṇite sati nimitta abhāve naimittakasya abhāvaḥ iti nyāyāt vibhajya rāśiḥ caturguṇī bhavati

original: tasmād jyotirjñānavidhimahoddeśaḥ vibhajya rāśerbhāgarāśinā labdhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tasmāt jyotiḥ jñāna vidhi mahā uddeśaḥ vibhajya rāśeḥ bhāga rāśinā labdham phalam bhavati

original: labdhaṃ mūni praviṣṭam
analyzed: labdham mūni praviṣṭam

original: tadeva labdhamadhika- māsapiṇḍaṃ mūrdhni māsapiṇḍarāśau praviṣṭaṃ bhavati narapate māsapiṇḍaṃ viśuddhaṃ varttamānamāse triśattithigaṇitārthamiti
analyzed: tat eva labdham adhika māsa piṇḍam mūrdhni māsa piṇḍa rāśau praviṣṭam bhavati narapate māsa piṇḍam viśuddham vartamāna māse triśat tithi gaṇita artham iti

original: idānīṃ māsadhruvakamucyate- māsāstristhānabhūtā kara śikhiguṇitā madhyarāśau sthitā ye mūle ṣaḍbhāgalabdhaṃ bhavati ca tadṛṇaṃ madhyame śodhanīyam
analyzed: idānīm māsadhruvakam ucyate māsāḥ tri sthāna bhūtā kara śikhi guṇitāḥ madhya rāśau sthitāḥ ye mūle ṣaṣ bhāga labdham bhavati ca tat ṛṇam madhyame śodhanīyam

original: ūrdhvo'dho netratraṃśat prakaṭayati dhanaṃ miśritaṃ ṣaṣṭibhāgai- rlabdhaṃ mūrdhni praviṣṭaṃ bhavati munivaraiścheditaḥ śeṣavāraḥ ||28||
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ prakaṭayati dhanam miśritam ṣaṣṭi bhāgaiḥ labdham mūrdhni praviṣṭam bhavati muni varaiḥ cheditaḥ śeṣa vāraḥ

original: māsāstristhānabhūtāḥ kara śikhiguṇitā madhyarāśau sthitā ya iti
analyzed: māsāḥ tri sthāna bhūtāḥ kara śikhi guṇitāḥ madhya rāśau sthitāḥ ye iti

original: atra śuddha-
analyzed: atra śuddha

original: māsāstristhāne kṛtvā madhyarāśau ye māsāḥ sthitāḥ te pratimāsavāraghaṭikārthaṃ karaśikhi - guṇitā dvātriṃśadguṇitā bhavanti
analyzed: māsāḥ tri sthāne kṛtvā madhyarāśau ye māsāḥ sthitāḥ te pratimāsa vāra ghaṭikā artham karaśikhi guṇitāḥ dvātriṃśat guṇitāḥ bhavanti

original: mūle ṣaḍbhāgalabdhamiti
analyzed: mūle ṣaṣ bhāga labdham iti

original: mūlarāśau ṣaḍbhāgena labdhaṃ madhyame rāśau ṛṇaṃ bhavati madhyarā śau, ataḥ śodhanīyam, ṛṇatvāt
analyzed: mūla rāśau ṣaṣ bhāgena labdham madhyame rāśau ṛṇam bhavati atas śodhanīyam ṛṇa tvāt

original: ūrdhvo'dho ' netratriṃśat prakaṭayati dhanaṃ miśritam
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ netra triṃśat prakaṭayati dhanam miśritam

original: idaṃ dhruvakaṃ maṅgalādikam astamanakaraṇamāgatam, ata ādityādyudayakaraṇārthaṃ mūrdhni rāśau vāradvayaṃ dhanaṃ bhavati; adho rāśau triṃśatghaṭikā dhanaṃ bhavati
analyzed: idam dhruvakam maṅgala ādikam astamana karaṇam āgatam atas āditya ādi udaya karaṇa artham mūrdhni rāśau vāra dvayam dhanam bhavati adhas rāśau triṃśat ghaṭikāḥ dhanam bhavati

original: ato miśramūrddhādho yathāsaṃkhyaṃ netrañca triśañca netratriśaditi, ṣaṣṭibhāga- rlabdham, mūlaghaṭikārāśau ṣaṣṭibhāgena labdhaṃ vārapiṇḍaṃ bhavati
analyzed: atas miśra mūrddha adhas yathāsaṃkhyam netram ca triśat ca netra triśat iti ṣaṣṭi bhāgaḥ labdham mūla ghaṭikā rāśau ṣaṣṭi bhāgena labdham vāra piṇḍam bhavati

original: avaśeṣaṃ ghaṭikāpiṇḍaṃ vārabhoge' bhavati, mūdhni praviṣṭam
analyzed: avaśeṣam ghaṭikā piṇḍam vāra bhoge bhavati mūdhni praviṣṭam

analyzed: tat eva ṣaṣṭyā bhāgena labdham vāra piṇḍam mūrdhni praviṣṭam vārarāśau bhavati

original: munivaraiḥ saptabhiḥ chedito vibhaktaḥ san śeṣo vāra eva sa iti māsavake vāro mūrdhni sthātavyaḥ, vārādho ghaṭikāpiṇḍamiti
analyzed: muni varaiḥ saptabhiḥ cheditaḥ vibhaktaḥ san śeṣaḥ vāraḥ eva saḥ iti māsavake vāraḥ mūrdhni sthātavyaḥ vāra adhas ghaṭikā piṇḍam iti

original: dvisthāne'rkendumiśraṃ hṛtamṛturaviṇā bhūtamiśraṃ samastaṃ deyaṃ tanmūni rāśau prathamakarahate piṇḍamaṣṭadvibhaktam
analyzed: dvi sthāne rka indu miśram hṛtam ṛtu raviṇā bhūta miśram samastam deyam tat mūni rāśau prathama kara hate piṇḍam aṣṭa dvi bhaktam

original: tristhāmadhye hateśāstvadharanavaguṇairbhāgalabdhaṃ dvimiśram ūnaṃ madhye ghaṭobhirhṛtamapi tu dhanaṃ mūrdhni rāśau dvihatvā || 29 ||
analyzed: tristhā madhye hata īśāḥ tu adhara nava guṇaiḥ bhāga labdham dvi miśram ūnam madhye ghaṭobhiḥ hṛtam api tu dhanam mūrdhni rāśau dvi hatvā

original: idānīṃ vārapadānyucyante- dvisthāne'rkendumiśramiti
analyzed: idānīm vāra padāni ucyante dvi sthāne rka indu miśram iti

original: tadeva māsapiṇḍamarkendumiśraṃ dvādaśottaraśatamiśram
analyzed: tat eva māsa piṇḍam arka indu miśram dvādaśa uttaraśata miśram

original: arkenduriti karaṇāpekṣā na siddhāntāpekṣayeti dvisthāne bhavati
analyzed: arka induḥ iti karaṇa apekṣā na siddhānta apekṣayā iti dvi sthāne bhavati

original: hṛtamṛturaviṇā
analyzed: hṛtam ṛtu raviṇā

original: adhomāsapiṇḍaṃ hṛtaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikaśatena labdhaṃ mūni rāśau dhanaṃ bhavati
analyzed: adhas māsa piṇḍam hṛtam ṣaḍviṃśati adhika śatena labdham rāśau dhanam bhavati

original: pratimāsaṃ piṇḍa- dvayārthaṃ mūni rāśau deyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: pratimāsam rāśau deyam bhavati

analyzed: prathama kara hate paścāt deyam bhavati

original: yataḥ ṣaḍviṃśatya- dhikamāsaśatena ekapiṇḍaṃ piṇḍasthāne'dhikaṃ bhavati, candracaraṇavaśāditi
analyzed: yatas ṣaḍviṃśatyā adhika māsa śatena eka piṇḍam piṇḍa sthāne dhikam bhavati candra caraṇa vaśāt iti

original: piṇḍamaṣṭadvibha- 1. bho. sTen Hog (ūrdhvo'dho ); ka. ūrddhāradho | 2. ṅa. vārabhāge | ktamiti
analyzed: piṇḍam aṣṭa dvibha bho sten ūrdhvaḥ kaḥ vārabhāge ktam iti

original: aṣṭaviṃśatibhirbhaktaṃ piṇḍaṃ bhavati; saptavārapadatvādaṣṭaviṃśatibhirbhāgaḥ syā- [52b]t, tena bhāgena labdhaṃ pratimāsaṃ vārapadaṃ bhavati
analyzed: aṣṭaviṃśatibhiḥ bhaktam piṇḍam bhavati sapta vārapada tvāt aṣṭaviṃśatibhiḥ bhāgaḥ t tena bhāgena labdham pratimāsam vārapadam bhavati

original: vāraghaṭikādhaḥ ṛturaviṇā bhāga- labdhāvaśeṣaṃ (:) piṇḍāvayavaṃ (:) bhavati, piṇḍādhaḥ sthāpanīyami (i) ti
analyzed: vāra ghaṭikā adhas ṛtu raviṇā bhāga labdha avaśeṣam piṇḍa avayavam bhavati piṇḍa adhas ti

original: idānīṃ sūryanakṣatra vakamucyate- tristhāmadhye hateśā iti
analyzed: idānīm sūrya nakṣatra vakam ucyate tristhā madhye hata īśāḥ iti

original: madhye ye māsāste īśairhatā ekādaśahatā iti karaṇāpekṣā na siddhāntāpekṣe ti
analyzed: madhye ye māsāḥ te īśaiḥ hatāḥ ekādaśa hatāḥ iti karaṇa apekṣā na siddhānta apekṣā ti

original: adharanavaguṇairbhāgalabdhaṃ dvimiśramiti
analyzed: adhara navaguṇaiḥ bhāga labdham dvi miśram iti

analyzed: adhas rāśau navaguṇaiḥ rekaḥ nacatvāriṃśadbhiḥ bhāga labdham dvi miśram iti karaṇa apekṣayā kṣepakaḥ

original: ūnaṃ madhye madhyarāśau hīnaṃ ṛṇamityarthaḥ

original: ghaṭobhirhṛtamapi tu dhanamiti

analyzed: madhya rāśeḥ ghaṭībhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ hatam labdham nakṣatra piṇḍam rāśau dhanam bhavati

original: dve ca rudranāḍya : prakaṭayati dhanaṃ sūryabhoge pradeyam etanmāsaṃ dhruvaṃ syāt kathitamapi punarmāsi māsi pradeyam ||30||

original: nṛpāmantraṇam

original: punaśśuddhādapya- śuddhamāsadha vakaṃ bālānāṃ pratibodhanārthaṃ racitam

analyzed: nṛpaḥ iti ṣoḍaśa dviguṇa nṛpa ghaṭī dvātriṃśat ghaṭī ghaṭikā sthāne dehā piṇḍake dve tu adhas ca iti ghaṭikā adhas piṇḍa sthāne dve deye bhavataḥ

original: dve carkṣe nakṣatra- sthāne
analyzed: dve carkṣe nakṣatra sthāne

original: rudranāḍyo nakṣatraghaṭikāsthāne
rudra iti ekādaśa nāḍyaḥ deyā iti
analyzed: rudra iti ekādaśa nāḍyaḥ deyā iti

original: dhanaṃ prakaṭayati sūryabhoge pradeyaṃ nakṣatrādikam

original: tasmāt māsaghra vakaṃ syāt kathitamapi punarmāsi māsi pradeyam

analyzed: pratyeka māsi pradeyam iti māsa ghravakam ka raṇa apekṣā vaśena bhagavatā anāgatam eva vyākṛtam iti

original: idānīṃ māsa va tithyā digaṇitamucyate- deyā heyāśca deyāḥ punarapi tithayo vāranāḍīpadeṣu piṇḍe bhāge'bdhicandraḥ samaviṣamagate deyaheyau padārthoṃ śūnye śūnyaṃ viśuddhaṃ tridaśaśaśipade pañca netrārkayordik tithyākhyaikādaśe'gnau daśajaladhipade viṃśatiścaikahīnā || 31 ||
analyzed: idānīm tithyāḥ digaṇitam ucyate deyāḥ heyāḥ ca deyāḥ punar api tithayaḥ vāra nāḍī padeṣu piṇḍe bhāge bdhi candraḥ sama viṣama gate deya heyau śūnye śūnyam viśuddham tridaśa śaśi

original: deyā heyāśca deyāḥ punarapi tithayo vāranāḍīpadeṣviti
analyzed: deyāḥ heyāḥ ca deyāḥ punar api tithayaḥ vāra nāḍī padeṣu iti

original: iha pratimāsadhruvake śuklapratipadādyekatithimārabhya yāvat triṃśattamāmāvāsī tāvat tithayo deyā heyāḥ 1. ṅa. adho | 2. kha. navaguṇainavaguṇai | 3 ṅa 0 dhruvāt
analyzed: iha prati māsa dhruvake śukla pratipad ādi eka tithim ārabhya yāvat triṃśattama amāvāsī tāvat tithayaḥ deyāḥ heyāḥ dhruvāt

original: paṭale jyotirjñāna vidhimahoddeśaḥ punardeyā iti vārasthāne deyāḥ pratidinavārārtham; ghaṭikāsthāne heyāścandrakalāyā ekaghaṭī- hānita:, punardeyāḥ piṇḍasthāne candrapadānāṃ dhanaṛṇabhogapariśuddhita iti
analyzed: paṭale jyotiḥ jñāna vidhi mahā uddeśaḥ punar deyāḥ iti vāra sthāne deyāḥ prati dina vāra artham ghaṭikā sthāne heyāḥ candra kalāyāḥ punar deyāḥ piṇḍa sthāne candra padānām dhana

original: piṇḍe bhāge'- bdhicandraḥ samaviṣamagate deyaheyau padārthāviti
analyzed: piṇḍe bhāge bdhi candraḥ sama viṣama gate deya heyau padārthau iti

original: piṇḍasthāne piṇḍādabdhicandreṇa ' caturdaśabhāgena samagatena padārtho dhanaṃ bhavati; viṣamagatena ṛṇaṃ padārtho bhavati
analyzed: piṇḍa sthāne piṇḍāt abdhi candreṇa caturdaśa bhāgena sama gatena padārthaḥ dhanam bhavati viṣama gatena ṛṇam padārthaḥ bhavati

original: atra sama- bhāge dvābhyāṃ gataścaturbhirvāgata iti na gato'pi sama iti
analyzed: atra sama bhāge dvābhyām gataḥ caturbhiḥ vā āgataḥ iti na gataḥ samaḥ iti

analyzed: viṣama bhāge ekena gataḥ tribhiḥ vagata iti

analyzed: tad upari na asti bhāgaḥ

analyzed: atas caturdaśa bhāgaiḥ catvāraḥ vibhaktāḥ bhavanti iti tena sama viṣama bhāgena padārthāḥ deyāḥ heyāḥ vā veditavyāḥ

original: padārtho nāma candracā (vā) rapadāni caturdaśa- sthāne'dha ūrdhve saptasaptapadavyāvṛttyā anulomavilomābhyāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇabhedabhinnāni

original: te ca padārthā deyā heyā bhavanti
analyzed: te ca padārthāḥ deyāḥ heyāḥ bhavanti

original: śūnye śūnyaṃ viśuddhamiti
analyzed: śūnye śūnyam viśuddham iti

analyzed: caturdaśa bhāga avaśeṣam yadi śūnyam tadā śūnyaḥ na deyaḥ na heyaḥ iti nyāya karaṇā

original: tridaśaśaśipade pañceti
analyzed: tri daśa śaśi pade pañca iti

analyzed: trayodaśame pade avaśeṣe dṛṣṭe eka pade vā pañca ghaṭikā dhanam vā ṛṇam vā bhavati

original: evaṃ netrārkayodi (53b)- giti dvipade adhike'vaśeṣe dvādaśe vā daśaghaṭikā deyā bhavanti, candrakalāvṛddhihānivaśā- diti
analyzed: evam dvipade adhike dvādaśe vā daśa ghaṭikāḥ deyāḥ bhavanti candra kalā vṛddhi hāni vaśāt iti

original: tithyākhya iti pañcadaśa; ekādaśe agnāviti tṛtīye bhavanti

original: evamaparārddha vijñeyam, prakaṭarasapada iti vacanāt

analyzed: śīghra kārye rasa ādyāḥ iti śīghra nakṣatra karmaṇi caturdaśa sthāne rasa ādyāḥ ṣaṣ padāḥ deyāḥ heyāḥ te ca vakṣyamāṇe vaktavyāḥ graha cāra samūhe sarvathā iti śanaiśvara śuddhiḥ

analyzed: saptatriṃśatsu māsaiḥ bhavati kara hataiḥ śīghra vakram ca ketoḥ iti atra ke toḥ uddeśa padam idam vakṣyamāṇe vistareṇa vaktavyam iti graha adhikāraḥ

original: - paṭale ] jyotirjñānavidhimahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ grahāṇāmastamanodayakāla ucyate- yaḥ kaścit sūryabhogaṃ praviśati niyataṃ sa grahaścāstameti sūryaṃ tyaktoditaḥ syādayanagativibhāgena mārgaśca tasya
analyzed: paṭale jyotiḥ jñāna vidhi mahoddeśaḥ idānīm grahāṇām astamana udaya kālaḥ ucyate yaḥ kaścid sūrya bhogam praviśati niyatam sa grahaḥ ca astam eti sūryam tyakta uditaḥ syāt ayana gati

original: yaḥ kaścit sūryabhogaṃ praviśati niyataṃ sa grahaścāstametīti sūryamaṇḍala raśmibhi-

original: svakṣetraṃ maṅgalasya meṣa rāśivṛścika rāśi śceti; tasmin kṣetre saṃsthitasya yadi budhabhogo bhavati, tasmi - [a]n kṣetre (tekto*) tadā niścitaṃ yuddham

original: atra punarnakṣatre grahāṇāṃ janma nakṣatrāpekṣayeti; na kevalaṃ svakṣetre rāśau yuddhaṃ janmanakṣatre'pi riporyuddhaṃ bhavatīti, punarvasau śukranakṣatre, maghāyāṃ maṅgalanakṣatre, hastāyāṃ bṛhaspatinakṣatre, anurādhāyāṃ budhanakṣatre, mūle śaninakṣatre, uttarā- ṣāḍhāyāṃ ketunakṣatre saumyamaṅgalayoḥ svasvanakṣatre yuddham

analyzed: idānīm rāhoḥ praveśaḥ ucyate parva chede pūrṇimāyāḥ chede cakārāt amāvasyā chede ca rāhoḥ vrajati candraḥ samamukhaḥ sammukhaḥ grāsaḥ eva bhavati

original: vāme tacchītaśailaṃ sukamaladalavat meṣapūrve tulādau vahneḥ śītādrisīmnaḥ khakhakhaśaranagā yojanānāṃ sahasram || 53 ||

original: laukikamataṃ prathamaṃ yuktyā vicāryate- atra gaṇitavyavahāro nāsti; svasvasiddhāntābhiprāyavaśāditi ekamataṃ na bhavati, tasmādevaṃ vicāryate - iha gole ye grahāḥ sūryācchīghramandagāminaste kimuparyu - paryadho'dhaḥ sthitāḥ, atha vāmabhāgato dakṣiṇabhāgataḥ sthitā iti ?

original: ubhayathā ca virodhaḥ
analyzed: ubhayathā ca virodhaḥ

original: cāpasthe dvādaśe syādayanamapi nṛṇāṃ dvādaśāre ca bhūmyām evaṃ savyāyanaṃ syād ravigamanavaśāt karkaṭādau ca rāśau // 57 //
analyzed: cāpa sthe dvādaśe syāt ayanam api nṛṇām dvādaśa are ca bhūmyām evam savya ayanam syāt ravi gamana vaśāt karkaṭa ādau ca rāśau

original: mārttaṇḍe karkaṭasthe vāmāyanaṃ bhavati harigate aṣṭame bhūkhaṇḍe bhavati; kanyāgate sūrye randhe navame bhūkhaṇḍe tulārke bhavati ca daśame bhūkhaṇḍe vṛścikasūrye rudra ekādaśame khaṇḍe re ; cāpasthe dvādaśe khaṇḍe syādayanaṃ nṛṇāmapi sambhāvane, dvādaśāre ca bhūmyāṃ sthitānāṃ lokānāmuttarāyanaṃ (ṇaṃ) dvādaśarāśibhedeneti
analyzed: mārttaṇḍe karkaṭa sthe vāmāyanam bhavati hari gate aṣṭame bhūkhaṇḍe bhavati kanyā gate sūrye randhe navame bhūkhaṇḍe tulā arke bhavati ca daśame bhūkhaṇḍe vṛścika sūrye rudre

original: evaṃ savyāyanaṃ syāt
analyzed: evam savya ayanam syāt

original: evamukta- krameṇa dakṣiṇāyanaṃ ravigamanavaśāt kakaṃṭādau ca rāśau bhavati
analyzed: dakṣiṇāyanam ravi gamana vaśāt kakaṃṭā ādau ca rāśau bhavati

original: asmin merordakṣiṇe laghujambūdvīpabhūkhaṇḍe dakṣiṇāyanaṃ karkaṭāditye bhavati
analyzed: asmin meroḥ dakṣiṇe laghu jambūdvīpa bhūkhaṇḍe dakṣiṇāyanam karkaṭa āditye bhavati

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇāvartte ca siṃhāditye dvitīye tṛtīye kanyāditye tulāditye caturthe meroḥ paścime dakṣiṇāyanaṃ bhavatīti
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇa āvartte ca siṃhāditye dvitīye tṛtīye kanyāditye tulāditye caturthe meroḥ paścime dakṣiṇāyanam bhavati iti

original: vṛści- kāditye pañcame dhanurāditye ṣaṣṭhe makarāditye saptame meroruttare kumbhāditye aṣṭame mīnā- ditye navame meṣāditye daśame vṛṣāditye ekādaśe mithunāditye dvādaśe bhūkhaṇḍe lokānāṃ dakṣiṇāyanaṃ dvādaśarāśibhedena bhavatīti
analyzed: vṛścika āditye pañcame dhanurāditye ṣaṣṭhe makarāditye saptame meroḥ uttare kumbhāditye aṣṭame mīna āditye navame meṣāditye daśame vṛṣāditye ekādaśe mithunāditye dvādaśe

original: idānīṃ sūryasya bhūvalayādūrdhvaṃ krāntimānamucyate- ūrdhvaṃ ṣaṇṇāgasaṃkhyā tapanamapi ravaścāyane cottare'nte tasmāt kṣīṇaśca savye bhavati narapate rudrasaṃkhyāsahasram
analyzed: idānīm sūryasya bhū valayāt ūrdhvam krānti mānam ucyate ūrdhvam ṣaṇṇāga saṃkhyā tapanam api ravaḥ ca ayane ca uttare nte tasmāt kṣīṇaḥ ca savye bhavati narapate rudra saṃkhyā sahasram

original: ekāśītisahasraṃ śaraśatarahitaṃ madhyato golarekhā tasmād yadvadddvi (yad vṛddhi ) pātaṃ khakhaśareṣūttare dakṣiṇe ca // 58 //
analyzed: ekāśīti sahasram śara śata rahitam madhyatas golarekhā tasmāt yadvat dvi yat pātam kha kha śareṣu uttare dakṣiṇe ca

original: paṭale ] jyotirjñānavidhimahoddeśaḥ ūrdhvaṃ ṣaṇṇāgasaṃkhyā iti
analyzed: paṭale jyotiḥ jñāna vidhi mahā uddeśaḥ ūrdhvam iti

original: iha saptamabhūvalayād ūrdhvaṃ ṣaḍaśītisahasrayojana- saṃkhyā tapanamapi raveścāyane' cottare 'nte dakṣiṇāyanādau svasvakhaṇḍe karkaṭādau dakṣiṇāyanaṃ svasvasaṃkrāntidine bhavati dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu yathākramamiti; tasmāt kṣīṇaśca savye bhavati narapate rudrasaṃkhyāsahasram
analyzed: iha saptama bhū valayāt ūrdhvam saṃkhyā tapanam api raveḥ ca ayane ca uttare nte dakṣiṇāyana ādau sva sva khaṇḍe karkaṭa ādau dakṣiṇāyanam sva sva saṃkrānti dine bhavati dvādaśa

original: tasmāt dakṣiṇāyanasaṃkrāntidināt savye'yane uttarāyanaṃ (ṇaṃ) yāvat kṣīṇo bhavatyekādaśasahasraṃ pañcasaptatisahasraṃ tapanaṃ sūryasyordhvaṃ veditavyamiti ekāśītisahasraṃ sa (śa) rapañcaśatarahitaṃ madhyato gola rekhā bhavati, yojanamānam
analyzed: tasmāt dakṣiṇāyana saṃkrānti dināt savye yane uttarāyanam yāvat kṣīṇaḥ bhavati ekādaśa sahasram pañca saptati sahasram tapanam sūryasya ūrdhvam veditavyam iti ekāśīti sahasram madhyatas gola

original: tasyā golarekhāyā yadvad dvipātaṃ bhavati sūryasya tat
analyzed: tasyāḥ gola rekhāyāḥ yadvat dvi pātam bhavati sūryasya tat

original: khakhaśareṣu iti pañcaśatādhikapañcasahasrāṇi yojanānāmiti, uttare rekhāyā dakṣiṇe ca svasvakhaṇḍe rāśibhogavaśeneti
analyzed: kha kha śareṣu iti pañca śata adhika pañca sahasrāṇi yojanānām iti uttare rekhāyāḥ dakṣiṇe ca sva sva khaṇḍe rāśi bhoga vaśena iti

original: idānīṃ sūryasya pratidinaṃ tiryakkrāntirdvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu savyottare ucyate- kṣārābdhi laṅghayitvā vrajati dinakaro dakṣiṇe yāvadagni kailāśa ( sa ) syottare ca vrajati himagiriṃ cottare cottarasthaḥ
analyzed: idānīm sūryasya pratidinam tiryakkrāntiḥ dvādaśa khaṇḍeṣu savya uttare ucyate laṅghayitvā vrajati dinakaraḥ dakṣiṇe yāvadagni kailāśa sa sya uttare ca vrajati himagirim ca uttare ca uttara sthaḥ

original: bāṇāstithayāhatāśca vrajati digayane yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ sārddhākṣā hīndulabdhaṃ tyajati dinadine pañcabhūtaḥ samantāt || 59 ||
analyzed: bāṇāḥ tithayā āhatāḥ ca vrajati digayane yojanānām sahasram sārddha akṣā hi indu labdham tyajati dina dine pañca bhūtaḥ samantāt

original: kṣārābdhiṃ laṅghayitvā vrajati dinakaro dakṣiṇe yāvadagnimiti
analyzed: kṣāra abdhim laṅghayitvā vrajati dinakaraḥ dakṣiṇe yāvat agnim iti

original: iha dvādaśāra- bhūmyāṃ pratye kaikakhaṇḍe rāśivaśāt kṣārābdhi laṅghayitvā dakṣiṇāyane sthitaḥ sūryo dakṣiṇāgnivalayādikaṃ yāvad vrajati samudrāntasīmna iti
analyzed: iha dvādaśāra bhūmyām pratye kaika khaṇḍe rāśi vaśāt laṅghayitvā dakṣiṇāyane sthitaḥ sūryaḥ dakṣiṇāgni valaya ādikam yāvat vrajati samudra anta sīmnaḥ iti

original: tataḥ sīmno'gnivalayāt kailāśa ( sa ) syottare vrajati himagirim (:), uttare mārge uttarāyana (ṇa) stha: sūryo dakṣiṇāyanā- didinaṃ yāvat
analyzed: tatas sīmnaḥ gnivalayāt kailāśa sa sya uttare vrajati himagirim uttare mārge uttarāyane stha sūryaḥ dakṣiṇāyanāḥ yāvat

original: bāṇāstithayāhatāśceti
analyzed: bāṇāḥ tithayā āhatāḥ ca iti

original: bāṇa iti pañca, tithiriti pañcadaśa; tābhiḥ pañca daśabhirhatā bāṇāstithayāhatā iti pañcasaptatirbhavati'
analyzed: bāṇaḥ iti pañca tithiḥ iti pañcadaśa tābhiḥ pañca daśabhiḥ hatāḥ bāṇāḥ tithayā āhatāḥ iti pañcasaptatiḥ bhavati

original: taṃ ( i ) pañcasaptatisahasrasaṃkhyāṃ yojanānāṃ vrajati dinakaro digayane himādagni yāvada- gnerhimavantaṃ yāvat pañcasaptatisahasraṃ yojanānāṃ dakṣiṇāyanādidigvibhāgaḥ; taṃ dig- vibhāgaṃ ṣaḍmāsairyathākrameṇa vrajati uttarāyaṇe dakṣiṇāyane ceti
analyzed: tam i pañca saptati sahasra saṃkhyām yojanānām vrajati dinakaraḥ digayane himāt agni yāvat a gneḥ himavantam yāvat pañca saptati sahasram yojanānām dakṣiṇāyana ādi diś vibhāgaḥ tam diś

original: sārddhākṣā hīndulabdhaṃ tyajati dinadine iti
analyzed: sārddha akṣā hi indu labdham tyajati dina dine iti

original: sārddhadvayaśītiśata bhāgalabdhaṃ pañcasaptatisahasrāt pratidinadig- vibhāgaṃ yojanānāṃ tyajati sūryaḥ
analyzed: bhāga labdham pañca saptati sahasrāt prati dina diś vibhāgam yojanānām tyajati sūryaḥ

original: evamubhayāyanabhogena rāśicakrasya maṇḍaladināni pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatrayasaṃkhyā raverbhavanti
analyzed: evam ubhaya ayana bhogena rāśi cakrasya maṇḍala dināni pañcaṣaṣṭi adhika śata traya saṃkhyāḥ raveḥ bhavanti

original: evaṃ dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu tiryakkrāntiḥ sūryasya veditavyeti
analyzed: evam dvādaśa khaṇḍeṣu tiryak krāntiḥ sūryasya veditavyā iti

original: idānīṃ pratyekarāśisthitasya sūryasya dvādaśakhaṇḍabhramaṇavaśād dvādaśamāsabheda ucyate- ataḥ bhoṭānusāraṃ 'vṛddhipātaṃ ' ityeva suvacam
analyzed: idānīm pratyeka rāśi sthitasya sūryasya dvādaśa khaṇḍa bhramaṇa vaśāt dvādaśa māsa bhedaḥ ucyate atas bhoṭa anusāram vṛddhipātam iti eva suvacam

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ rāśāvake sthito'rkaḥ sakalamṛtugaṇaṃ māsapakṣān karoti khaṇḍe khaṇḍe ca māso bhavati bhuvitale dvādaśāre krameṇa, yanmānaṃ yatra khaṇḍe bhavati dinavaśāt saptame tanniśāyāṃ trailakṣādarddhamārge dinamapi purataḥ pṛṣṭhato'rkasya rātriḥ || 60 ||
analyzed: vimala prabhāyām rāśau ake sthitaḥ rkaḥ sakalam ṛtu gaṇam māsa pakṣān karoti khaṇḍe khaṇḍe ca māsaḥ bhavati bhuvi tale dvādaśāre krameṇa yat mānam yatra khaṇḍe bhavati dina

original: rāśāveke sthito'rkaḥ sakalamṛta gaṇaṃ māsapakṣān karotīti
analyzed: rāśau ekasmin sthitaḥ rkaḥ sakala mṛta gaṇam māsa pakṣān karoti iti

original: ihaikarāśī yatra kutracit meṣādike sthitaḥ sūryo dvādaśakhaṇḍe ṣaḍ ṛtūn dvādaśamāsān caturviṃśati pakṣān karoti ; rāśicakrabhramaṇavaśena
analyzed: iha eka rāśī yatra kutracid meṣa ādike sthitaḥ sūryaḥ dvādaśa khaṇḍe ṣaṭ ṛtūn dvādaśa māsān caturviṃśati pakṣān karoti rāśi cakra bhramaṇa vaśena

original: iha meroḥ sarvadi gbhāge yo rāśicakra bhramaṇavaśād dakṣiṇāgni spṛśati, sa saptamakhaṇḍadikprāpto meruśṛṅga spṛśati himaparvato'ddhvaṃ vrajatīti nyāyāt sarvamṛtugaṇādikaṃ sakalaṃ pratyekaṃ rāśau sthitasyārkasya veditavyamiti
analyzed: iha meroḥ sarva di gbhāge yaḥ rāśi cakra bhramaṇa vaśāt dakṣiṇāgni spṛśati sa saptama khaṇḍa diś prāptaḥ meru śṛṅga spṛśati himaparvataḥ vrajati iti nyāyāt sarvam ṛtu gaṇa

original: khaṇḍe khaṇḍe ca māso bhavati bhuktile dvādaśāre krameṇeti
analyzed: khaṇḍe khaṇḍe ca māsaḥ bhavati bhuktile dvādaśa are krameṇa iti

original: iha dvādaśāre bhuvitale pratyekakhaṇḍe pratyekamāso bhavati ekarāśau sthitasya sūryasya yena prakāreṇa tathā kathyate- iha ekarāśinirdeśena sarvarāśayo veditavyā iti
analyzed: iha dvādaśāre bhuvi tale pratyeka khaṇḍe pratyeka māsaḥ bhavati eka rāśau sthitasya sūryasya yena prakāreṇa tathā kathyate iha eka rāśi nirdeśena sarva rāśayaḥ veditavyāḥ iti

original: atra laghujambūdvīpe merordakṣiṇe meṣādirāśayaḥ kila prasiddhāḥ, vasantādaya ṛtavaḥ, caitrādayo māsāḥ evaṃ pakṣāḥ sarve iti ; tasmāt tasmin meṣarāśau sthito'rko yathā dvādaśakhaṇḍe sarvamṛtugaṇādikaṃ karoti tathocyate — iha merordakṣiṇakhaṇḍe meṣastho'rko vasanta ṛtudhaiśākhamāsaṃ karoti, agni- koṇārddha' dvitīyakhaṇḍe jyeṣṭhamāsaṃ karoti; evamagnikoṇāt parārddhakhaṇḍe āṣāḍhaṃ karoti, tṛtīye evaṃ caturthe meroḥ pūrvakhaṇḍapūrvavidehe śrāvaṇamāsaṃ karoti, pañcame īśārddhe khaṇḍe bhādrapadaṃ karoti, īśakoṇe aparārddhe ṣaṣṭhe khaṇḍe āśvinaṃ karoti, meroruttare saptame khaṇḍe kārtikaṃ karoti, vāyavyakoṇārddha khaṇḍe aṣṭame mārgaśīrṣaṃ karoti, vāyavyāparārddhe koṇe khaṇḍe navame puṣyaṃ karoti, meroḥ paścime daśame khaṇḍe māghaṃ karoti, naiṛtyakoṇā- parārddha khaṇḍe phālgunaṃ karoti, naiṛtyakoṇāparārddha khaṇḍe caitraṃ karotīti
analyzed: atra laghu jambūdvīpe meroḥ dakṣiṇe meṣa ādi rāśayaḥ kila prasiddhāḥ vasanta ādayaḥ ṛtavaḥ caitra ādayaḥ māsāḥ evam pakṣāḥ sarve iti tasmāt tasmin meṣa rāśau sthitaḥ rkaḥ yathā dvādaśa ṣaṣṭhe khaṇḍe āśvinam karoti meroḥ uttare saptame khaṇḍe kārtikam karoti vāyavya koṇa arddha khaṇḍe aṣṭame mārgaśīrṣam karoti vāyavya apara arddhe koṇe khaṇḍe navame

original: evaṃ māsadvayena khaṇḍadvaye ṛturbhavati; pratyekakhaṇḍe śuklakṛṣṇapakṣabhedena pakṣadvayaṃ bhavati
analyzed: evam māsa dvayena khaṇḍa dvaye ṛtuḥ bhavati pratyeka khaṇḍe śukla kṛṣṇapakṣa bhedena pakṣa dvayam bhavati

original: evaṃ ṣaḍ ṛtavo dvādaśa māsāḥ caturviṃśati pakṣā dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu cakrākārā bhramanto jñātavyā iti
analyzed: evam ṣaṭ ṛtavaḥ dvādaśa māsāḥ caturviṃśati pakṣāḥ dvādaśa khaṇḍeṣu cakra ākārāḥ bhramantaḥ jñātavyāḥ iti

original: asmin dakṣiṇakhaṇḍe yo māso dvādaśarāśivaśena bhavati saṃkrāntau so'parasaṃkrāntī dakṣiṇāvarttena naiṛtyakoṇe gacchati, naiṛtyāddha koṇastho'parakoṇārddhaṃ gacchati, apara- koṇārddhastho meroraparagodānyāṃ gacchati, aparagodānyāṃ sthito vāyavyārddhakoṇaṃ gacchati, vāyavyādarddhakoṇastho'parakoṇāddhaṃ gacchati, apara- koṇārddha stha uttarakuru vrajati, uttarakurustha īśānakoṇāddhaṃ gacchati, tatrastho'parakoṇārddhaṃ gacchati, apara- jyotirjñānavidhimahoddeśaḥ koṇārddha sthaḥ pūrvavidehaṃ gacchati, pūrvavidehastho'gnikoṇārddhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vrajati, pūrvāddha stho'para- koṇārddhaṃ vrajati, aparakoṇārddhastho dakṣiṇajambūdvīpaṃ vajrati iti dvādaśamāsānāṃ pratisaṃkrāntivaśena dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu saṃcaraṇaṃ jñātavyamiti
analyzed: asmin dakṣiṇa khaṇḍe yaḥ māsaḥ dvādaśa rāśi vaśena bhavati saṃkrāntau saḥ para saṃkrāntī dakṣiṇa āvarttena naiṛtya koṇe gacchati para koṇa arddham gacchati apara koṇa arddha sthaḥ gnikoṇa arddham khaṇḍam vrajati para koṇa arddham vrajati apara koṇa arddha sthaḥ dakṣiṇa jambūdvīpam iti dvādaśa māsānām pratisaṃkrānti vaśena dvādaśa khaṇḍeṣu saṃcaraṇam jñātavyam iti

original: yanmānaṃ yatra khaṇḍe bhavati dinavaśāt saptame tanniśāyāṃ bhavati
analyzed: yat mānam yatra khaṇḍe bhavati dina vaśāt saptame tat niśāyām bhavati

original: iha uttarāyaṇa- saṃkrāntī dakṣiṇakhaṇḍe divāmānaṃ kṣīṇaṃ rātrimānaṃ vṛddham, tadevottarakurau saptame bhūmikhaṇḍe ādityodayavaśena dakṣiṇe rātrivṛddhivaśena tanmānaṃ tvatra na bhavati; jambūdvīpe dakṣiṇodayavaśena saptame rātrihānivaśena tato dakṣiṇe bhavati
analyzed: iha uttarāyaṇa saṃkrāntī dakṣiṇa khaṇḍe divā mānam kṣīṇam rātri mānam vṛddham tat eva uttarakurau saptame bhūmikhaṇḍe āditya udaya vaśena dakṣiṇe rātri vṛddhi vaśena tad mānam

original: evaṃ sarvatra pratyekakhaṇḍe veditavyamiti
analyzed: evam sarvatra pratyeka khaṇḍe veditavyam iti

original: trailakṣādarddhamārge * dinamapi purataḥ pṛṣṭhato'rkasya rātririti
analyzed: trailakṣāt arddha mārge dinam api puratas pṛṣṭhatas rkasya rātriḥ iti

original: iha vṛttamānaṃ ṣaṭ- lakṣam; sūryasya gamanādarddha mārge trilakṣaṃ dinamiti
analyzed: iha vṛtta mānam ṣaṣ lakṣam sūryasya gamanāt ardha mārge tri lakṣam dinam iti

original: udayāstamanaṃ yāvadastamanādudayaṃ yāvat rātriḥ trilakṣañca
analyzed: udaya astamanam yāvat astamanāt udayam yāvat rātriḥ tri lakṣaḥ ca

original: evamahorātraṃ veditavyamiti
analyzed: evam ahar rātram veditavyam iti

original: | idānīṃ dvādaśakhaṇḍasthānānmerusthitirucyate- sarveṣāñcottarastho bhavati narapate śailarājo janānāṃ pūrva sūryodayaḥ syād girisamamayanaṃ paścime cāstametat
analyzed: idānīm dvādaśa khaṇḍa sthānāt meru sthitiḥ ucyate sarveṣām ca uttara sthaḥ bhavati narapate śailarājaḥ janānām sūrya udayaḥ syāt giri samam ayanam paścime ca astam etat

original: kālāḥ sandhyāścatasra: praharadina niśāḥ sarvadā saṃkramanto merodikṣu bhramanti prakaṭaravimahau bheditā lagnabhedeḥ || 61 ||
analyzed: kālāḥ sandhyāḥ catasraḥ prahara dina niśāḥ sarvadā saṃkramantaḥ meru dikṣu bhramanti prakaṭa ravi mahau bheditāḥ

original: sarveṣāñcottarastho bhavati narapate śailarājo nanānāmiti
analyzed: sarveṣām ca uttara sthaḥ bhavati narapate śailarājaḥ nanāmiti

original: iha dvādaśakhaṇḍe sthitānāṃ janānāṃ śailarājo meruruttare bhavati
analyzed: iha dvādaśa khaṇḍe sthitānām janānām śaila rājaḥ meruḥ uttare bhavati

original: pūrve sūryodayaḥ syāditi sarveṣāṃ meroḥ sarvakhaṇḍasthitānāñca yatra bhānurudayati sā pūrvadig bhavati; dakṣiṇe jambūdvīpasthānāṃ pūrvavidehaṃ pūrvadika; aparago dānyāṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pūrvadiguttarasthānāmaparagodānī pūrvadika; pūrvavidehasthānāmuttarakuruḥ pūrvadika, sūryabhramaṇodayavaśāditi
analyzed: pūrve sūrya udayaḥ syāt iti sarveṣām meroḥ sarva khaṇḍa sthitānām ca yatra bhānuḥ udayati sā pūrva diś bhavati dakṣiṇe jambūdvīpa sthānām pūrvavideham pūrva dika aparagaḥ dānyām

original: evaṃ koṇasthiteṣu aṣṭakhaṇḍeṣu jñātavyamiti
analyzed: evam koṇa sthiteṣu aṣṭa khaṇḍeṣu jñātavyam iti

original: pañcapañcadaṇḍāntareṇa pratyekakhaṇḍe sūryodaya iti
analyzed: pañca pañca daṇḍa antareṇa pratyeka khaṇḍe sūrya udaye iti

original: girisamamayanamiti pratyekakhaṇḍe girisamaṃ merorabhimukhaṃ sūryagamanamuttare dakṣiṇe ca paścime cāstametat
analyzed: giri samam ayanam iti pratyeka khaṇḍe giri samam meroḥ abhimukham sūrya gamanam uttare dakṣiṇe ca paścime ca astam etat

original: evaṃ dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu yathāpūrve udayastathā paścime'stametadveditavyamiti
analyzed: evam dvādaśa khaṇḍeṣu yathā pūrve udayaḥ tathā paścime etat veditavyam iti

original: kālāstrayaḥ - prabhāto madhyāhno vikāla iti
analyzed: kālāḥ trayaḥ prabhātaḥ madhyāhnaḥ vikālaḥ iti

original: sandhyāścatasraḥ - arddharātra - sandhyā pūrvasandhyā madhyāhnasandhyā vikālasandhyā
analyzed: sandhyāḥ catasraḥ arddharātra sandhyā pūrva sandhyā madhyāhna sandhyā vikāla sandhyā

original: praharā aṣṭau (ṣṭa ) - divāyāṃ catvāraḥ, rātrau catvāraḥ
analyzed: praharāḥ aṣṭau ṣṭa divāyām catvāraḥ rātrau catvāraḥ

original: dinaniśaṃ (śā) sarvadā saṃkramantaḥ
analyzed: dina niśam śā sarvadā saṃkramantaḥ

original: evaṃ kālādayo'horātraṃ sarvasmin kāle saṃkramantaḥ khaṇḍāt khaṇḍaṃ merodikṣu bhramanti
analyzed: evam kāla ādayaḥ horātram sarvasmin kāle saṃkramantaḥ khaṇḍāt khaṇḍam meroḥ dikṣu bhramanti

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [lokadhātu- prakaṭaravimahau dvādaśāramahyāmiti'
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām lokadhātu prakaṭa ravi mahau dvādaśa ara mahyām iti

original: bheditā lagnabhederiti
analyzed: bhedi tā lagna bhedeḥ iti

original: lagnā dvādaśa , teṣāṃ bhedairbheditāḥ kālādayo bhramanti
analyzed: lagnāḥ dvādaśa teṣām bhedaiḥ bheditāḥ kāla ādayaḥ bhramanti

original: catuścaturlagnaiḥ kālo bhramati; pratyekapratyeka sandhyā trilagnairbhramati; pratyeka praharaḥ sādardhalagnena bhramati
analyzed: catur catur lagnaiḥ kālaḥ bhramati pratyeka pratyeka sandhyā tri lagnaiḥ bhramati pratyeka praharaḥ sādardha lagnena bhramati

original: evaṃ pratyekalagnaṃ pañcadaṇḍairbhramati; ardhapraharaḥ praharārddhena bhramati; praharāddharddhana ra muhūrtta bhramati; ṣaṣṭipāṇīpalairghaṭikā bhramati; pratyekapāṇīpalaṃ ṣaṭśvāsairbhramati
analyzed: evam pratyeka lagnam pañca daṇḍaiḥ bhramati ardha praharaḥ prahara arddhena bhramati bhramati ṣaṣṭi pāṇī palaiḥ ghaṭikā bhramati pratyeka pāṇī palam ṣaṣ śvāsaiḥ bhramati

original: evamahorātraṃ śvāsabhedena lagnabhedena kālo bhramati gacchati dehināmiti
analyzed: evam ahar rātram śvāsa bhedena lagna bhedena kālaḥ bhramati gacchati dehinām iti

original: idānīṃ meroḥ sarvadikṣu sūrya bhramaṇamānamucyate- nāḍyabde ṣaṭsapādaṃ ca ( na ?) kramati dinakaro yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ṣaṣṭhīnāmagnilakṣaṃ bhramati dinaniśaṃ pañcaśailaṃ sahasrama, golārddha khāgni nāḍīrvahati dinaniśaṃ hānivṛddhayośca pañca gole savyāva ( pa ) savyaṃ pratidinamapi tata śvāsayugmaṃ triliptam ||
analyzed: idānīm meroḥ sarva dikṣu sūrya bhramaṇa mānam ucyate nāḍī abde ca na kramati dinakaraḥ yojanānām sahasram ṣaṣṭhīnām agni lakṣam bhramati dina niśam pañcaśailam sahasram nāḍīḥ vahati

original: nāḍyabdhe (bde ) ṣaṭ sapādaṃ kramati dinakaro yojanānāṃ sahasramiti
analyzed: nāḍī abdhe bde ṣaṣ sa pādam kramati dinakaraḥ yojanānām sahasram iti

original: nāḍyabdhe- (bde) ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśataśvāsasaṃkhyākāle ṣaṭ sapādaṃ pañcāśadviśatādhikaṣaṭsahasra- miti kramati dinakaro yojanānāṃ rāśistho'yamākāśe'to rāśerayaṃ bhramaṇavego na sūryasya rāsyā (śyā)dhāre sthitasyeti atra rāśicakraṃ savyāvartena bhramati, graharāśiṣvava ( pa ) savyena
analyzed: nāḍī abdhe bde ṣaṣṭi uttara tri śata śvāsa saṃkhyā kāle ṣaṣ sa pādam pañcāśat viśata adhika ṣaṣ sahasram iti kramati dinakaraḥ yojanānām rāśi sthaḥ yama ākāśe rāśeḥ ayam

original: caranti|
analyzed: caranti

original: yathā rāśicakraṃ bhramati tathā rāhurapi saṃcarati paścimābhimukho meroḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kurvan|
analyzed: yathā rāśi cakram bhramati tathā rāhuḥ api saṃcarati paścima abhimukhaḥ meroḥ pradakṣiṇām kurvan

original: grahāḥ pūrvamukhā merora (roḥ) pradakṣiṇāṃ kurvanto rāśicakra saṃkramaṇaṃ kurvanti|
analyzed: grahāḥ pūrva mukhāḥ meroḥ pradakṣiṇām kurvantaḥ rāśi cakra saṃkramaṇam kurvanti

original: evaṃ paramārthayuktyā rāhuḥ puṇyavān sūryādayo' duṣṭāḥ pāpagrahā ucyante iti|
analyzed: evam parama artha yuktyā rāhuḥ puṇyavān sūrya ādayaḥ duṣṭāḥ pāpa grahāḥ ucyante iti

original: ṣaṣṭhīnāmagnilakṣamiti ṣaṣṭhīnāṃ nāḍīnāmadhve (bde) kāle ṣaṭśatādhikairṛviśat- sahasraśvāsasaṃkhyākāle|
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhīnām agni lakṣam iti ṣaṣṭhīnām nāḍīnām adhve bde kāle ṣaṣ śata adhikaiḥ ṛviśat sahasra śvāsa saṃkhyā kāle

original: agnilakṣaṃ trilakṣam, pañcaśailaṃ sahasramiti pañcasaptatisahasra- saṃkhyā yojanānāṃ bhramati; dinaniśamahorātramiti|
analyzed: agni lakṣam tri lakṣam pañca śailam sahasram iti pañca saptati sahasra saṃkhyā yojanānām bhramati dina niśam ahar rātram iti

original: golārddha khāgni nāḍīvhati dinaniśamitīha viśu (ṣu) vasaṃkrāntidine pūrvoktagola rekhāyāṃ khāgniḥ triṃśannāḍī raho vahati, triśannāḍī rātriṃ vahati, sūryaḥ samamahorātramityarthaḥ|
analyzed: gola arddha kha agni nāḍī vhati dina niśam iti iha pūrva ukta gola rekhāyām kha agniḥ triṃśat nāḍī rahaḥ vahati triśat nāḍī rātrim vahati sūryaḥ samam ahorātram iti arthaḥ

original: hānivṛddhayāśrayaṃ ( hānivṛdhayośca ) pañca gole savyāva ( pa ) savyamiti|
analyzed: hāni vṛddhayā āśrayam hāni vṛdhayoḥ ca pañca gole savyam iti

original: tasmād golārddhāt savyāva ( pa ) - savyamāsatrayeṇa savye rātrervṛddhiḥ pañcanāḍyaḥ, ava ( pa ) savye māsatrayeṇa dinavṛddhi: pañcanāḍyaḥ|
analyzed: tasmāt gola arddhāt savya ava savya māsa trayeṇa savye rātreḥ vṛddhiḥ pañca nāḍyaḥ savye māsa trayeṇa pañca nāḍyaḥ

original: atra rātrivṛddhayā divāhānidivāvṛddhyā rātrehaniḥ jñātavyeti|
analyzed: atra rātri vṛddhayā divāhāni divāvṛddhyā rātrehaniḥ jñātavyā iti

original: pratidinamapi paṭale ] jyotirjñānavidhimahoddaśaḥ vimalaprabhāyāṃ [lokadhātu- tat śvāsayugmaṃ triliptamiti|
analyzed: pratidinam api paṭale jyotiḥ jñāna vidhi mahā uddaśaḥ vimalaprabhāyām lokadhātu tat śvāsa yugmam tri liptam iti

original: atra savyāva ( pa ) savye trimāsānāṃ pratidinamahorātre vṛddhirhānirvā śvāsadvayaṃ trīṇi pāṇīpalāni|
analyzed: atra savya ava savye tri māsānām pratidinam ahorātre vṛddhiḥ hāniḥ vā śvāsa dvayam trīṇi pāṇī palāni

original: idaṃ mānaṃ kailāśa ( sa ) khaṇḍe, nāryaviṣayādike|
analyzed: idam mānam kailāśa na ārya viṣaya ādike

original: āryaviṣaye ca pratyahorātraliptā dvayaṃ ( pāṇīpalāni ) vṛddhirvā hānirvā veditavyā; māsatrayeṇa madhyaviśru ( ṣu)vāt triṃśada- horātratulyamānān nāḍītrayaṃ hānirvā vṛddhirvā ayanavaśād veditavyeti|
analyzed: ārya viṣaye ca prati ahorātra liptāḥ dvayam pāṇī palāni vṛddhiḥ vā hāniḥ vā veditavyā māsa trayeṇa horātra tulya mānāt nāḍī trayam hāniḥ vā vṛddhiḥ vā ayana vaśāt veditavyā iti

original: (70b) idānīṃ kailāśa ( sa ) khaṇḍabhedena dvādaśalagnānāmudayakāla ucyate- liptā syānmeṣalagne gagananavakaraṃ khartunetraṃ vṛṣe syāt yugme'pyākāśakhabde śararasaghaṭikāḥ syuḥ kulīre ca siṃhe|
analyzed: idānīm sa khaṇḍa bhedena dvādaśa lagnānām udaya kālaḥ ucyate liptā syāt meṣa lagne gagana nava karam kha ṛtu netram vṛṣe syāt yugme pi ākāśa khabde śara rasa ghaṭikāḥ syuḥ

original: kanyāyāṃ sārddhaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati khalu tulādyutkrameṇaiva sarvaṃ ṣaḍa lagnarastametaduditamapi tathā'rkaṃnakṣatrabhedaiḥ||
analyzed: kanyāyām sārddha ṣaṭkam bhavati khalu tulā ādi utkrameṇa eva sarvam etat uditam api tathā rkam nakṣatra bhedaiḥ

original: liptā syānmeṣalagne iti|
analyzed: liptā syāt meṣa lagne iti

original: iha meṣalagne prathamodayādaparalagnodayaṃ yāvat kālo bhavati, gagananavakaraṃ liptāpāṇīpalapiṇḍaṃ navatyadhikaśatadvayam, ataḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgena ghaṭikācatuṣṭayaṃ pañcāśat pāṇīpalāni meṣalagnodayakāla iti kailāśa ( sa ) viṣaye niyamaḥ|
analyzed: iha meṣa lagne prathama udayāt apara lagna udayam yāvat kālaḥ bhavati gagana nava karam liptā pāṇī pala piṇḍam navati adhika śata dvayam atas ṣaṣṭi bhāgena ghaṭikā catuṣṭayam

original: khartunetraṃ vṛṣe syāditi|
analyzed: khartu netram vṛṣe syāt iti

original: evaṃ vṛṣalagnodayakālaḥ ṣaṣṭya ttaraśatadvayaṃ pāṇīpala- piṇḍaṃ catasro nāḍyo viśatipāṇīpalānyudayakālaḥ|
analyzed: evam vṛṣa lagna udaya kālaḥ ṣaṣṭi attara śata dvayam pāṇī pala piṇḍam catasraḥ nāḍyaḥ viśati pāṇī palāni udaya kālaḥ

original: yugme'pyākāśakhabde yugme'pi mithune udayakālaḥ śatadvayaṃ liptāpiṇḍaṃ nāḍyastisraḥ pāṇīpalāni viṃśatiriti|
analyzed: yugme pi ākāśa khabde yugme pi mithune udaya kālaḥ śata dvayam liptā piṇḍam nāḍyaḥ tisraḥ pāṇī palāni viṃśatiḥ iti

original: sa (śa) rarasaghaṭikāḥ syuriti śara (:) pañcaghaṭikā kulīre karka lagne udayakālaḥ|
analyzed: ra rasa ghaṭikāḥ syuḥ iti śara pañca ghaṭikā kulīre karka lagne udaya kālaḥ

original: tataḥ siṃhe rasa iti ṣaṭpaṭikālagnodaye kāla iti kanyāyāṃ sārddhaṣaṭkaṃ kanyālagnodayakālaḥ ṣaṭ ghaṭikā triṃśat pāṇīpalāni sādarddhaṣaṭkaṃ bhavatīti|
analyzed: tatas siṃhe rasaḥ iti ṣaṣ paṭikā lagna udaye kālaḥ iti kanyāyām sārddha ṣaṭkam kanyā lagna udaya kālaḥ ṣaṣ ghaṭikā triṃśat pāṇī palāni sādarddha ṣaṭkam bhavati iti

original: tulādyutkrameṇaiva sarvam|
analyzed: tulā ādi utkrameṇa eva sarvam

original: ataḥ ṣaḍlagna kālāvadheraparaṣaḍlagne tulādiṣūtkrameṇaiva- manena vidhinā sarvaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ bhavatīti niyamaḥ|
analyzed: atas ṣaḍlagna kāla avadheḥ apara ṣaḍlagne tulā ādiṣu utkrameṇa eva vidhinā sarvam niḥśeṣam bhavati iti niyamaḥ

original: atra lagnodayakāle tulāyāṃ ṣaṭ ghāṭikā triṃśat pāṇīpalāni vṛścike ṣaḍ, dhanuṣi pañca, makare tisro nāḍyaḥ, pāṇīpalāni viṃśatiriti, kumbhe catasro nāḍyaḥ, viśati pāṇīpalāni; mīne ghaṭikāścatasraḥ, pāṇīpalāni pañcāśaditi kailāsaviṣaye niyamaḥ|
analyzed: atra lagna udaya kāle tulāyām ṣaḍ ghāṭikā triṃśat pāṇī palāni vṛścike ṣaḍ dhanuṣi pañca makare tisraḥ nāḍyaḥ pāṇī palāni viṃśatiḥ iti kumbhe catasraḥ nāḍyaḥ viśati

original: ṣaḍlagnairastametaduditamiti, tathā hi-yasmāt ṣaḍlagnairuditamapi tasmāt astametad bhavatīti|
analyzed: ṣaṣ lagnaiḥ astam etat uditam iti tathā hi yasmāt ṣaṣ lagnaiḥ uditam api tasmāt astam etat bhavati iti

original: arkasya nakṣatrabhederiti sārddhatrayodaśanakṣatrānte astametadudayastathā sārddhatrayodaśanakṣatrānte ahorātrabhedena ṣaḍlagnaiḥ sārddhatrayodaśanakṣatrairdivākālo bhavati; ṣaḍlagnaiḥ sārddhatrayodaśanakṣatra rātrikālo bhavati; lagnodayakālavaśena divārātri ( hīnādhiko (T) bhavati, sūryasañcāravaśāditi|
analyzed: arkasya nakṣatra bhedeḥ iti sārddha trayodaśa nakṣatra ante astam etad udayaḥ tathā sārddha trayodaśa nakṣatra ante ahorātra bhedena ṣaṣ lagnaiḥ sārddha trayodaśa nakṣatraiḥ divākālaḥ bhavati

original: idānīṃ dehe madhyamā varṣaśatadinaśvāsādikamucyate viṃśatyeke sahasra ityādi - viṃśatyeke sahasre rasaśatasahite nirgatā dantabhāgaiḥ dehe śvāsādhikā ye pratidinasamaye bhūtaśailatu saṃkhyā:|
analyzed: idānīm dehe madhyamā varṣa śata dina śvāsa ādikam ucyate viṃśatī eke sahasre ityādi viṃśatī eke sahasre rasa śata sahite nirgatāḥ danta bhāgaiḥ dehe śvāsa adhikāḥ ye prati dina

original: ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasrega ṇitamapi śatābdasya mānaṃ prasiddha śūnyagniprabhaktā prabhavati ghaṭikā ṣaṣṭibhāgād dinaṃ ca||
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ śata abdasya mānam śūnī agni prabhaktā prabhavati ghaṭikā ṣaṣṭi bhāgāt dinam ca

original: viśatyeke sahastre ayutadvaye sahasrādhike rasaśatasahite ṣaṭśatayukte iti|
analyzed: viśati eke sahastre ayuta dvaye sahasra adhike rasa śata sahite ṣaṣ śata yukte iti

original: nirgatā dantabhāgairato rāśe' dvātriṃśadbhāgairnigatā|
analyzed: nirgatā danta bhāgaiḥ atas rāśeḥ dvātriṃśat bhāgaiḥ nigatā

original: dehe śarīre śvāsādhikā ye pratidina- samaye dvādaśalagnaṃ saṃkrāntikāle bhūtaśalarta saṃkhyā pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭrāta saṃkhyā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasre guṇitamapi śatābdasya mānaṃ prasiddham; te śvāsā varṣaśatadinaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasra guṇitā varṣaśataśvāsamānaṃ te bhavanti|
analyzed: dehe śarīre śvāsa adhikāḥ ye prati dina samaye dvādaśa lagnam saṃkrānti kāle bhūta śalarta saṃkhyā pañcasaptati adhika ṣaṭrāta saṃkhyā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiḥ sahasre guṇitam api śata

original: atra pratyahaṃ trināḍīśvāsāḥ ṣoḍaśaśatādhikadvayayutasaṃkhyā varṣaśatādinairguṇitā ṣaṭsaptati' lakṣādhikasaptasaptatikoṭyo bhavanti|
analyzed: atra pratyaham tri nāḍī śvāsāḥ ṣoḍaśa śata adhika dvaya yuta saṃkhyāḥ varṣa śatā dinaiḥ guṇitā ṣaṭsaptati lakṣa adhika saptasaptati koṭyaḥ bhavanti

original: tebhyo dvātriṃśadbhāgena labdhāstricatvāriṃśallakṣādhikakoṭidvayasaṃkhyā madhyamāyā avadhūtyāḥ śvāsā bhavanti; avaśiṣṭāstrayastriṃśallakṣādhikapañcasaptatikoṭyo lalanā- rasanayoḥ pañcamaṇḍalavāhakāḥ samabhāgato'rddhā lalanāvāhakāḥ, arddhā rasanāvāhakā vāmasavyato varṣaśatāvadheriti|
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dvātriṃśat bhāgena labdhāḥ tricatvāriṃśat lakṣa adhika koṭi dvaya saṃkhyāḥ madhyamāyāḥ avadhūtyāḥ śvāsāḥ bhavanti avaśiṣṭāḥ trayastriṃśat lakṣa adhika pañcasaptati koṭyaḥ

original: śūnyartvagniprabhaktā prabhavati ghaṭikā|
analyzed: śūnya ṛtu agni prabhaktā prabhavati ghaṭikā

original: tataḥ śvāsarāśeḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatena prabhaktā labdhā ghaṭikā rāśirbhavati ṣaṣṭibhāgād dinaṃ ca|

original: tato ghaṭikārāśeḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgena labdhaṃ dinapiṇḍaṃ bhavati madhyamāyāḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhikaikādaśaśatasaṃkhyā ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasra - bhyo'vaśiṣṭaṃ dina piṇḍaṃ pañcasaptatyadhikāṣṭacatvāriṃśacchatottaramayutatrayaṃ lalanārasanayorvarṣa- śatāvadherjñātavyamiti mucyate- idānīmaṣṭagrahāṇāṃ varṣaśatamānaṃ sārddhacakraprabhogata ekapiṇḍatvena ra kālacakrarahita- cande pakṣe ravau cāyanamapi nava māsāśca bhaume ca rātriḥ ṣaḍa varṣāḥ syurguroḥ syādayanamapi bhṛgoścāyanaṃ candrasuno ( : )|

original: tanmadhye kiñcidatra sphuṭamiha viṣaye deśitaṃ te mayādya svasthāne rakṣaṇārthaṃ kuru sakalamidaṃ dveṣalobhairna sūryaḥ ||

original: || iha duṣṭānāṃ sādhanārthaṃ pūrvoktamādibuddhe yat tribhuvanaguruṇā śākyasiṃhena sucandrasya vajrapāṇinirmitakāyasya sarvasvarodayayantralakṣaṇam, tanmadhye, tasya svarodaya- yantrādhyāyasya madhye, kiñcidatra sphuṭamiha viṣaye sambhalākhye deśitam, te sūryarathasya mayā mañjuśriyā yaśonarendreṇa, adya svasthāne rakṣaṇārthaṃ kuru sakalamidaṃ dveṣalobhairna sūrya iti sūryarathasya niyamo yathā tathānyeṣāmapi kālacakraparijñānāni nāma yamapi niyamo bhagavataḥ
analyzed: iha duṣṭānām sādhana artham pūrva uktam ādibuddhe yat tribhuvana guruṇā śākyasiṃhena sucandrasya vajrapāṇi nirmita kāyasya sarva svara udaya yantra lakṣaṇam tad madhye tasya svara udaya yantra

original: iti śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ svarodayayantravidhiniyamamahoddeśaḥ ' daśamaḥ ||||

original: ( mlecchadharmotpāṭanabuddhadharma pratiṣṭhāpanamevādi idānīṃ mahācakravattino mlecchadharmotpāṭanabuddhadharmapratiṣṭhāpanamevādi subodhamiti tenoktaṃ ( tena noktaṃ ) ṭīkāyāṃ lokadhāturnāma prathamapaṭala : *- madyakṣīrābdhimadhye** munimahivalaye saṃsthitāṃ karmabhūmi lakṣe yojane ca bhramati narapati: sūryakhaṇḍān krameṇa

analyzed: vṛddheḥ kham ca avakāśam dadati narapate kālataḥ siddhiḥ evam divyāḥ kurvanti avasthāḥ prasavana samaye bālaka ādau ca kāle

original: iha dvīndriyasaṃyogād yaccyutaṃ bhagaraktaṃ guhyakamale tad bījamityucyate
analyzed: iha dvi indriya saṃyogāt yat cyutam bhaga raktam guhya kamale tat bījam iti ucyate

analyzed: tat bījam dhatta dharitrī guhya kamale yaḥ pṛthvī dhātuḥ saḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kamalagatamiti guhyakamala- gatam, ato guhyakamalād rohayatyambu paścāt tejo bodhaṃ karotīti, asya bījasya ambunā prarohitasya' tejaḥ prabodhaṃ karoti
analyzed: kamala gatam iti guhya kamala gatam atas guhya kamalāt rohayati ambu paścāt tejaḥ bodham karoti iti asya bījasya ambunā prarohitasya tejaḥ prabodham karoti

original: prasati rasarasamiti ṣaḍrasaṃ mātṛbhakṣitaṃ pītañca yat tad grasati rasarasaṃ tejaḥ
analyzed: rasa rasam iti ṣaṣ rasam mātṛ bhakṣitam pītam ca yat tat grasati rasa rasam tejaḥ

original: nara pate ityāmantraṇam

analyzed: evam anena krameṇa matsya ādeḥ siddhiḥ garbha niṣpattiḥ bhavati

analyzed: divyāḥ kurvanti avasthāḥ iti divyāḥ dhūma ādayaḥ daśa avasthāḥ tāḥ kurvanti

analyzed: bījasya sva dhātu kṛtyam āha bojasya ityādi vṛddhim asya

original: bījasya damā karoti sphuṭagurughanatāṃ toyameva dravatvaṃ tejaḥ pākaṃ karoti pravaradaśavidho māruto vṛddherbhūyo'vakāśaṃ dadati hi gaganaṃ kālataḥ nnānābhāvairanekaiḥ satanuravamanaḥ śaktayaḥ sṛṣṭireva - sphārayanti
analyzed: bījasya damā karoti sphuṭa guru ghana tām toyam eva drava tvam tejaḥ pākam karoti pravara daśavidhaḥ mārutaḥ vṛddheḥ bhūyas vakāśam dadati hi gaganam kālataḥ śaktayaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ eva

original: iha yā bījasya śukraraktasya kṣmā sā guhyakamalagatān ṣaḍ rasān bhakṣayitvā sphuṭaṃ gurughanatāṃ karoti, śarīrasyotpattaye toyamevaṃ dravatvaṃ karoti, tejaḥ pārka karoti bhakṣitānāṃ rasānām, pravaradaśavidho mārutaḥ prāṇādivṛddhi karoti, asya bījasya śarorāya, vṛddherbhayo' 'vakāśaṃ dadati hi gaganam, kālataḥ sṛṣṭirevam pūrvoktavidhānataḥ
analyzed: iha yā bījasya śukra raktasya kṣmā sā guhya kamala gatān ṣaṭ rasān bhakṣayitvā sphuṭam guru ghana tām karoti śarīrasya utpattaye toyam evam drava tvam karoti tejaḥ karoti bhakṣitānām

original: nānābhāvairanekaiḥ satata (nu) ravamana iti kāyavākcittāni śaktayo dhūmādayaḥ kāyavāk- cittadharmiṇyaḥ sphārayantīti bījadhātukṛtyakathanam

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ adhyātma- adhyātmacittavajradharaviṣṇordaśāvasthā ucyante guhyetyādinā - guhyābje raktamadhye patitamapi yadā bodhibījaṃ sajīvaṃ matsyaḥ kūrmo varāho bhavati naraharirvāmano rāmarāmau
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām adhyātma adhyātma citta vajradhara viṣṇoḥ daśa avasthāḥ ucyante guhya ityādinā guhya abje rakta madhye patitam api yadā bodhi bījam sa jīvam matsyaḥ kūrmaḥ varāhaḥ bhavati

original: kṛṣṇo buddho narendro bhavati daśavidhā (: ) cāpyavasthā daśetā garbhe tisrastathaikā prasavanasamaye bālakāle'pi ca dve

original: kaumāre yauvane'nyā prabhavati vipulaikā ca samyak tathaikā vṛddhatve'pyekaśāntā bhavana (ti) nidhanatā cāntimā garbhajānām

analyzed: matsya ākāraḥ tu mātsye bhavati kati dinam kūrma bhāvaḥ ca kaumyeṃ vārāhye tasya sūryāyatanam api bhavet nārasiṃhe prasūtiḥ

original: iha guhyābje raktamadhye patitamapi yadā bodhibījamiti śukraṃ sajīvamālaya- vijñānasahitaṃ guhyābje patitaṃ yadā tadā daśāvasthālakṣaṇaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: iha guhya abje rakta madhye patitam api yadā bodhi bījam iti śukram sa jīvam ālaya vijñāna sahitam guhya abje patitam yadā tadā daśa avasthā lakṣaṇam bhavati

original: teṣu garbhamadhye matsya kūrmava rāhāvasthāstisro bhavanti;

original: vṛddhatve'pyekaśāntā bhavana (ti) nidhanatā cāntimā garbhajānāmiti daśāvasthā- niyamaḥ |

original: tataḥ kau bhāve kūrmabhāvo bhavati cakārādaparaṛtudinaṃ yāvat;

analyzed: vāmanye bāla bhāvaḥ dvi nṛpati daśanāni udbhavam yānti rāmye bhūyas rāmye patanti sphuṭam api kapaṭam kārayet sā eva kārye

original: nābhau cāṣṭāṣṭakānyāḥ karacaraṇamukheṣūrdhvataḥ sarpyamāṇā māse pūrṇe dvitīye karacaraṇamukhoddeśanaṃ kiñcidatra || 9 ||

original: atra garbhe māsamekaṃ yāvad raktaṃ bījaṃ prarohati pañcāmṛtarasagatam, paścād bojāṅkurasyeti, tato māsādūrdhvaṃ bodhicittasyāṅkurībhūtasya hṛdayamadhyasthāne daśavidhā nāḍyaḥ prāṇādivāyvādhārā bhavanti;

analyzed: tathā atyanta sūkṣmāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ pūrva uktāḥ nābhināḍhyaḥ kara caraṇa mukha sthāna karaṇāya ūrdhvatas sarpyamāṇāḥ kara caraṇa mukha sthāneṣu tatas sarpyamāṇa prabhāvāt

original: dvitīye māse pūrṇe sati mukhakaracaraṇoddeśanaṃ kiñcidatra iha prāṅ matsyāvasthādine gate sati kūrmāvasthāyāṃ mukhakaracaraṇa'- sthāneṣu pañca sphoṭakā bhavanti |

original: hastau pādau ca kaṇṭho bhavati samaśiraḥ pūrṇamāse tṛtīye sūkṣmā māse caturthe karacaraṇamukhe nāḍikā kaṇṭhadeśe |

original: bhoṭānuvādānurodhena 'paraśurāmye dvinṛpati dvātriṃśaddināni udbhavaṃ yānti, rāmye patantī 'ti kramaḥ |

original: hastau pādau ca kaṇṭho bhavati samaśiraḥ kūrmaḥ, aparā sūkṣmanāḍyaḥ karacaraṇamukhe kaṇṭhadeśe karacaraṇānāṃ ṣaṭsandhiṣu mukhakaṇṭhe sahajasambhoganāḍyo'tisūkṣmāścaturthe māse pūrṇe sati bhavantīti kūrmāvasthā |
analyzed: hastau pādau ca kaṇṭhaḥ bhavati samaśiraḥ kūrmaḥ aparā sūkṣma nāḍyaḥ kara caraṇa mukhe kaṇṭha deśe kara caraṇānām ṣaṣ sandhiṣu mukha kaṇṭhe sahaja sambhoga nāḍyaḥ uti

original: pañcame māse vārāhye bhāve māṃsānyāśritya cāsthīni kharasahutabhu giti ṣaṭyuttaratriśatānyasthīni sandhayaśca tāvat yaḥ ṣaṣṭhe māse ca cakārāt vārāhye bhāve māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ bhavati, vedanā bhavati, sukhaduḥkhaṃ ca vetti, abhijñā- balena pūrvanivāsānusmṛti ca, svacittena vairāgyaṃ karoti, bhavaduḥkhaṃ nindayati, buddhamārga praśaṃsayati |

original: bhrūkeśā randhraromāṇyapi munivare nāḍikāḥ sāvaśeṣā māsādūrdhvaṃ hi jātā: pratidinasamaye śūnyaśūnyākṣisaṃkhyā |

original: marmāṇyasthīni majjā bhavati ca rasanā mūtragūthe'ṣṭame ca randhrākhye ghoraduḥkhaṃ prasavanasamaye yoninā pīḍitasya || 11 ||

original: tataḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatamarmāṇi asthīni, tanmadhye majjā bhavati rasanā jihvā jihva endriyotpādāya pūrvacakṣu- rādayo bhavanti kaṭhināḥ |
analyzed: tatas ṣaṣṭi uttara tri śata marmāṇi asthīni tad madhye majjā bhavati rasanā jihvā jihvaḥ indriya utpādāya pūrva cakṣuḥ ra ādayaḥ bhavanti kaṭhināḥ

original: tato rasanotpādakālādiha mūtragathe cāṣṭame māse bhavataḥ |

original: vārāhye bhāve tato randhrākhye navame māse pūrṇe sati kvacid daśame ekādaśe dvādaśe vā vārāhyabhāvāvasāne ghoraduḥkhaṃ bhavati prasavanakāle yoninā pīḍitasya nārasiṃhe bhāve garbhajātakasyeti garbhotpattiniyamaḥ |
analyzed: vārāhye bhāve tatas randhra ākhye navame māse pūrṇe sati kvacid daśame ekādaśe dvādaśe vā vārāhya bhāva avasāne ghora duḥkham bhavati prasavana kāle yoninā pīḍitasya nārasiṃhe bhāve

original: caturāryasatyeṣu saṃsāriṇāṃ duḥkhasatyamāha garbha ityādi- garbhe garbhasthaduḥkhaṃ prasavanasamaye bālabhāve'pi duḥkhaṃ kaumāre yauvane śrā (strā) ' dhanavibhavahataṃ kleśaduḥkhaṃ mahad yat |
analyzed: catur ārya satyeṣu saṃsāriṇām duḥkha satyam āha garbhe ityādi garbhe garbha stha duḥkham prasavana samaye bāla bhāve duḥkham kaumāre yauvane dhana vibhava hatam kleśa duḥkham mahat yat

original: vṛddhatve mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ punarapi bhayadaṃ ṣaḍgatau rivādyaṃ duḥkhād gṛhṇāti duḥkhaṃ sakalajagadidaṃ māhitaṃ māyayā ca ||12||
analyzed: vṛddha tve mṛtyu duḥkham punar api bhaya dam ṣaṣ gatau duḥkhāt gṛhṇāti duḥkham sakala jagat idam mā ahitam māyayā ca

original: iha saṃsāriṇāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat garbhe sthitānāṃ garbhastha duḥkha kumbhīpākasadṛśaṃ bhavati prasavanasamaye mudgarayantra pīḍitavat, bālabhāve'pi viṣṭhābhakṣaṇa śūkaravat, kaumāre yauvane ca śrī (strī) 'viyogaduḥkhaṃ dhanavibhavahataṃ duḥkham, tadabhāvāt |
analyzed: iha saṃsāriṇām prathamam tāvat garbhe sthitānām garbha stha duḥkha kumbhīpāka sadṛśam bhavati prasavana samaye mudgara yantra pīḍita vat bāla bhāve viṣṭhā bhakṣaṇa śūkara vat kaumāre

original: vṛddhatve'pi jarāmaraṇa- du:kham, punarapi maraṇānte ṣaḍgatau bhayadaṃ rauravādyam |

original: āditaḥ pretatiryaggatau raudraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati pāpavaśād daśā (śa) kuśala parityāgāt |

original: evaṃ duḥkhād gṛhṇāti duḥkhaṃ sakala- vaṭale ] kāyavāścittotpatti-caturāryasatya nirṇaya-mahoddeśaḥ jagadidaṃ mohitaṃ māyayā ca |
analyzed: evam duḥkhāt gṛhṇāti duḥkham catur ārya satya nirṇaya mahā uddeśaḥ jagat idam mohitam māyayā ca

original: mārgasatyamāha saṃsāra ityādi- saṃsāre mānuṣatvaṃ kvacidapi tu bhaved dharmabuddhiḥ kadācit tasmād buddhe'nurāgo bhavati śubhavaśādādiyāne pravṛttiḥ |
analyzed: mārga satyam āha saṃsāre ityādi saṃsāre mānuṣa tvam kvacid api tu bhavet dharma buddhiḥ kadācid tasmāt buddhe nurāgaḥ bhavati śubha vaśāt ādiyāne pravṛttiḥ

original: tasmād śrīvajrayāne kvacidakhilamatirvarttate bhāvanāyāṃ tasyāṃ buddhatvamiṣṭaṃ paramasukhapade'ho praveśo'tikaṣṭa : ( kaṣṭam ) ||13||
analyzed: tasmāt śrī vajrayāne kvacid akhila matiḥ varttate bhāvanāyām tasyām buddhatvam iṣṭam parama sukha pade ho ti kaṣṭa kaṣṭam

original: iha ṣaṭ gatyātmake saṃsāre mānuṣatva kvacidapi tu bhavet, tato dharmabuddhiḥ kadācid bhavati narāṇāṃ tīrthikadānādidharmeṣu |
analyzed: iha ṣaṣ gati ātmake saṃsāre kvacid api tu bhavet tatas dharma buddhiḥ kadācid bhavati narāṇām tīrthika dāna ādi dharmeṣu

original: tasmād buddhe'nurāgaḥ kadācit śubhavaśād bhavati, dānādyanurāgo'pi |
analyzed: tasmāt buddhe nurāgaḥ kadācid śubha vaśāt bhavati dāna ādi anurāgaḥ pi

original: tato'pi śubhavaśādādiyāne pravṛttirbhavati śrāvakapratyeka- buddhāne |
analyzed: śubha vaśāt ādiyāne pravṛttiḥ bhavati

original: tasmāt śrīvajrayāne pravṛttiḥ, vajramabhedyamacchedyaṃ mahaditi |
analyzed: tasmāt śrī vajrayāne pravṛttiḥ vajram abhedyam acchedyam mahat iti

original: tadeva yānaṃ mantra-
analyzed: tat eva yānam mantra

original: tataḥ kvacidakhilamatirvattate bhāvanāyām, kasyāñcit ' sālambanaśūnyatānirālambana- karuṇātmikāyāṃ puṇyajñānavaśena, tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ buddhatvamiṣṭaṃ bhavati

original: evaṃ paramasukha- pade'ho praveśo'tikaṣṭaḥ (ṣṭam) dūrād dūrataraḥ saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃsārasukhābhilāṣiṇāmiti

original: tasmānnirmāṇakāyaḥ prakaṭitaniyato mṛtyusīmno narāṇāṃ garbhe bāhaye caturdhā bhavati punaraso jñānavijñānabhedāt || 14 ||

original: iha prathamaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā viśuddhakāyādikaṃ garbhajātasya śarīre saṃdṛśyate; paścād tad vai dharmeṇa buddhasya bhagavataḥ suviśuddhakāyādikaṃ yogibhirveditavyam
analyzed: iha prathamam loka saṃvṛtyā viśuddha kāya ādikam garbha jātasya śarīre saṃdṛśyate paścāt tat vai dharmeṇa buddhasya bhagavataḥ su viśuddha kāya ādikam yogibhiḥ veditavyam

original: atra mātṛgarbhe yāvat tiṣṭhati tāvat pañcābhijño saṃśuddha kāyo bhavati śarīriṇaḥ

original: tataḥ prasavanasamayamārabhya yāvad dantotthānaṃ tāvad dharmakāyo bhavati

analyzed: nṛpa iti āmantraṇam

analyzed: candra sūryau api kamala gatāḥ mātṛ kamala gatāḥ trayaḥ ekībhūtāḥ garbha niṣpattaye śuddha kāyaḥ sa garbhe ucyate mātrā pitrā tryā laya vijñāna eka sukha avasthātaḥ

analyzed: tatas bāhye kāya catuṣṭayam ye jāte sati śvāsasya prathamaḥ udbhavaḥ yaḥ madhyanāḍyām bhavati sa nirguṇaḥ vāc vajra viṣaye saṃśuddha kāyaḥ saḥ eva sapāda ṣaṭpañcāśat śvāsa

analyzed: tasmāt prāṇa sañcāra vaśāt danta udbhavaḥ sphuṭam api vacanam yat tat saṃjñā lakṣaṇam sa vāgvajra viṣaye dharmakāyaḥ

analyzed: kāya vāc citta jñāna utpattim āha garbham ityādinā garbhe śrī kāya vajram prathamam iha bhavet vāc svarūpam prasūte cittam danta udbhave vai punar api patanāt udbhave jñāna vajram

original: jñānaṃ vijñānamiśraṃ raviśaśisahitaṃ jñānavajrādisarvaṃ garbhe rūḍhaṃ krameṇa prabhavati balavat kāyavajrādinā ca || 17||

original: paṭale ] kāyavā cittotpatti- caturāryasatyanirṇaya-mahoddeśaḥ 165 iha mātṛgarbhe jñānaṃ sahajānandaṃ vijñānamiśritamālayavijñānam, raviśaśisahitaṃ rajaḥ śukrābhyāṃ sahitaṃ jñānavajrādisarvaṃ sahajānandādikaṃ bhavati
analyzed: paṭale catur ārya satya nirṇaya mahā uddeśaḥ iha mātṛgarbhe jñānam sahaja ānandam vijñāna miśritam ālayavijñānam ravi śaśi sahitam rajaḥ śukrābhyām sahitam jñāna vajra ādi sarvam

original: garbhe rūḍhaṃ krameṇa prabhavati balavat kāyavajādinā ca
analyzed: garbhe rūḍham krameṇa prabhavati balavat kāya vaja ādinā ca

original: ādhārādheyasambandhamāha pṛthvītyādi - pṛthvīgarbho hutāśo bhavati ca (na) dharaṇīmārutau śūnyagarbho vāyorbhūmeśca garbho bhavati hi salilaṃ niḥsvabhāvaḥ svabhāvam
analyzed: ādhāra ādheya sambandham āha pṛthvī ityādi pṛthvīgarbhaḥ hutāśaḥ bhavati ca na dharaṇī mārutau śūnya garbhaḥ vāyoḥ bhūmeḥ ca garbhaḥ bhavati hi salilam niḥsvabhāvaḥ svabhāvam

original: bhūmerādhāra ambu jvalanamapi jalasyānilaḥ pāvakasya vāyoḥ śūnyaṃ narendra prabhavati hi tathādhāra ādheyabhūtaḥ || 18 ||

original: [91] iha pṛthvyā garbho hutāśo'gnirbhavati, na tatkulī, pṛthvīguṇasvabhāvābhāvāt
analyzed: iha pṛthvyāḥ garbhaḥ hutāśaḥ gniḥ bhavati na tad kulī pṛthvī guṇa svabhāva abhāvāt

original: evaṃ vāyuga (:) bhūmeśca garbha (:) salilaṃ bhavati; tadeva vāyugarbhe niḥsvabhāvānurūpe- ṇāvasthitam ' ; yatra yatra vāyuḥ saṃsarati, tatra tatra tena sārddhaṃ vrajati
analyzed: evam bhūmeḥ ca garbha salilam bhavati tat eva vāyu garbhe yatra yatra vāyuḥ saṃsarati tatra tatra tena sārddham vrajati

analyzed: yat bhūmi madhye vyava sthitam tat svabhāvam drava rūpam khanyamānam dṛśyate bhūmyam iti

original: atra punaḥ sarveṣāṃ pṛthvyādīnā- mākāśamādhāraḥ, pṛthivyādayo bhūtā ādheyāḥ

original: atra yathākramamādhārādheyau bhavataḥ
analyzed: atra yathākramam ādhāra ādheyau bhavataḥ

original: jvalanamapya- gnimaṇḍalaṃ jalasyeti jalamaṇḍalasyādhāraḥ

original: anila iti vāyumaṇḍalam

analyzed: pāvakasya agni maṇḍalasya vāyuḥ iti vāyu maṇḍalasya śūnyam ākāśam ādhāraḥ

analyzed: evam sarveṣām bhūtānām pṛthivyāḥ dīnām śūnyam ādhāraḥ bhavati

original: | samūhādhārādheyamāha skandha ityādi- skandhādhāro hi bhauto bhavati varatanau bhūtavṛndasya nāḍyo nāḍīnāṃ prāṇavāyurbhavati daśavidhaścetanā prāṇavāyoḥ
analyzed: samūha ādhāra ādheyam āha skandhaḥ ityādi skandha ādhāraḥ hi bhautaḥ bhavati vara tanau bhūta vṛndasya nāḍyaḥ nāḍīnām prāṇa vāyuḥ bhavati daśavidhaḥ cetanā prāṇa vāyoḥ

original: taccittaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ bhavati guṇavaśāt sasvabhāvāsvabhāvaṃ bharttādhārastayośca tribhuvananamito'nāhataḥ sarvago yaḥ || 19 ||
analyzed: tat cittam dvi svabhāvam bhavati guṇa vaśāt sa svabhāva asvabhāvam bharttā ādhāraḥ tayoḥ ca tribhuvana namitaḥ na āhataḥ sarvagaḥ yaḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ adhyātma- iha śarīre pañcaskandhānāmādhāro hi bhautaṃ (to) pṛthivyādibhūtasamūhaṃ (ho) bhavati

analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ iha pṛthivī ādi prakṛteḥ abhāvāt pratyayaḥ na asti avidyā ādikaḥ

analyzed: yatas catur bhūta ātmakam rūpam ṣaṣ dhātu ātmakaḥ atas skandha ādhāraḥ hi bhavati

original: sa ca daśavidho vakṣyamāṇo vaktavyaḥ

original: tayośca sasvabhāvāsvabhāvayorbharttādhāraḥ sukhaduḥkhāvasthādhāvī (dhārī) saṃsāri- ṇām

analyzed: sa ca sukha duḥkhābhyām rahitaḥ tribhuvana namitaḥ yaḥ saḥ na āhataḥ sarvagaḥ bhavati sukha duḥkha anta kṛt niṣṭhaḥ iti

original: gandhotpattirdharaṇyāmapi śikhini rasasyodake rūpadhātoḥ vāyo sparśasya śānte tvapi bhavati ravasyāmbare dharmadhātoḥ

original: śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti śabdaṃ khalu jinajanako dharmadhātuṃ ca vāyuḥ gandhaṃ vahniśca rūpaṃ rasamapi salilaṃ sparśameva dharitrī || 20 ||
analyzed: śūnyam gṛhṇāti śabdam khalu jina janakaḥ dharmadhātum ca vāyuḥ gandham vahniḥ ca rūpam rasam api salilam sparśam eva dharitrī

original: dhātūnāṃ janyajanakasambandhamāha gandha ityādinā -
analyzed: dhātūnām janya janaka sambandham āha gandhaḥ ityādinā

analyzed: api sambhāvane śikhini agni dhātau rasasya ṣaṣ prakārasya agneḥ paripāka hetutaḥ rasasya utpattiḥ bhavati yatas tasmāt udake rūpa dhātoḥ

original: ihākurādīnāṃ prarohādikaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāsaṃsthānamudakād bhavati mukhyataḥ, gauṇataḥ punaḥ rasādīnāmapyutpattiḥ
analyzed: iha akura ādīnām praroha ādikam nānā varṇam nānā saṃsthānam udakāt bhavati mukhyataḥ gauṇataḥ punar rasa ādīnām api utpattiḥ

original: evaṃ vāyau vāyudhātau sparśasyotpattirbhavati; śānte jñānadhātau ravasyeti śabdotpādaḥ

original: idānīṃ grāhyagrāhakasambandha ucyate- iha parakulāliṅganataḥ kāryasiddhirbhavati, svakulāliṅganena svātmani kriyā- virodhāt
analyzed: idānīm grāhya grāhaka sambandhaḥ ucyate iha para kula āliṅganataḥ kārya siddhiḥ bhavati sva kula āliṅganena sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt

original: ataḥ parakulāliṅganaṃ śarīrotpattikāraṇaṃ bhavati

analyzed: khalu jina janakaḥ iti niścitam manaḥ indriyam gṛhṇāti dharmadhātum ākāśa dhātu udbhūta viṣayam

analyzed: vāyuḥ iti janya janaka abhedya tvena vāyu bhūtam ghrāṇa indriyam bhūmi dhātu bhūtam gandha viṣayam gṛhṇāti

original: va[92a]hni- ityādiślokaḥ' ityadhiko likhitaḥ
analyzed: va a hni ityādi ślokaḥ iti adhikaḥ likhitaḥ

original: paṭale 1 kāyavākcittotpatti- caturāryaṃsatya nirṇaya- mahoddeśaḥ śceti agnidhātudbhūtaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ gṛhṇāti toyadhātujanitaṃ rūpaviṣayam
analyzed: paṭale agni dhātu udbhūtam cakṣuḥ indriyam gṛhṇāti toya dhātu janitam rūpa viṣayam

analyzed: dharitrī pṛthvī dhātu udbhūtam kāya indriyam gṛhṇāti vāyu dhātṛ dbhūtam sparśa viṣayam iti viṣaya viṣayiṇām grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ

original: lokasaṃvṛtyā rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ pratyekadhātau siddhimāha siddhamityādi - siddhaṃ rūpaṃ dharaṇyāṃ tribhuvananilaye codake siddhasaṃjñā vahnau vai vedanā ca prabhavati pavane siddhasaṃskāra eva

original: vijñānaṃ jñānamiśra sagaganakuliśe siddhamevātra kāye dhātuskandhādisarvaṃ bhavati ca rajasā bodhicittādiyogāt || 21 ||

analyzed: iha dhātu skandhānām aikyam siddham ucyate atra dharaṇyām mukhyatas rūpam siddham saṃjñā ādayaḥ gauṇataḥ siddhāḥ

original: tribhuvananilaye traidhātukaviṣaye, na nirvāṇadharme bhavatīti

original: cakārādudake 10 saṃjñā siddhā bhavati

original: iha saṃjñānāmasvaradharmacandraḥ, śukraṃ toyaprakṛtiḥ, toyaprakṛtitvāt saṃjñā siddhā bhavati, udaka iti niścayaḥ
analyzed: iha saṃjñā nāma svara dharma candraḥ śukram toya prakṛtiḥ toya prakṛti tvāt saṃjñā siddhā bhavati udake iti niścayaḥ

original: vahnau vai vedanā ceti iha vahniprakṛtiḥ sūryo rajaḥ, kāli: sūryarajaḥ kālisvabhāvā vedanā

analyzed: atas vahnau vedanā siddhā bhavati mukhyatas śeṣāḥ gauṇataḥ prabhavanti

original: pavane siddhaḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ, evamatra vāyuḥ kāyavākcitta- saṃcālakaḥ saṃskārajanakaḥ, tena vāyuprakṛtiḥ saṃskāraḥ siddhaḥ
analyzed: pavane siddhaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ evam atra vāyuḥ saṃcālakaḥ saṃskāra janakaḥ tena vāyu prakṛtiḥ saṃskāraḥ siddhaḥ

original: evaṃ vijñānaṃ jñānamiśraṃ jñānasahitam
analyzed: evam vijñānam jñāna miśram jñāna sahitam

analyzed: yathākramam sa gagana kuliśe ākāśe vijñānam siddham śrotra vijñāna ādi lakṣaṇam

analyzed: kuliśe jñāna dhātoḥ jñānam siddham bodhi citta cyavana ante sukha vakṣaṇa ātmakam

original: kasmād dhātuskandhādisarvamityāha
analyzed: kasmāt dhātu skandha ādi sarvam iti āha

original: rajasā bodhi- cittādiyogāt iha śarīre dhātuskandhādika yat sarvaṃ tad rajaḥ śukrālayavijñānasukha- kṣaṇāvasthāsaṃyogād bhavati [92b]
analyzed: rajasā citta ādi yogāt iha śarīre yat sarvam tat rajaḥ śukra ālayavijñāna sukha kṣaṇa avasthā saṃyogāt bhavati bhavati

original: śrotrādīnāṃ grāhakāṇāṃ śabdādiviṣayagrāhakatvena tat svabhāvatvamāha śrotra- mityādi- śrotraṃ vajrasvabhāvaṃ bhavati narapate cittamākāśabhāvaṃ ghrāṇo bhūmisvabhāvo bhavati ca rasanā vahnibhāvā tathaiva
analyzed: śrotra ādīnām grāhakāṇām śabda ādi viṣaya grāhaka tvena tat svabhāva tvam āha śrotram ityādi śrotram vajra svabhāvam bhavati narapate cittam ākāśa bhāvam ghrāṇaḥ bhūmi svabhāvaḥ bhavati

original: cakṣustoyasvabhāvaṃ tribhuvananilaye vāyubhāvaśca kāyaḥ evaṃ śrotrādisarvaṃ bhavati guṇavaśāt jñānavijñānayogāt || 22 ||
analyzed: cakṣuḥ toya svabhāvam tribhuvana nilaye vāyu bhāvaḥ ca kāyaḥ evam śrotra ādi sarvam bhavati guṇa vaśāt jñāna vijñāna yogāt

original: iha śarīradharme śrotraṃ grāhakatvena śūnyalakṣaṇaṃ grāhyaviṣayagrahaṇena vajrasvabhāvaṃ śabdasvabhāvamiti

original: atra grāhako dharmaḥ kāyabheda ucyate, grāhyo dharmo bhāvabhedaḥ

original: ato grāhyasvabhāvena janyajanakasvabhāvo vijñeyo narapata ityāmantraṇam
analyzed: atas grāhya svabhāvena janya janaka svabhāvaḥ vijñeyaḥ narapate iti āmantraṇam
