analyzed: bhavati ca rasanā vahni svabhāvā tathā eva yathā pūrve vahni janma vimala prabhāyām bhāvaḥ rasa grahaṇāt

original: cakṣustoyasvabhāvam, toyajanitarūpagrahaṇāt
analyzed: cakṣuḥ toya svabhāvam toya janita rūpa grahaṇāt

original: tribhuvana- nilaye, na nirvāṇe
analyzed: tribhuvana nilaye na nirvāṇe

original: vādhu [ sva]bhāvaśca kāya iti kāyendriyaṃ vāyujanitaṃ sparśaviṣaya- grahaṇāt

analyzed: evam ukta krameṇa śrotra ādikam sarvam bhavati guṇa vaśāt iti śabda dharma dhātu gandha rasa rūpa sparśa vaśāt

original: śrotraṃ mano ghrāṇo jihvā cakṣuḥ kāyaḥ - ete ṣaḍindriyadhātavaḥ jñānavijñāna- yogād vijñeyā iti
analyzed: śrotram manaḥ ghrāṇaḥ jihvā cakṣuḥ kāyaḥ ete ṣaṣ indriya dhātavaḥ jñāna vijñāna yogāt vijñeyāḥ iti

original: ṣaḍdhātuvaśena mātsaryādayaḥ ṣaṭ cittavikārānāha mātsaryamityādi - mātsaryaṃ jñānadhātau bhavati varatano cāmbare dveṣavatraṃ (cittam) īrṣyācitaṃ hi vāyau prakaṭitamanale rāgacittaṃ tathaiva

original: toye śrīmānavajraṃ (cittaṃ ) prakṛtiguṇavaśānmohavatraṃ (cittaṃ ) dharaṇyāṃ vāhastau pādapāyū marudanalajalakṣmāsu sarve babhūvuḥ || 23 ||
analyzed: toye śrīmān avajram cittam prakṛti guṇa vaśāt moha vatram cittam dharaṇyām vā a hastau pāda pāyū marut anala ja lakṣmāsu sarve babhūvuḥ

original: iha śarīre cittasya mātsaryaṃ jñānadhātau pañcamyarthe saptamī; jñānadhātuvaśāt, mātsaryacittaṃ sattvānā[93a ]mityarthaḥ
analyzed: iha śarīre cittasya mātsaryam jñāna dhātau pañcamī arthe saptamī jñāna dhātu vaśāt mātsarya cittam sattvānām

analyzed: ambare cittam iti ākāśa dhātu vaśāt sattvānām dveṣa cittam

original: evaṃ vāyudhātuvaśādīrṣyācittam, analdhātuvaśād rāgacittam, tadeva prakaṭitaṃ muninā

analyzed: mūrdhni vāyu maṇḍalam vahati ubhayoḥ nāsāpuṭayoḥ madhye vyoma dvayoḥ nāsāpuṭayoḥ pṛthvī ap tejaḥ vāyu maṇḍala madhye vyoma maṇḍalam vahati

original: vāmalagnasañcāre vāme, dakṣiṇa- lagnasañcāre dakṣiṇe maṇḍala pravāhaḥ

analyzed: dvayoḥ nāsāpuṭayoḥ punar yaugapadyena viṣuvam jñāna maṇḍalam vahati prāṇaśaktiḥ iti

original: bhindantyetāni nābhihatkaṇṭhalalāṭoṣṇīṣanāsāpuṭamaṇḍalāni bhindantī daṇḍa rāśi praharanakṣatratithi sandhyāmaṇḍalabhedairiti

original: śaktiḥ prāṇaśaktirvrajati parapadaṃ nirālambaṃ dvādaśāntaṃ dvādaśāṅgulāntamiti, kalāntaṃ ṣoḍaśakalāntamiti

original: iha pṛthivī- maṇḍalapravāha vāyurnāsāpuṭāt dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vrajati, tato nivartate;

original: iti śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantra rājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ samudaya satyādimahoddeśo dvitīyaḥ || 2

original: cakravattimlecchayuddha - kālacakra kulatantra nāḍīkulotpatti-mahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ cakravattimlecchayuddhaṃ svadehe ucyate cakrītyādinā - cakrī vatre svadehe suravarapatayo dvādaśāṅgā niruddhāḥ samyagjñānaṃ hi kalkī gajaturagarathāḥ kiṅkarāryyapramāṇāḥ
analyzed: cakravatti mleccha yuddha kālacakra kulatantra nāḍī kulotpatti mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm cakravatti mleccha yuddham sva dehe ucyate cakri ityādinā cakrī vatre sva dehe suravara patayaḥ dvādaśa aṅgāḥ

original: pratyekaṃ rudrasaṃjñā prabhavati hanūmān śrāvakaṃ prāṇināṃ ca pāpaṃ mlecchendraduṣṭastvakuśalamapi yat kṛnmatirduḥkhadātā || 48
analyzed: pratyekam rudra saṃjñā prabhavati hanūmān śrāvakam prāṇinām ca pāpam mleccha indra duṣṭaḥ tu akuśalam api yat kṛt matiḥ duḥkha dātā

original: iha svadehe manuṣyadehe yo bāhya cakrī prathamapaṭale uktaḥ, sa dehe vajrī cittavajra ityarthaḥ
analyzed: iha sva dehe manuṣya dehe yaḥ bāhya cakrī prathama paṭale uktaḥ sa dehe vajrī citta vajraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ye suravarapatayo dvādaśa īśvarādayaḥ, te dvādaśāṅgā niruddhā iti
analyzed: ye suravara patayaḥ dvādaśa īśvara ādayaḥ te dvādaśa aṅgāḥ niruddhāḥ iti

original: yaḥ kalkī samyagjñānaṃ svadehe hi tasmāddhetoḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kalkī samyak jñānam sva dehe hi tasmāt hetoḥ

original: ye bāhya gajaturagarathāḥ kiṅkarā ārya-apramāṇā- ścatvāro dehe, te yo bāhya rudraḥ sa dehe pratyekajñānasaṃjñī; yo bāhya hanūmān sa svadehe śrāvakajñānamiti svadehe mahā ' cakrī saparivāraṃ kalkī ca bhavati
analyzed: ye gaja turaga rathāḥ kiṅkarāḥ ārya apramāṇāḥ ścatvāraḥ dehe te yaḥ bāhya rudraḥ sa dehe pratyeka jñāna saṃjñī yaḥ bāhya hanūmān sa sva dehe śrāvaka jñānam iti sva dehe mahā

original: tathā yo bāhya mlecchendraduṣṭo'sau pāpacittaṃ śarīre

original: aśvatthāmā tvavidyā danubalasakalaṃ mārapakṣaścaturdhā saṃhārastasya yuddhe bhavabhayanidhanaṃ śrījayo mokṣamārgaḥ
analyzed: aśvatthāmā tu avidyā danu bala sakalam māra pakṣaḥ caturdhā saṃhāraḥ tasya yuddhe bhava bhaya nidhanam śrī jayaḥ mokṣa mārgaḥ

original: kailāśe dharmadānaṃ bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ dravyapūrṇā ca pṛthvī putro brahmāsureśastridaśanaraguroḥ pṛṣṭhataścāgrato yaḥ || 49
analyzed: kailāśe dharma dānam bhava bhaya haraṇam dravya pūrṇā ca pṛthvī putraḥ brahma asura īśaḥ tridaśa nara guroḥ pṛṣṭhatas ca agratas yaḥ

original: mañjuśrī rlokanāthastribhuvanavijayī śrīrajo bodhicittaṃ pṛṣṭhe brahmādivaṃśā vividhamahitale'nekabuddhā viśuddhāḥ
analyzed: mañjuśrīḥ lokanāthaḥ tribhuvana vijayī śrī rajaḥ bodhi cittam pṛṣṭhe brahma ādi vaṃśāḥ vividha mahi tale nekabuddhāḥ viśuddhāḥ

original:
bho.

analyzed: yaḥ bāhya aśvatthāmā sa dehe avidyā pravṛttiḥ iti yat danu balam hasti aśva pādātikam sa dehe māra pakṣa caturdhā

original: saṃhārastasya yuddha e, yo bāhya mleccheṣu tat svadehe bhavabhayasya nidhanam

analyzed: yat bāhya kailāśe dharma dānam mahācakriṇaḥ tat sva dehe bhava bhaya haraṇam

analyzed: yā dravya pūrṇā dharitrī sā śarīre dhātu samūhaḥ viśuddhaḥ

analyzed: bāhya yau cakriṇaḥ putrau brahma asura īśau abhūtām pṛṣṭhatas ekakhaṇḍe dharmadeśakaḥ agratas grakhaṇḍe mleccha dharma kṣaya arthī

original: samañjuśrīrlokanāthastribhuvanavijayī tat svadehe rajo bodhicittaṃ sukhadamiti praṇidhānacittaṃ prasthānacittaṃ ca
analyzed: sa mañjuśrīḥ lokanāthaḥ tribhuvana vijayī tat sva dehe rajaḥ bodhi cittam sukha dam iti praṇidhāna cittam prasthāna cittam ca

original: pṛṣṭhe khaṇḍe ye brahmādivividhavaṃśāste svadehe anekabuddhā viśuddhāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanasvabhāvā iti mlecchendrayuddhaṃ bhavati hi niyataṃ dehināṃ dehamadhye
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe khaṇḍe ye brahma ādi vividha vaṃśāḥ te sva dehe aneka buddhāḥ viśuddhāḥ skandha dhātu āyatana svabhāvāḥ iti mleccha indra yuddham bhavati hi niyatam dehinām deha madhye

original: māyārūpaṃ tu bāhya khalu makhaviṣaye mlecchayuddha na yuddhamiti asya vistaro vakṣyamāṇe pañcamapaṭale paramākṣarajñānasiddhau vaktavya iti
analyzed: māyā rūpam tu khalu makha viṣaye mleccha yuddha na yuddham iti asya vistaraḥ vakṣyamāṇe pañcama paṭale parama akṣara jñāna siddhau vaktavyaḥ iti

original: idānīṃ madhyamā tripakṣaṃ trivarṣabhedaistrikulāditantrabhedaḥ samājādika ucyate kālābda ityādinā - kālābde vahnisaṃkhye'bdadinagaṇahate ṣaṭkulaṃ cāyanāṅkāt ṣaṭtriṃśanmāsabhedād rasaguṇitarasād yoginīnāṃ kulāni

original: vāracchedena labdhā prakaṭitaniyatā devatāḥ kālacako pakṣacchede'bhidhānaṃ bhavati narapate devatādevatībhiḥ || 51

original: iha kālābde madhyamā 'nāḍīvarṣe vahnisaṃkhye trivarṣasaṃkhye bdadinagaṇahate ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinairhate sati aśītyuttarasahasro dinagaṇo bhavati

original: tadeva trivarṣaṃ trikulaṃ kāyavāka citta kulavarṣabhedena sattvarajastamaḥ svabhāvamiti

analyzed: punar māsa bhedena tatas dina gaṇāt triṃśat bhāgena labdhāni ṣaṭtraṃśat kulāni bhavanti

analyzed: evam yoginīnām upāyānām iti

analyzed: śīti uttara sahasra dina gaṇāt vāra chedena labdhā prakaṭita niyatā devatā kālacakra māṇḍaleyā iti

original: catuḥpañcāśadadhikaśataṃ śeṣaṃ prajñopāyayugalam; evaṃ ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikaśataṃ kālacakram; sapta- bhāgāvaśeṣaṃ kulikāsthānādhidaivaṃ devatādevīcakraṃ kulikālakṣaṇamiti; punastasmāt pūrvadina- pratīyate;

original:
bho.

original: kālacakrādhipatimithunena sārddhaṃ dvāsaptatidevatādeva tīlakṣaṇamiti trivarṣabhederyoginītantraniyamaḥ

original: lokasaṃvṛtyā trikulaṣaṭ kulaṣaṭtriṃśatkulāni yoginītantra iti yoginītantraniyamaḥ
analyzed: loka saṃvṛtyā tri kula ṣaḍ kula ṣaṭtriṃśat kulāni yoginītantre iti yoginītantra niyamaḥ

original: māyājālaṃ dināṅgāstri vidhamapi bhavedrandhravedaiśca samyak bhūto bhūtārṇavaiḥ syācchikhijalanidhibhiḥ śrīsamājartubhedaḥ
analyzed: māyā jālam dina aṅgāḥ tri vidham api bhavet randhra vedaiḥ ca samyak bhūtaḥ bhūta arṇavaiḥ syāt śikhi jalanidhibhiḥ śrī samāja ṛtu bhedaḥ

original: tattvākhyaṃ ṣar̤abhirhīnaṃ tvaparamapi tayorardhabhedaivibhinno- bhūyo miśro dvibhedastridaśanavadiśābhiśca randhraḥ satattvaiḥ || 52

original: idānīṃ kriyāyoga- yogatantrāṇi triṣaṭprakārabhedenocyate tyādinā- iha madhyamātripakṣadināni pañcacatvāriṃśaddināni dvādaśaguṇitāni tāni
analyzed: idānīm kriyāyoga yogatantrāṇi tri ṣaṣ prakāra bhedena ucyate iha madhyamā tri pakṣa dināni pañcacatvāriṃśat dināni dvādaśa guṇitāni tāni

analyzed: tasmāt dina aṅgāt catvāriṃśat adhika pañcaśatāt māyā jālam bhavet bhavet

analyzed: aparam śikhi jalanidhibhiḥ trayaśva tvāriṃśadbhiḥ devatā yugmaiḥ iti

analyzed: atas dina aṅgāt saptatriṃśat adhika śata saṃkhyāḥ bhavanti dviguṇa devatā devyaḥ catuḥsaptati adhika dviśata saṃkhyāḥ bhavanti iti māyā jāla niyamaḥ

original: asya prapañcārthaḥ pañcamapaṭale vaktavya iti māyājālakriyāyogatantra- niyamaḥ

atra ye candrāṃśe pañcacatvāriṃśaddinagaṇāstasmād vārabhāgena ?

original: idānīṃ carcikādikamalapatradevya ucyante- sūryāṃśe dvātriṃśadbhāgena śvāsacakrāt pratidine ghaṭikādvayaṃ yallabdhaṃ māsasya madhye triṃśaddinaiḥ ṣaṣṭināḍyo bhavanti kulikārūpiṇyaḥ
analyzed: idānīm carcikā ādi kamala patra devyaḥ ucyante sūrya aṃśe dvātriṃśat bhāgena śvāsa cakrāt pratidine ghaṭikā dvayam yat labdham māsasya madhye triṃśat dinaiḥ ṣaṣṭi nāḍyaḥ bhavanti

original: yoginyastāḥ samastāstribhuvananilaye lagnamiśrā dviguṇyā sūryāṃśe'haḥ prabhinnaṃ dviguṇitamapi yad yoginīvṛndamaṃtra- piṇḍībhūtāḥ samastāstriguṇaravidināssābhidhānā bhavanti candre pakṣaprabhedo bhavati dinakare vargabhedaḥ samastaḥ ||55||

original: tadeva dvādaśalāsyā- dibhiḥ sahitaṃ dviguṇitamapi viṃśatyadhikasaptaśatasaṃkhyaṃ devatīvṛndaṃ bhavatīti

original: piṇḍībhūtāḥ samastā iti etā devyaḥ sābhidhānā dvāsaptatidevatābhiḥ sahitā mudrāṣaṭkena sārddhaṃ triguṇaravidinā trivarṣadinā aśītyuttarasahasrasaṃkhyā iti trivarṣadinagaṇasvabhāvā devatā- devyo veditavyā yoginītantre'[ itya]bhiprāyaḥ
analyzed: piṇḍībhūtāḥ samastāḥ iti etāḥ devyaḥ sa abhidhānāḥ dvāsaptati devatābhiḥ sahitāḥ mudrā ṣaṭkena sārddham triguṇa ravi dinā tri varṣa dinā aśīti uttara sahasra saṃkhyāḥ iti tri varṣa

analyzed: yena jñātam sva dehe sa śrīmān mañjuvajraḥ bhava bhaya mathanaḥ janmani iha eva buddhaḥ

analyzed: yathā sarva grahāṇām tathā adhyātmani kāya vāc citta jñāne ṣaṣ indriya dharmāṇām iti

original: yena jñātaṃ svadehe
analyzed: yena jñātam sva dehe

original: evamukta- kramaiṇa prajñopāyātmakaṃ yenādibuddhaṃ (iti) svadehe jñātam

original: dinaniśisamayaiḥ sandhyā praharādi- bhedaiḥ māsasaṃkrāntibhedairdvādaśabhiḥ sa yogī śrīmān mañjuvajo bhavabhayamathano janmanīhaiva buddha iti laghutantra mūlatantradevatotpādaniyamaḥ
analyzed: dina niśi samayaiḥ sandhyā prahara ādi bhedaiḥ māsa saṃkrānti bhedaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ sa yogī śrīmān mañjuvajaḥ bhava bhaya mathanaḥ janmani iha eva buddhaḥ iti laghutantra mūlatantra devatā utpāda

original: triśadbhāgena tasmāt triguṇitaniyatā devatāḥ kālacakre uṣṇīṣe dvi: hṛdo'ṣṭau śirasi nṛpatayo dantasaṃkhyā ca kaṇṭhe nābhau cāṣṭāṣṭaguṇyā, dviguṇanṛpatayo guhyamadhye prasiddhāḥ || 57 ||
analyzed: triśat bhāgena tasmāt tri guṇita niyatāḥ devatāḥ kālacakre uṣṇīṣe dvi hṛdaḥ ṣṭau śirasi nṛpatayaḥ danta saṃkhyā ca kaṇṭhe nābhau ca aṣṭa aṣṭa guṇyāḥ dviguṇa

original: iha paramādibuddhāt viṃśatyadhikaṣoḍaśaśatāt triśadbhāgena labdhāḥ catupañcāśad- devatā bhavantīti
analyzed: iha parama ādibuddhāt viṃśati adhika ṣoḍaśa śatāt triśat bhāgena labdhāḥ catupañcāśat devatāḥ bhavanti iti

original: punaḥ kāyavākcittaguṇitāstriguṇā dvāṣaṣṭyadhikaśataṃ bhavati
analyzed: punar kāya vāc citta guṇitāḥ triguṇāḥ dvāṣaṣṭi adhika śatam bhavati

analyzed: eṣu māṇḍaleyāḥ catuḥpañcāśat adhika śata saṃkhyāḥ śam prajñopāya yugmam mudrā ṣaṭka iti

original: kālacakraṃ paramādibuddhānnirgataṃ daśabhāgeneḍādisaṃ ( śaṃ) khinyantanāḍībhedeneti bāhya neyārthamiti laghukālacakraniyamaḥ
analyzed: kālacakram parama ādi buddhāt nirgatam daśa bhāgena iḍā ādi sam śam khinī anta nāḍī bhedena iti laghu kālacakra niyamaḥ

original: iha śarīre trikulanāḍyastisraḥ kāya vākcittavindudhāriṇyaḥ, nābhau guhyavajra- maṇāviti tathā ṣaṭkulanāḍyo lalanā - rasanā avadhūtī - viṇmūtra - śukravāhinya iti
analyzed: iha śarīre tri kula nāḍyaḥ tisraḥ kāya vāc citta vindu dhāriṇyaḥ nābhau guhya vajra maṇau iti tathā ṣaṣ kula nāḍyaḥ lalanā rasanā avadhūtī viṣ mūtra śukra vāhinyaḥ iti

original: tathā ṣaṭtriṃśat kulanāḍyaḥ uṣṇīṣādiṣaṭcakranāḍyaḥ ṣaṭ, dve śabdagrāhiṇyo, dve sparśa- grāhiṇyau, dve rasagrāhiṇyau, dve rūpagrāhiṇyo dve gandhagrāhiṇyo; etā daśa- nāḍyaḥ

original: nābhicakramadhye'paramaṇḍaleṣu dvādaśasaṃkrāntināḍyaḥ, aṣṭapraharanāḍyaḥ
analyzed: nābhi cakra madhye para maṇḍaleṣu dvādaśa saṃkrānti nāḍyaḥ aṣṭa prahara nāḍyaḥ

original: evaṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat kulanāyikā bhavanti - ṣaḍ rasarūpiṇyaḥ, ṣaḍ dhāturūpiṇyaḥ, ṣaḍindriyarūpiṇyaḥ, ṣaḍaviṣayarūpiṇya, ṣaṭ karmendriyarūpiṇyaḥ, ṣaṭ karmendriyaviṣayarūpiṇyaḥ, evaṃ ṣaḍ rūpapravartinyaḥ paṭale ] cakravatti mlecchayuddha kālacakrakulatantra nāḍīkulotpatti-mahoddeśaḥ ṣaṭ vedanāpravartinyaḥ, ṣaṭ saṃjñāpravartinyaḥ, ṣaṭ saṃskārapravartanyaḥ, ṣaḍ vijñānapravartinyaḥ, ṣaḍ jñānapravartanya iti ṣaṭtriṃśat kulanāḍyo'pyādhārādheyasambandhena dvāsaptatiriti jñeyāḥ
analyzed: evam sarvāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat kula nāyikāḥ bhavanti ṣaḍ rasa rūpiṇyaḥ ṣaḍ dhātu rūpiṇyaḥ ṣaḍ indriya rūpiṇyaḥ ṣaṣ aviṣaya rūpiṇyaḥ ṣaḍ karmendriya rūpiṇyaḥ ṣaḍ karmendriya

original: - tathāha — kālacakranāḍyaḥ uṣṇīṣe'dviriti caturdalarūpiṇyaḥ, catasra' 'ścatuḥ sandhyā- prarvartinyaḥ
analyzed: tathā āha kālacakra nāḍyaḥ uṣṇīṣe dvis iti catur dala rūpiṇyaḥ catasraḥ catuḥ sandhyā prarvartinyaḥ

original: hṛdo'ṣṭau nāḍyo rohiṇyādayaḥ samānādīnāmādhārabhūtāḥ
analyzed: hṛdaḥ ṣṭau nāḍyaḥ rohiṇī ādayaḥ samāna ādīnām ādhāra bhūtāḥ

original: pratyahaṃ praharabhedena vārāṣṭrakavāhinyaḥ
analyzed: pratyaham prahara bhedena vārāṣṭraka vāhinyaḥ

original: atrādha ūrdhvaṃ dvināḍyorādheyo vāyuriti

original: śirasi nṛpatayaḥ ṣoḍaśa- tithipravartinyaḥ

original: dantasaṃkhyā ca kaṇṭha iti kaṇṭhacakre aṣṭāviṃśati nakṣatrāṇi catvāri daṇḍanakṣatra pravartinyo dvātriṃśaditi

original: nābhau nābhikamale rāśināḍikābāhye ghaṭīnāḍyaḥ aṣṭābhiraṣṭaguṇitāścatuḥṣaṣṭināḍyaḥ ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalavāhinyaścatuḥ śūnyapravāhinyaḥ catuḥṣaṣṭi- daṇḍa pravartinya iti
analyzed: nābhau nābhi kamale rāśi nāḍikā bāhye ghaṭī nāḍyaḥ aṣṭābhiḥ aṣṭa guṇitāḥ catuḥṣaṣṭi nāḍyaḥ ṣaṣṭi maṇḍala vāhinyaḥ catuḥ śūnya pravāhinyaḥ catuḥṣaṣṭi daṇḍa

original: dviguṇanṛpataya iti
analyzed: dviguṇa nṛpataye iti

original: dvātriṃśadguhyamadhye guhyakamalanāḍyaḥ śukrādi- dvātriṃśaddhātupravartanya iti
analyzed: dvātriṃśat guhya madhye guhya kamala nāḍyaḥ śukra ādi dvātriṃśat dhātu pravartanyaḥ iti

original: ṣaṇṇāḍyaścakrarodhā daśaviṣayaharāḥ sannipātasvabhāvā bhūyo bhūyo dviguṇyāḥ punarapi guṇitāḥ śleṣmapittānilāṃśāḥ
analyzed: ṣaṇṇāḍyaḥ cakra rodhāḥ daśa viṣaya harāḥ sannipāta svabhāvāḥ bhūyas bhūyas dvi guṇyāḥ punar api guṇitāḥ śleṣma pitta anila aṃśāḥ

original: etā vai mṛtyunāḍyo guruniyamavaśādāyurārogyadāśca ṣaṭcakra e vāyunāḍyo maraṇabhayaharā yogināṃ nātra citram || 58 ||

original: eṣu ṣaṭ nāḍyaḥ ṣaṭ cakrarodhā bhavanti; daśa viṣayahāriṇyo bhavanti

analyzed: tāḥ sannipāta svabhāvāḥ iti tāḥ punar dvaguṇyāḥ śleṣma aṃśāḥ viṃśatiḥ bhūyas dviguṇyā pitta aṃśāḥ catvāriṃśat bhavanti punar api anila aṃśāḥ tā śītiḥ bhavanti iti

original: etā vai mṛtyunāḍyo guru- niyamavaśādāyurārogyadāśca
analyzed: etāḥ vai mṛtyunāḍyaḥ guru niyama vaśāt āyuḥ ārogya dāḥ ca

original: ṣaṭcakre kālanāḍya uktā maraṇabhayaharā gurūpadeśena bhāvitāḥ satyo yogināṃ nātra citramiti
analyzed: ṣaṭcakre kālanāḍyaḥ uktāḥ maraṇa bhaya harāḥ guru upadeśena bhāvitāḥ satyaḥ yoginām na atra citram iti

original: uṣṇīṣe'bdhirlalāṭe jaladhihatayugāḥ śleṣmadhātuprakopāḥ kaṇṭhe dantā hṛdabje nayanahatayugāḥ pittadhātuprakopāḥ
analyzed: uṣṇīṣe bdhiḥ lalāṭe jaladhi hata yugāḥ śleṣma dhātu prakopāḥ kaṇṭhe dantāḥ hṛd abje nayana hata yugāḥ pitta dhātu prakopāḥ

original: nābhau guhye'bdhiṣaṣṭirnṛpatirapi tathā vāyudhātuprakopā guhye'nyādiṣaṭkaṃ prakaṭitaniyatāḥ sannipātā nirodhāḥ || 59 ||

original: uṣṇīṣe'bdhiścatasraḥ jaladhihatayugā iti ṣoḍaśa lalāṭe, etā viṃśati nāḍyaḥ śleṣmadhātuprakopā iti

original: kaṇṭhe dantā iti dvātriṃśannāḍyaḥ

analyzed: hṛd abje nayana hata yugāḥ iti aṣṭa nāḍyaḥ etāḥ catvāriśat nāḍyaḥ pitta dhātu prakopāḥ iti nābhau ca guhyam ca yathāsaṃkhyam abdhiṣaṣṭiḥ iti catuḥṣaṣṭi nāḍyaḥ

original: nṛpatirapi guhyakamale bāhye parimaṇle nāḍyaḥ ṣoḍaśa, etā aśīti nāḍyo vāyudhātuprakoṣā iti
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ api guhya kamale bāhye parimaṇle nāḍyaḥ ṣoḍaśa etāḥ aśīti nāḍyaḥ vāyu dhātu prakoṣāḥ iti

original: evaṃ ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikaśatakālacakranāḍyo devatādevatīsvabhāvenāvasthitā bālānāṃ mṛtyudāyikāḥ, yogināṃ sukhadāyikāḥ ṣaḍkula- nāḍībhiḥ sārddhaṃ bhāvitāḥ satyaḥ; dvāṣaṣṭyadhikaśataṃ kālacakraṃ ṣaṭcakranāḍyātmakamiti
analyzed: evam ṣaṭpañcāśat adhika śata kālacakra nāḍyaḥ devatā devatī svabhāvena avasthitāḥ bālānām mṛtyu dāyikāḥ yoginām sukha dāyikāḥ ṣaṣ kula nāḍībhiḥ sārddham bhāvitāḥ satyaḥ dvāṣaṣṭi

original: tāsu punardvāṣaṣṭyadhikaśatanāḍīṣu pratyekanāḍī daśavāyupracāreṇa skandhadhātudaśasvabhāvena daśavidhā bhavanti
analyzed: tāsu punar dvāṣaṣṭi adhika śata nāḍīṣu pratyeka nāḍī daśa vāyu pracāreṇa skandha dhātu daśa svabhāvena daśavidhāḥ bhavanti

original: evaṃ sarvā daśaguṇitā viṃśatyadhikaṣoḍaśaśatasaṃkhyā bhavanti saptāviṃśanna- kṣatraghaṭikāvāhinyaḥ
analyzed: evam sarvāḥ daśa guṇitāḥ viṃśati adhika ṣoḍaśa śata saṃkhyāḥ bhavanti saptāviṃśat na kṣatra ghaṭikā vāhinyaḥ

original: evaṃ śrīmānnakṣatramaṇḍalaparamādibuddhe etāvatyo devatyaḥ prajñopāye- neti'
analyzed: evam śrīmān nakṣatra maṇḍala parama ādi buddhe etāvatyaḥ devatyaḥ prajñā upāye na iti

original: ato vistarānnakṣatramaṇḍalāllokasaṃvṛtyā śleṣmādidhātuvāhinyo devatā laukikasiddhisādhanāya ca śarīrasiddhisādhanāya vā mañjuśriyoddhṛtāḥ ṣaṭcakranāyikā iti kālacakranāḍī saṃkara niyamaḥ
analyzed: atas vistarāt nakṣatra maṇḍalāt loka saṃvṛtyā śleṣma ādi dhātu vāhinyaḥ devatāḥ laukika siddhi sādhanāya ca śarīra siddhi sādhanāya vā mañjuśriyā uddhṛtāḥ ṣaṭcakranāyikāḥ iti kāla

original: ṣaṇṇāḍyaścaka rodhāstrividhapathagatāścandrasūryāgnibhedai- dehe tā rakṣaṇīyā: guruniyamavaśānmṛtyudāḥ prāṇināṃ yāḥ
analyzed: rodhāḥ trividha patha gatāḥ candra sūrya agni bhedaiḥ dehe tāḥ rakṣaṇīyāḥ guru niyama vaśāt mṛtyu dāḥ prāṇinām yāḥ

original: ṣaṭsu prāṇapraveśo yadi bhavati nṛṇāṃ mṛtyuhānistadā vai sūkṣmāyāṃ na praviṣṭe hyamaraṇa viṣayaśchidyate yogibhiśca || 60 ||
analyzed: ṣaṭsu prāṇapraveśaḥ yadi bhavati nṛṇām mṛtyu hāniḥ tadā vai sūkṣmāyām na praviṣṭe hi amaraṇa viṣayaḥ chidyate yogibhiḥ ca

original: iha śarīre yāḥ ṣaḍ nāḍyaścakrarodhā uktāstrividhapathagatāścandrasūrya rāhuvāma- dakṣiṇamadhyapathagatāḥ ūrdhvamadhoviṇmūtraśukrapathagatāścandrasūryāgnibhedeneti
analyzed: iha śarīre yāḥ ṣaḍ nāḍyaḥ cakra rodhāḥ uktāḥ trividha patha gatāḥ candra sūrya rāhu vāma dakṣiṇa madhya patha gatāḥ ūrdhvam adhas viṣ mūtra śukra patha gatāḥ candra sūrya agni

original:
dehe tā rakṣaṇīyā yoginā; kutaḥ ?
guruniyamavaśāditi
analyzed: dehe tāḥ rakṣaṇīyāḥ yoginā kutas guru niyama vaśāt iti

original: guruniyamaḥ ṣaḍaṅgayogaḥ, tena maraṇād rakṣaṇīyā mṛtyudāḥ prāṇināṃ yāḥ ṣaṇṇamāsāṃ prāṇapraveśa iti
analyzed: guru niyamaḥ ṣaḍaṅga yogaḥ tena maraṇāt rakṣaṇīyāḥ mṛtyu dāḥ prāṇinām yāḥ ṣaṇṇamāsām prāṇapraveśe iti

original: ṣaṭsu prāṇapraveśo yadi bhavati nṛṇāṃ sarvakālaṃ mṛtyuhānistadā vai ekāntameṣu ṣaṭsu madhye sūkṣmā'vadhūtī madhyamā, tasyāṃ sūkṣmāyāṃ prāṇe na praviṣṭe sati hyamaraṇaviṣayaḥ cchidyate yogibhiśca; api tuna cchidyate maraṇaviṣaya iti
analyzed: ṣaṭsu prāṇa praveśaḥ yadi bhavati nṛṇām sarvakālam mṛtyu hāniḥ tadā vai ekāntameṣu ṣaṭsu madhye sūkṣmā vadhūtī madhyamā tasyām sūkṣmāyām prāṇe na praviṣṭe sati hi amaraṇa

original: dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ athyātmani cakravattamlecchayuddha - kālacakrakulatantra nāḍīkulotpatti-mahoddeśaḥ (4) ariṣṭamaraṇalakṣa nāḍīccheda-mahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ dehināmakālamaraṇalakṣaṇamucyate prāṇa ityādinā - prāṇo yadyekanāḍyāṃ vahati dinaniśaṃ jīvitaṃ kālavarṣam avyucchinnaikapakṣaṃ vahati yadi nṛṇāṃ jīvitaṃ sārddhavarṣam
analyzed: dvādaśa sāhasrikāyām athi ātmani mahā uddeśaḥ ariṣṭa maraṇa lakṣa nāḍī cheda mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm dehinām akāla maraṇa lakṣaṇam ucyate prāṇaḥ ityādinā prāṇaḥ yadi eka nāḍyām

original: tṛtīyaḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ

original: peṭale ].
ariṣṭamaraṇalakṣaṇa- nāḍīccheda-mahoddeśaḥ avyucchinnaikamāsaṃ vahati narapate jīvitaṃ ca trimāsaṃ evaṃ yogī svedehe śaśigatimaraṇaṃ jñāyate kālacakra || 61 ||
analyzed: ariṣṭa maraṇa lakṣaṇa nāḍīccheda mahā uddeśaḥ avyucchinna eka māsam vahati narapate jīvitam ca tri māsam evam yogī sveda dehe śaśi gati maraṇam jñāyate kālacakra

original: iha śarīre nābhicakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ rāśicakraṃ meṣādiviṣamalagnātmakamekāntaritam
analyzed: iha śarīre nābhi cakram dvādaśa aram rāśi cakram meṣa ādi viṣama lagna ātmakam eka antaritam

original: evaṃ vṛṣabhādisamalagnātmakamekāntaritaṃ dalam
analyzed: evam vṛṣabha ādi sama lagna ātmakam eka antaritam dalam

original: tasmādekottareṇa ṣaṭviṃśatsaptaviṃśaddināni daśakam aṣṭame navame daśame rāśau rohate prāṇaḥ tataḥ ekādaśe tryuttaraṃ māsaṃ bhavati samā varṣā'riṣṭadināvaśeṣā rāśicakre janmarāśyādiṣu dvādaśarāśiṣu trinayanaśaśinaḥ janmarāśau trivarṣā ariṣṭadināvaśeṣā dvitīye dvivarṣam tṛtīye varṣa mekamiti samāriṣṭadināvaśeṣā jīvitasya tataḥ ṣaṭtriyugmendavo ye iti caturtharāśau ṣaṇmāsāste, pañcame trayo māsāḥ, ṣaṣṭhe māsadvayam saptame'riṣṭadināvaśeṣamāsamekaṃ jīvitasya tato janmasthānāt saptamasthānaṃ pauṣṇaṃ garbhajānāmādhānamāsaṃ makaraḥ tasmāt saptamaṃ prāṇajanmamāsaṃ kakaṭeścandranāḍīvṛddhiparityāgāt dvādaśarāśyante punarmakaro bhavati, trayodaśamāso garbhādhānāditi ataḥ karkaṭaḥ prāṇasya janmasthānaṃ na sūryasyaiveti tata udayati tasmājjanmano makarodaye saptame rāśyudaye sūryasyāstamanaṃ nāma pauṣṇa kāla tasmāt kālāt prāṇo'vaivartiko bhavati, śarīre sthirīkartuṃ na śakyate devāsurairmanuṣyaiḥ rātribhāge candrodayakāla iti candrodayo nāma śukradhātau mṛtyupraveśa iti mṛtyurudayo' na śukradhātoriti, ariṣṭavāyupraveśāditi tataḥ pauṣṇakālāt śukrakṣayārthaṃ trayastriṃśaddināni prāṇo rohate dakṣiṇanāḍyām tato dinadvayaṃ vāmanāḍyām, dinamekaṃ madhyamānāḍyāmiti ahāni śeṣāḥ, tithi pañcadaśa, digiti daśa, iṣuḥ pañca, guṇā iti trayaḥ, dvi iti dve, ekadinaṃ jīvitasyeti sūryāriṣṭa ekavyākhyānaniyamaḥ idānīṃ dvitīyavyākhyānamucyate svasthānādityādinā - svasthānād rāśicakraṃ tyajati parakalā hāniśeṣaiśca tulye- varṣairmāsaidinaiśca trinayanaśaśibhiḥ ṣaṭtriyugmendubhiśca pauṣṇād vai hāni tulyaistithidiśi ṣu guṇaiḥ kaṇikāyāṃ praviṣṭe tridbhidinānte bhavati dinakarāriṣṭayogena mṛtyuḥ || 63 ||
analyzed: tasmāt eka uttareṇa ṣaṭviṃśat saptaviṃśat dināni daśakam aṣṭame navame daśame rāśau rohate prāṇaḥ tatas ekādaśe tri uttaram māsam bhavati samāḥ varṣāḥ riṣṭa dina avaśeṣā rāśi garbha jānām ādhāna māsam makaraḥ tasmāt saptamam prāṇa janma māsam kakaṭeḥ candranāḍī vṛddhi parityāgāt dvādaśa rāśi ante punar makaraḥ bhavati trayodaśa māsaḥ garbhādhānāt iti atas ariṣṭa vāyu praveśāt iti tatas pauṣṇa kālāt śukra kṣaya artham trayastriṃśat dināni prāṇaḥ rohate dakṣiṇa nāḍyām tatas dina dvayam vāma nāḍyām dinam ekam madhyamā nāḍyām iti ahāni praviṣṭe tridbhi dina ante bhavati dinakara ariṣṭa yogena mṛtyuḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ iha śarīre nābhikamale dvādaśanāḍyātyakaṃ rāśicakram tatra janmasthānaṃ prathama rāśināḍīgarbhotpādasya bālakasya yallagnaṃ tadeva vṛṣabhādikaṃ samanāḍīsvabhāvam tasmāt svasthānād rāśicakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ nāḍīcakraṃ ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalātmakaṃ tyajati parakalā prāṇaśaktiḥ hāniśeṣaiśca tulyairiti hānirārohaṇadivasāḥ pañca daśa pañcadaśa pañcaviṃśatiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ saptaviṃśatiriti hāniḥ śeṣāstrivarṣā, dvau varṣo ekavarṣaṃ ṣaṇmāsāḥ trimāsa dvau māsau māsamekamiti hāniśeśa stairhāniśeṣaiḥ prathamaṃ patrādikaṃ yāvat saptanāḍīpatraṃ tāvat kramo varṣairmāsairiti trinayanaśaśibhivarṣairnāḍītrayaṃ tyajati, ṣaṭtriyu- gmendubhirmāsaiḥ saptanāḍīṃ tyajati dinaiśca pauṣṇāt vai hānitulyaiḥ pauṣṇakālāvadherjanma-
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām iha śarīre nābhi kamale rāśi cakram tatra janma sthānam rāśi nāḍī garbha utpādasya bālakasya yat lagnam tat eva vṛṣabha ādikam sama nāḍī svabhāvam tasmāt sva sthānāt patra ādikam yāvat sapta nāḍī patram tāvat kramaḥ varṣaiḥ māsaiḥ iti tri nayana śaśibhiḥ varṣaiḥ nāḍī trayam tyajati ṣaṣ tri yugma indubhiḥ māsaiḥ sapta nāḍīm tyajati dinaiḥ ca

original: sthānāt saptamo'rkasyāstamanakālo rajasa iti tasmāt pauṣṇāt tulyairā- rohaṇāyurdine rāśināḍīparityāgaḥ prāṇaśakteḥ tithiḥ pañcadaśadinaiḥ, dik daśadinairiṣuḥ pañcadineguṇairiti tribhirdinairebhistrayastriṃśaddinaṃ raṣṭamīnāḍīṃ navamīnāḍīṃ daśamīnāḍī- mekādaśīśca rāśināḍīṃ pañcamaṇḍalavāhinīṃ sūryapravāheṇa tyajati
analyzed: sthānāt saptamaḥ rkasya astamana kālaḥ rajasaḥ iti tasmāt pauṣṇāt tulyaiḥ ā rohaṇa āyuḥ dine rāśi nāḍī parityāgaḥ prāṇa śakteḥ tithiḥ pañcadaśa dinaiḥ diś daśa dinaiḥ iṣuḥ

original: ekadakṣiṇanāḍīpravāheṇa dvādaśamī dinadvayena vāmanāḍyāṃ madhyamā yāmekadineneti kaṇikāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: eka dakṣiṇa nāḍī pravāheṇa dvādaśamī dina dvayena vāma nāḍyām madhyamā yām eka dinena iti kaṇikāyām praviṣṭaḥ

original: evaṃ ṣoṣṇāt ṣaṭtraṃśaddinairbhavati dinakarāriṣṭayogena mṛtyurnarāṇāmiti dvitīya- pūrve vāṇāgnilokaṃ tyajati
analyzed: evam ṣoṣṇāt ṣaṭtraṃśat dinaiḥ bhavati dinakara ariṣṭa yogena mṛtyuḥ narāṇām iti dvitīya pūrve vāṇa agni lokam tyajati

original: dinagaṇaṃ sūryavarṣatrayasya tasmāt sārohaṇaṃ ve śarayugaśikhinaṃ khāgnicandraṃ tṛtīye netrāhiśelavāṇaṃ vasukaramaparaṃ saptame vasukaramaparaṃ saptame rohaṇaṃ ca tasmāt tithyādisarvaṃ dinagaṇamapi yat kaṇikā yāvadeva || 64 ||
analyzed: dina gaṇam sūrya varṣa trayasya tasmāt sa ārohaṇam śara yuga śikhinam kha agni candram tṛtīye netra ahi śelavāṇam vasu karam aparam saptame vasu karam aparam saptame rohaṇam ca tasmāt tithi ādi

original: idānī patrāt patre trivarṣād dinatyāga ucyate pūrvaṃ ityādinā - iha rāśicakre janmalagnanāḍī pūrvaṃ ityucyate tasmin janmalagnapatre aśītyuttara- sahasradinagaṇāt madhye vāṇāgnilokamiti pañcatriṃśadadhikatriṃśaddinagaṇaṃ tyajati triva- rṣebhyaḥ
analyzed: idānīm patrāt patre tri varṣāt dina tyāgaḥ ucyate pūrvam ityādinā iha rāśi cakre janma lagna nāḍī pūrvam iti ucyate tasmin janma lagna pattre aśīti uttara sahasra dina gaṇāt madhye

original: tatastatpatraṃ śūnyīkṛtya dvitīyapatre avaśeṣadinagaṇaṃ gṛhītvā prāṇaśaktiḥ praviśati,
analyzed: tatas tat patram śūnyīkṛtya dvitīya patre avaśeṣa dina gaṇam gṛhītvā prāṇaśaktiḥ praviśati

original: tasmād dinagaṇāt sārohaṇaṃ pūrvādaparapatrarohaṇadinairdaśabhiḥ sārddhaṃ śarayugaśikhinamiti pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatadinagaṇaṃ tyajati dvitīyapatre
analyzed: tasmāt dina gaṇāt sa ārohaṇam pūrvāt apara patra rohaṇa dinaiḥ daśabhiḥ sārddham śara yuga śikhinam iti pañcacatvāriṃśat adhika triśata dina gaṇam tyajati dvitīya patre

original: tato'vaśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā tṛtīyapatre praviśati, dvitīyaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tatas gṛhītvā tṛtīya patre praviśati dvitīyam śūnyam bhavati

original: punastatraiva pañcadaśārohaṇādinaiḥ sārddhaṃ saptatyadhikaśatadinaṃ tṛtīyapatre tyajati
analyzed: punar tatra eva pañcadaśa ārohaṇā dinaiḥ sārddham saptati adhika śata dinam tṛtīya patre tyajati

original: avaśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā caturthe praviśati, tṛtīyaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam gṛhītvā caturthe praviśati tṛtīyam śūnyam bhavati

original: tato viṃśa- tyārohaṇādinaiḥ sārddhaṃ netrāhiriti dvayaśītidinagaṇaṃ tyajati caturthapatre
analyzed: tatas viṃśa ti ārohaṇā dinaiḥ sārddham netra ahiḥ iti dvayaśīti dina gaṇam tyajati caturtha patre

original: avaśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā pañcame praviśati, caturthaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam gṛhītvā pañcame praviśati caturtham śūnyam bhavati

original: punaḥ pañcaviṃśatyārohaṇadinaiḥ sārddhaṃ śelavāṇaṃ saptapañcāśaddinagaṇaṃ tyajati pañcame patre
analyzed: punar pañcaviṃśati ārohaṇa dinaiḥ sārddham śelavāṇam saptapañcāśat dina gaṇam tyajati pañcame patre

original: avaśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā ṣaṣṭhe praviśati, pañcamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam gṛhītvā ṣaṣṭhe praviśati pañcamam śūnyam bhavati

original: punaḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyārohaṇadinaiḥ sārddhaṃ aṣṭāviṃśatidinagaṇaṃ tyajati ṣaṣṭhe patre tataḥ saptame patre praviśati, ṣaṣṭhaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: punar ṣaḍviṃśati ārohaṇa dinaiḥ sārddham aṣṭāviṃśati dina gaṇam tyajati ṣaṣṭhe patre tatas saptame patre praviśati ṣaṣṭham śūnyam bhavati

original: tataḥ saptame rohaṇaṃ saptaviṃśatidina- gaṇa tyajati
analyzed: tatas saptame rohaṇam saptaviṃśati dina gaṇa tyajati

original: avaśeṣaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaddinagaṇaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭame patre praviśati, saptamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam ṣaṭtriṃśat dina gaṇam gṛhītvā aṣṭame patre praviśati saptamam śūnyam bhavati

original: tato'ṣṭame pañcadaśadinaṃ tyajati
analyzed: tatas ṣṭame pañcadaśa dinam tyajati

original: avaśeṣamekaviśaddinaṃ gṛhītatvā navame pravi- śati, aṣṭamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam ekaviśat dinam navame pravi śati aṣṭamam śūnyam bhavati

original: tato navame daśadinaṃ tyajati
analyzed: tatas navame daśa dinam tyajati

original: avaśeṣamekādaśadinaṃ gṛhītvā daśame praviśati, navamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam ekādaśa dinam gṛhītvā daśame praviśati navamam śūnyam bhavati

original: tato daśame pañcadinaṃ tyajati
analyzed: tatas daśame pañca dinam tyajati

original: avaśeṣaṃ ṣaḍdinaṃ gṛhītvā ekādaśe praviśati, daśamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam ṣaṣ dinam gṛhītvā ekādaśe praviśati daśamam śūnyam bhavati

original: tatra dinatrayaṃ tyajati
analyzed: tatra dina trayam tyajati

original: avaśeṣaṃ dinatrayaṃ gṛhītvā dvādaśame praviśati, ekādaśamaṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam dina trayam gṛhītvā dvādaśame praviśati ekādaśamam śūnyam bhavati

original: tatra dinadvayaṃ tyajati
analyzed: tatra dina dvayam tyajati

original: avaśeṣaṃ dina- mekaṃ gṛhītvā kaṇikāyāṃ praviśati, dvādaśamaṃ nāḍīrāśipatraṃ śūnyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: avaśeṣam dinam ekam gṛhītvā kaṇikāyām praviśati dvādaśamam nāḍī rāśi patram śūnyam bhavati

original: evamaśītyu- ttarasahasrasaṃkhyaiḥ sūryasya madhyamātrivarṣadinaiḥ prāṇaśaktirdvādaśāraṃ rāśicakraṃ tyajati
analyzed: evam aśīti uttara sahasra saṃkhyaiḥ sūryasya madhyamā tri varṣa dinaiḥ prāṇaśaktiḥ dvādaśa aram rāśi cakram tyajati

original: tataḥ kaṇikāyāṃ dinamekaṃ madhyamā vahati
analyzed: tatas kaṇikāyām dinam ekam madhyamā vahati

original: tataḥ śvāsacakraṃ tyaktvā vijñānaṃ prāṇavāyunā sārddhamanyatra ṣaḍgatau saṃkramaṇaṃ karoti, iti sūryasyāriṣṭaniyamaḥ
analyzed: tatas śvāsa cakram tyaktvā vijñānam prāṇa vāyunā sārddham anyatra ṣaṣ gatau saṃkramaṇam karoti iti sūryasya ariṣṭa niyamaḥ

original: atra nyāsaḥ pūrvanyāsavat dvipuṭe varṣabhedena dinatyāgabhedeneti pūrvapuṭe ariṣṭadi- nanyāso'parapuṭe'vaśeṣāyurdinanyāsaḥ dvitīyacakre dinatyāganyāsaḥ, pūrvapatreṣu krameṇa śūnya nyāsa iti sūryāriṣṭadakṣiṇanāḍyāṃ samalagne jātānāṃ viṣamalagne jātānāṃ candrāriṣṭa- malpāyūnām, iti sūryāriṣṭaniyamaḥ
analyzed: atra nyāsaḥ pūrva nyāsa vat dvi puṭe varṣa bhedena dina tyāga bhedena iti pūrva puṭe ariṣṭa di para puṭe dvitīya cakre dina tyāga nyāsaḥ pūrva patreṣu krameṇa nyāsaḥ iti sūryāriṣṭa

original: idānīṃ madhyamāriṣṭaṃ kālābdakrameṇa sūryasya yad bālajanai stīrthikairuktasattvānāṃ vyāmohajanakaṃ varṣaśatāvadhestasya pratiṣedha ucyate- iha tīrthikaiḥ kilocyate dakṣiṇanāḍyāṃ pañcanāḍīpravāheṇa va rṣaśatamāyuḥ, ṣaṣṭhanāḍīpravāheṇa navativarṣāṇyāyuḥ, saptanāḍīpravāheṇāśītivarṣāṇyāyuḥ, aṣṭanāḍīpravāheṇa pañcāśadvarṣāṇyāyuḥ, navanāḍīpravāheṇa trayastriṃśadvarṣāṇyāyuḥ, daśanāḍīpravāheṇa ṣaḍvi- śaḍvarṣāṇyāyuḥ, pañcadaśanāḍīpravāheṇa caturdaśavarṣāṇyāyuḥ, triśannāḍīpravāheṇa dvādaśa- varṣāṇyāyuḥ, ahorātrapravāheṇa daśavarṣāṇyāyuḥ, dvidinapravāheṇāṣṭavarṣāṇyāyuḥ, tridinapravāheṇa ṣaḍvarṣāṇyāyuḥ, caturdinapravāheṇa pañcavarṣāṇyāyuriti; tataḥ pañcadinapravāheṇa trivarṣāṇyāyu- riti tīthikānāṃ nāḍīśvāsaniyamaḥ dakṣiṇamārge |
analyzed: idānīm madhyamāriṣṭam kāla abda krameṇa sūryasya yat bāla janaiḥ tīrthikaiḥ ukta sattvānām vyāmoha janakam varṣa śata avadheḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate iha tīrthikaiḥ kila ucyate dakṣiṇa daśa varṣāṇi āyuḥ dvi dina pravāheṇa aṣṭa varṣāṇi āyuḥ tri dina pravāheṇa ṣaṣ varṣāṇi āyuḥ catur dina pravāheṇa pañca varṣāṇi āyuḥ iti tatas pañca dina pravāheṇa tri

original: sa eva na ghaṭate yuktyā vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvajñoktyā
analyzed: saḥ eva na ghaṭate yuktyā vicāryamāṇaḥ sarvajña uktyā

original: iha narāṇāmariṣṭābhāve vāma- dakṣiṇanāḍyāṃ pañca sameṣu viṣameṣu lagneṣu pañca daṇḍāni prāṇavāyurvahati
analyzed: iha narāṇām ariṣṭa abhāve dakṣiṇa nāḍyām pañca sameṣu viṣameṣu lagneṣu pañca daṇḍāni prāṇa vāyuḥ vahati

original: varṣaśatāyuṣaḥ puruṣasya prāṇasya vāme savye saptavarṣāṇi śvāsavṛddhirayanabhedena, tataḥ ṣaṣṭivarṣāṇi pāṇīpala- vṛddhirayanavṛddhibhedena, tatastriśadvarṣāṇi nāḍīvṛddhistrimāsabhedena tatastrivarṣatripakṣāṇi dinabhedena vṛddhiriti kālavṛddhinyāyaḥ
analyzed: varṣa śata āyuṣaḥ puruṣasya prāṇasya vāme savye sapta varṣāṇi śvāsa vṛddhiḥ ayana bhedena tatas ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi pāṇī pala vṛddhiḥ ayana vṛddhi bhedena tatas triśat varṣāṇi nāḍī

original: ato nyāyāt yasyākālamaraṇaṃ bhavati garbhotpādā- dvālasya trivarṣaiḥ pañcavarṣairvā dvā' daśavarṣervā viṃśatyādibhirvā maraṇam, tasya pañcanāḍyupari ṣaṭsaptādināḍīpravāhakramo nirarthakaḥ, garbhotpādatrivarṣamaraṇāvadheriti |
analyzed: atas nyāyāt yasya akāla maraṇam bhavati garbha utpādāḥ dvālasya tri varṣaiḥ pañca varṣaiḥ vā dvā daśa varṣeḥ vā viṃśati ādibhiḥ vā maraṇam tasya pañca nāḍī upari ṣaṣ sapta ādi

original: atra yadi māsā - dūdhvaṃ jātakasya maraṇaṃ bhavati, tadā janmadinādārabhya prāṇāvāyuḥ pauṣṇakālāt tithidigi- ṣuguṇādyamārūḍhaḥ
analyzed: atra yadi māsāḥ dūdhvam jātakasya maraṇam bhavati tadā janma dināt ārabhya prāṇau āyuḥ pauṣṇa kālāt tithi digi ṣu guṇa ādyam ārūḍhaḥ

original: evaṃ dvimāsānte maraṇaṃ trimāsānte caturmāsānte ṣaḍmāsānte eka- varṣānte dvivarṣānte trivarṣānte garbhotpādāttrayastriṃśaddinārohaṇavilomena yāvat pañcadinā- rohaṇaṃ dakṣiṇanāḍyāṃ śabdādipañcaguṇakṣayabhedena vāmanāḍyāṃ dinamekaṃ sattvāditriguṇakṣaya- bhedeneti
analyzed: evam dvi māsa ante maraṇam tri māsa ante catur māsa ante ṣaṣ māsa ante eka varṣa ante dvi varṣa ante tri varṣa ante garbha utpādāt trayastriṃśat dina ārohaṇa vilomena yāvat pañca

original: evaṃ garbhotpādāt prathame'pi maraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ prāṇapraveśāditi āhorātrataḥ, evaṃ tṛtīye dine maraṇaṃ dvādaśame patre prāṇodayāt, evaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dine ekādaśe patre prāṇodayāt, evamekādaśe dine daśame rāśipatre prāṇodayāt, evamekaviṃśatime dine navame rāśipatre prāṇodayāt, evaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatime dine aṣṭame rāśipatre krameṇa prāṇodayāt

original: iha trivarṣādhidevaḥ sūryaśabdena prāṇavāyuścandraśabdenāpānavāyustripakṣādhipatiḥ

original: bhūyaḥ punaḥ pratidinahāninā (nyā) māsadvayenāparamapi dinaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭidine ṛṇaṃ bhavati, punarvarddhate varṣaṃyogāt
analyzed: bhūyas punar prati dina hāninā nyā māsa dvayena aparam api dinam catuḥṣaṣṭi dine ṛṇam bhavati punar varddhate varṣam yogāt

original: pūrṇe'bde ṣa dinaṃ syāt, pūrvoktavidhinonam, aparamapi tathā vaddha te mṛtyusīmnaḥ, mṛtyusīmno varṣaśatam; tato mṛtyusīmnaḥ sārddhadvāṣaṣṭyadhikaśatapañcakaṃ dinagaṇaṃ ṛṇaṃ varddhate
analyzed: pūrṇe bde tat dinam syāt pūrva ukta vidhinā ūnam aparam api tathā te mṛtyu sīmnaḥ mṛtyu sīmnaḥ varṣa śatam tatas mṛtyu sīmnaḥ sārddha dvāṣaṣṭi adhika śata pañcakam dina gaṇam

original: evaṃ sūryasya rājan dviguṇamṛṇa' midaṃ varddhate varṣaśatān ( varṣāt) nṛtyusīmnaḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhika-ekādaśaśatadina- gaṇaṃ varddhate mṛtyusīmna iti ṛṇaniyamaḥ
analyzed: evam sūryasya rājan dviguṇam ṛṇam idam varddhate varṣa śatān varṣāt nṛtyusīmnaḥ pañcaviṃśati adhikaḥ ekādaśa śata dina gaṇam varddhate mṛtyusīmnaḥ iti ṛṇa niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ śvāsādibhedena varṣasaṃkhyā ucyate ṣaṭṣvāsairityādinā - ṣaṭśvāsairekaliptā prabhavati ghaṭikā ṣaṣṭipāṇīpalaiśva ṣaṣṭīnāḍhyo dinaṃ syāt triguṇitadaśabhirvāsarairmāsamekam
analyzed: idānīm śvāsa ādi bhedena varṣa saṃkhyā ucyate ṣaṣ svāsaiḥ ityādinā ṣaṣ śvāsaiḥ eka liptā prabhavati ghaṭikā ṣaṣṭi pāṇī palaiḥ śva ṣaṣṭīn āḍhyaḥ dinam syāt tri

original: ṣaṇmāsaiścāyanaṃ syād dviguṇitamayanaṃ varṣamekaṃ prasiddham āyuḥ puṃsāṃ śatābdādṛṇagatiṣu gataṃ kālanāḍīvaśena || 77 ||
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsaiḥ ca ayanam syāt dvi guṇitam ayanam varṣam ekam prasiddham āyuḥ puṃsām śata abdāt ṛṇa gatiṣu gatam kāla nāḍī vaśena

original: iha śarīre manuṣyāṇāṃ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ ṣaḍbhirekaliptā bhavati, sā ca pāṇīpala- mucyate
analyzed: iha śarīre manuṣyāṇām śvāsa praśvāsaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ eka liptā bhavati sā ca mucyate

original: taiḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ pāṇīpalerekaghaṭikā bhavatyekadaṇḍātmikā
analyzed: taiḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ pāṇī paleḥ eka ghaṭikā bhavati eka daṇḍa ātmikā

original: * tāḥ ṣaṣṭināḍyo dinamahorātraṃ sthāditi, tairdaśabhistriguṇitaistriśatmāsamekaṃ vāsarairiti
analyzed: tāḥ ṣaṣṭi nāḍyaḥ dinam ahorātram sthāt iti taiḥ daśabhiḥ tri guṇitaiḥ triśat māsam ekam vāsaraiḥ iti

original: taiḥ ṣaṇmāsaima- karādibhirayanamekaṃ bhavati
analyzed: taiḥ kara ādibhiḥ ayanam ekam bhavati

original: tadevāyanaṃ dviguṇitaṃ varṣamekaṃ prasiddham
analyzed: tat eva ayanam dvi guṇitam varṣam ekam prasiddham

original: ataḥ śatābdāyuḥ trailokye nāsti yogī surabhujaganṛṇāṃ pūrituṃ yaḥ samartha candrādityo svadehe carati dinagaṇaṃ naiva candrasvacāraiḥ sūryaścarkṣāṇi sarvāṇi carati bhuvane varṣe varṣe tvṛṇena grasati sabhuvanaṃ varṣamadhye krameṇa kālacakra kavīraḥ || 78 ||
analyzed: atas śata abda āyuḥ trailokye na asti yogī sura bhujaga nṛṇām pūritum yaḥ samartha sva dehe carati dina gaṇam na eva candra sva cāraiḥ sūryaḥ ca ṛkṣāṇi sarvāṇi carati bhuvane varṣe

original: iha trailokye surabhujaganṛṇāṃ madhye yogī nāsti yaḥ samarthaḥ pūritu candrādityau svadehe tat kasmāddhetoḥ yataḥ svacāraiścandraḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaratriśatadinagaṇaṃ na carati varṣā vadheḥ sūryaścarkṣāṇi sarvāṇi saptaviṃśanna carati bhuvane śarīre varṣamadhye krameṇa pūrvokta vidhinā ataḥ prativarṣāt prativarṣe ṛṝṇena grasati sabhuvanaṃ śarīram kālacakrakavīra utpādakṣayahetubhūtaḥ sāriṇāṃ kālacakrekavīraḥ ataḥ sa sādhanīyaścandrārkau paṭale ariṣṭamaraṇalakṣaṇa nāḍīccheda-mahoddeśaḥ 213 pūrayitvā bodhicittarajo dharmoṃ prāṇāpānau pūrayitvā yogineti niyamo buddhasya bhagavataḥ idānīṃ mūtrādidhātuvikāralakṣaṇamucyate ariṣṭavaśāt chinnetyādinā - chinnā yadyekanāḍī bhavati narapate mūtramambutva meti tanmātrān pañcarātrāṃstyajati parakalā piṇḍavicchedakāle śabdaṃ karṇe rasañca tyajati khalu mukhe tārakāmakṣimadhye gandhaṃ ghrāṇe narāṇāṃ karacaraṇatanau coṣṇabhāvaṃ krameṇa || 79 ||
analyzed: iha trailokye sura bhujaga nṛṇām madhye yogī na asti yaḥ samarthaḥ candra ādityau sva dehe tat kasmāt hetoḥ yatas sva cāraiḥ candraḥ ṣaṣṭi uttara tri śata dina gaṇam na carati varṣāḥ dharma om prāṇa apānau pūrayitvā yoginā iti niyamaḥ buddhasya bhagavataḥ idānīm mūtra ādi dhātu vikāra lakṣaṇam ucyate ariṣṭa vaśāt chinna ityādinā chinnā yadi eka nāḍī bhavati narapate

original: iha śarīre chinnā yadyekanāḍī vāmā dakṣiṇā vā prāṇapravāharahitā bhavati narapate ityāmantraṇam mūtramambutva 'meti ṣaṇmāsāvadheḥ tanmātrān pañca rātrān tyajati parakalā prāṇaśaktiḥ ṣaḍ dināvadheryathākramam pratidine piṇḍavicchedakāle śabdaviṣayaṃ karṇāt tyajati karṇa ityāgamapāṭhāt pañcamyarthe saptamīti rasaṃ ca tyajati
analyzed: iha śarīre chinnā yadi eka nāḍī vāmā dakṣiṇā vā prāṇa pravāha rahitā bhavati narapate iti āmantraṇam mūtram ambu tva mā iti ṣaṣ māsa avadheḥ tanmātrān pañca rātrān tyajati para

original: khalu mukhe jihvāyā iti pañcadināvadheḥ tārakāmakṣimadhyāt caturdināvadheḥ gandhaṃ ghrāṇāt tridināvadheḥ narāṇāṃ karacaraṇatanāvuṣṇatvabhāvaḥ sparśabhāvaḥ dvidināvadheḥ antadine dharmadhātuṃ śukracyuti tyajati śvāsacakraṃ ceti aparaṣaḍdinābhyantare mṛtyulakṣaṇamucyate- taddine mṛtyureva || 80 ||
analyzed: khalu mukhe jihvāyāḥ iti pañca dina avadheḥ tārakām akṣi madhyāt catur dina avadheḥ gandham ghrāṇāt tri dina avadheḥ narāṇām kara caraṇa tanau uṣṇa tva bhāvaḥ sparśa bhāvaḥ dvi dina

original: nāsāgraṃ lambamānaṃ śirasi dhṛtabhujo dṛśyate tatsvarūpaṃ lākṣārāgapraghṛṣṭo'pyubhayakaratale naiva rāgaṃ karoti ādityaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ pariṇataśaśabhṛd dṛśyate pītavarṇaḥ mūtraṃ dehaśca śīto bhavati narapate iha śarīre maraṇe praviṣṭe svakīyaṃ nāsāgraṃ lambamānaṃ hasti karākāraṃ dṛśyate śirasi dhṛtabhujaḥ svakīyaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ dṛ śyate na sūkṣmo dṛśyate tathā lākṣārāga praghṛṣṭo'pyubhayakaratale naiva rāgaṃ karoti karatalacarmaṇi ādityaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇo dṛśyate pariṇataśaśabhṛt pūrṇimācandro dṛśyate sampūrṇa pīta iti ṣaḍdināvadheḥ tato yasmin dine mūtraṃ dehaśca śīto bhavati tadvidane tasmin dine mṛtyureva narapate ityāmantraṇam aparamapi ṣaḍdinābhyantare mṛtyulakṣaṇamucyate - jihvādha kālasūtraṃ prabhavati nayane brahmarekhātisūkṣmā śvāsaścandrārkamārge sphurati narapate dve kapole tathaiva 214 vimalaprabhāyāṃ adhyātma- kakṣāviṣṭaṃ stanordhvaṃ grahagaṇasakalaṃ dṛśyate sasphuliṅga stabdhagrīvā sagātrā bhramaṇamapi tanau lakṣaṇaṃ cāṣṭamṛtyoḥ || 81 ||
analyzed: nāsā agram lambamānam śirasi dhṛta bhujaḥ dṛśyate tat svarūpam lākṣā rāga praghṛṣṭaḥ u pi ubhaya kara tale na eva rāgam karoti ādityaḥ kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ pariṇata śaśabhṛt dṛśyate iti ṣaṣ dina avadheḥ tatas yasmin dine mūtram dehaḥ ca śītaḥ bhavati tat vidane tasmin dine mṛtyuḥ eva narapate iti āmantraṇam aparam api ṣaṣ dina abhyantare mṛtyu lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: ihāriṣṭamaraṇākrāntasya jihvādhaḥ kālasūtraṃ kṛṣṇarekhā bhavati tathā nayane brahmarekhātisa ūkṣmā keśapramāṇarekhā kṛṣṇaraktamaṇḍalabhedinī bhavati śvāsaḥ candrārkamārge sphurati dve kapole sphurataḥ tathaiva kakṣāviṣṭaṃ stanordhvam nāḍyau kakṣāviṣṭau bhavataḥ dṛśyate na grahagaṇasakalaṃ dṛśyate sasphuliṅgam stabdhagrīvā tasya sagātrā hastapādasahitā niśceṣṭā bhramaṇamapi tanau bhavati lakṣaṇaṃ cāṣṭa mṛtyoretaduktaṃ bhavati aparamapi yat kiñcit viparītaṃ dṛśyate śarīre bāhye vā chāyāpuruṣādikaṃ tat sarvaṃ maraṇalakṣaṇaṃ yoginā veditavyam tat jñātvā dānādikaṃ kāryam yadi puṇyabalena jīvati tathāpi śobhanam atha maraṇaṃ gacchati tathāpi yad dattaṃ tasya phalamanubhuṅkte ataḥ ubhayapakṣato dānaṃ deyaṃ saugataiḥ sukhārthibhiriti bhagavato niyamaḥ iti śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyām ariṣṭamaraṇalakṣaṇa - nāḍīccheda-mahoddeśaḥ kṣaṇalakṣaṇa - kālacakra niyama mahoddeśaḥ caturthaḥ || 4 ||
analyzed: iha ariṣṭa maraṇa ākrāntasya jihvā adhas kālasūtram kṛṣṇa rekhā bhavati tathā nayane brahmarekhā ati saḥ ūkṣmā keśa pramāṇa rekhā kṛṣṇa rakta maṇḍala bhedinī bhavati śvāsaḥ maraṇa lakṣaṇam yoginā veditavyam tat jñātvā dāna ādikam kāryam yadi puṇya balena jīvati tathā api śobhanam atha maraṇam gacchati tathā api yat dattam tasya phalam anubhuṅkte atas ubhaya

original: idānīṃ lokasaṃvṛtyāṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhāralakṣaṇa kartocyate utpattimityādinā — utpattiṃ yaḥ karoti prasavanasamayaṃ bālakaumārarūpaṃ saṃhāraḥ saiva loke punarapi kurute kālacakrī na sūryaḥ candrādityādidevān grasati sa bhagavān rātribhāge sabhūtān bhūyo muñcantyanantānapi dinasamaye sṛṣṭihetoḥ krameṇa || 82 ||
analyzed: idānīm loka saṃvṛtyām sṛṣṭi saṃhāra lakṣaṇa kartā ucyate utpattim ityādinā utpattim yaḥ karoti prasavana samayam bāla kaumāra rūpam saṃhāraḥ sa eva loke punar api kurute kālacakrī

original: iha saṃsāre yaḥ cyutikṣaṇaḥ sattvānāmutpati karoti rajaḥ śukrasaṃyuktam ālaya vijñānadharmī garbhe tato garbhāse prasavanasamayaṃ karoti bālakaumārādi rūpaṃ karoti śarīrasya sṛṣṭisa hāra sa evya cyutikṣaṇo loke svargamartyapātāle punarapi kurute kālacakro na sūryaḥ sūryo rajaḥ candraḥ śukram ālayavijñānena vinā kālacakreṇa vinā na karotītyarthaḥ iha kasmānna karoti rajaḥ śukradharmī sūryacandra iti iha sarvatrāgnisūrya somātmakaṃ jagaditi prasiddhaṃ vākyamityucyate iha yataścandrā dityādidevān grasati sa bhagavān rātribhāge sabhūtāniti iha saṃsāre rātribhāgaścandraḥ sṛṣṭiḥ divābhāgaḥ sūryaḥ saṃhārastān atra rātribhāge utpattikāle sa ālayavijñānalakṣaṇo ' kṣaṇalakṣaṇa- kālacakraniyamamahoddeśaḥ mātṛgarbhe candraḥ śukram ādityo rajaḥ; ādiśabdena viṇmūtrasambhūtāni pṛthivyaptejovāyvā- kāśadhātusahitān grasati rajaḥ śukrādhārasthitaḥ kāyavākcittaniṣpādanārtham, candraḥ śukramīśvaraḥ, rajaḥ sūryaḥ sadāśiva:, majjā rudraḥ, mūtraṃ viṣṇuḥ, brahmā viḍiti |
analyzed: iha saṃsāre yaḥ cyuti kṣaṇaḥ sattvānām utpati karoti rajaḥ śukra saṃyuktam ālaya vijñāna dharmī garbhe tatas prasavana samayam karoti bāla kaumāra ādi rūpam karoti śarīrasya cyuti bhagavān rātribhāge sa bhūtān iti iha saṃsāre rātribhāgaḥ candraḥ sṛṣṭiḥ divābhāgaḥ sūryaḥ saṃhāraḥ tān atra rātribhāge utpatti kāle saḥ mātṛgarbhe candraḥ śukram ādityaḥ rajaḥ

original: candrādi- tyādidevān grasati rātribhāge utpattikāle |
analyzed: candra ādi grasati rātri bhāge utpatti kāle

original: bhūyaḥ punaḥ muñcantyanantān śarīre nānā- bhāvairgraste sati vikurvitān khalu divasasamaye saṃhārakāle tyajatītyarthaḥ |
analyzed: bhūyas punar muñcanti anantān śarīre nānā bhāvaiḥ graste sati vikurvitān khalu divasa samaye saṃhāra kāle tyajati iti arthaḥ

original: sṛṣṭihetoḥ punara- parotpādahetormuñcati, krameṇa pṛthivyādidhātuparityāgena nābhihṛtkaṇṭhalalāṭoṣṇīṣādhāre krameṇeti saṃvṛtikartāniyamaḥ |
analyzed: sṛṣṭi hetoḥ punar para utpāda hetoḥ muñcati krameṇa pṛthivī ādi dhātu parityāgena nābhi hṛd kaṇṭha lalāṭa uṣṇīṣa ādhāre krameṇa iti saṃvṛti kartā aniyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ karmakaraṇādikaṃ lokasaṃvṛtyā ucyate śabdādyamityādinā - śabdādyaṃ karmaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati hi karaṇaṃ tvindriyāṇāṃ ca ṣaṭkaṃ varṣā māsāśca pakṣā dina niśitithayaścandrasūryau ca kartā |
analyzed: idānīm karma karaṇa ādikam loka saṃvṛtyā ucyate śabda ādyam ityādinā śabda ādyam karma ṣaṭkam bhavati hi karaṇam tu indriyāṇām ca ṣaṭkam varṣāḥ māsāḥ ca pakṣāḥ dina niśi

original: eṣāṃ saṃhārakartā'para iha bhavet sṛṣṭikartā na kartā vyomavyāpī khavajrī viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ || 83 ||
analyzed: eṣām saṃhāra kartā paraḥ iha bhavet sṛṣṭi kartā na kartā vyoma vyāpī kha vajrī viṣaya virahitaḥ nirguṇaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ

original: iha śarīre niṣpanne sati śabdasparśarūparasagandhadharmadhātuṣaṭukaṃ karma bhavati, karaṇamindriyāṇāṃ ṣaṭukaṃ śrotrakāyacakṣujihvāghrāṇamanaḥ ṣaṭkam |
analyzed: iha śarīre niṣpanne sati śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha dharma dhātu ṣaṭukam karma bhavati karaṇam indriyāṇām ṣaṭukam śrotra kāya cakṣu jihvā ghrāṇa manaḥ ṣaṭkam

original: varṣā māsāśca dvādaśa- rāśibhedena candrakalābhedena', pakṣāścaturviṃśatiḥ, dinaniśi ahorātram, tithayaḥ pañcadaśa, candrasūryau ca karaṇametat samastam |
analyzed: varṣāḥ māsāḥ ca dvādaśa rāśi bhedena candra kalā bhedena pakṣāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ dina niśi ahorātram tithayaḥ pañcadaśa candra sūryau ca karaṇam etat samastam

original: kartā ālayavijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śukracyutikṣaṇaḥ sahajā- nando lokasaṃvṛtyeti |
analyzed: kartā ālayavijñāna lakṣaṇaḥ śukra cyuti kṣaṇaḥ sahajāḥ nandaḥ loka saṃvṛtyā iti

original: eṣāṃ cyutikṣaṇādīnāṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ saṃhārakartā'para iha bhavet, yataḥ sṛṣṭikartā na kartā |
analyzed: eṣām cyuti kṣaṇa ādīnām kartṛ karaṇa karmaṇaḥ saṃhāra kartā paraḥ iha bhavet yatas sṛṣṭi kartā na kartā

original: tato vyomavyāpī khavatrī viṣayavirahito nirguṇo niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahajakāyo niḥkalaḥ savargo vyāpī ra iti |
analyzed: tatas vyomavyāpī khavatrī viṣaya virahitaḥ nirguṇaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ sahaja kāyaḥ niḥkalaḥ savargaḥ vyāpī raḥ iti

original: ataḥ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartā nirvāṇalakṣaṇo nāstītyartha:, iti kartā kṣayaniyamaḥ |
analyzed: atas sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartā nirvāṇa lakṣaṇaḥ na asti iti arthaḥ iti kartā kṣaya niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ samudayādikamucyate gandha ityādinā - gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśa iti ca dharaṇī toyavahniśca vāyu aṣṭau vai rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samuditaviṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastāḥ |
analyzed: idānīm samudaya ādikam ucyate gandhaḥ ityādinā gandhaḥ varṇaḥ rasaḥ sparśaḥ iti ca dharaṇī toya vahniḥ ca vāyu aṣṭau vai rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samudita viṣayāḥ eka mukhyāḥ samastāḥ

original: etat trailokyakṛtsnaṃ spharaṇanidhanatāṃ yāti kālaprabhāvāt śabdaḥ śūnyaṃ hyarūpaṃ bhavati narapate dharmadhāturmanaśca || 84 ||
analyzed: etat trailokya kṛtsnam spharaṇa nidhana tām yāti kāla prabhāvāt śabdaḥ śūnyam hi arūpam bhavati narapate dharmadhātuḥ manaḥ ca

original: iha saṃsāre samudayādutpādo naikadharmāditi |
analyzed: iha saṃsāre samudayāt utpādaḥ na eka dharmāt iti

original: atra samudayo gandho varṇo rasaḥ sparśa iti ca dharaṇī toyo vahniśca vāyu[rityete 'ṣṭau rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samudita- viṣayā ekamukhyāḥ samastāḥ |
analyzed: atra samudayaḥ gandhaḥ varṇaḥ rasaḥ sparśaḥ iti ca dharaṇī toyaḥ vahniḥ ca vāyu iti ete ṣṭau rūpiṇaḥ syuḥ samudita viṣayāḥ eka mukhyāḥ samastāḥ

original: eṣāmaṣṭarūpiṇāmeko guṇo mukhyo bhavati; śeṣā gauṇā bhavantīti pūrvoktam |

original: tasmād rājan svakarma prakṛtiguṇagataṃ duḥkhasaukhyaṃ karoti, kaḥ kartā kiṃ karoti prakṛtivirahito- 'ṣṭādaśadhāturahito na karotītyarthaḥ, iti muhyate'jñānaloko mithyātmakartāparikalpanayeti karmabandhaniyamaḥ |

original: munibhiratītavartamānaiḥ proktamevātra loke dharmacakrasthaiḥ |
analyzed: munibhiḥ atīta vartamānaiḥ proktam eva atra loke dharmacakra sthaiḥ

original: kiṃrūpā setyāha - trailokyaṃ yatra kṛtsnamiti, yasmāt sukhakṣaṇāttrailokyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavati utpādakāle, līyate yatra bhūyaḥ, maraṇakāle yatra kṣaṇe līyate |
analyzed: kiṃrūpā sā iti āha trailokyam yatra kṛtsnam iti yasmāt sukha kṣaṇāt trailokyam sakalam bhavati utpāda kāle līyate yatra bhūyas maraṇa kāle yatra kṣaṇe līyate

original: bhāvasamūhaḥ kṣarakṣaṇe sa eva kṣaṇo'nāśra (sra ) vasukhamakṣaramucyate |
analyzed: bhāva samūhaḥ kṣara kṣaṇe saḥ eva kṣaṇaḥ va sukham akṣaram ucyate

original: yasmād buddhā utpadyante dharmacakrapravarttanāya, yasmin mahāparinirvāṇo (ṇaṃ) hi narapata iti vidyāniyamaḥ |
analyzed: yasmāt buddhāḥ utpadyante dharma cakra pravarttanāya yasmin mahā parinirvāṇaḥ hi narapate iti vidyā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ pūrvayogābhyāsabalamucyate yogītyādinā- yogīndro'prāptayogaḥ pracalitamanasā yāti mṛtyuṃ kadācit śrīmān mānuṣyaloke pravaramunikule jāyate yogayuktaḥ |
analyzed: idānīm pūrva yoga abhyāsa balam ucyate yogi ityādinā yogi indra prāpta yogaḥ pracalita manasā yāti mṛtyum kadācid śrīmān mānuṣya loke pravara muni kule jāyate yoga yuktaḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [adhyātma- pūrvābhyāsena tenāharati punarapi jñānayogaṃ viśālaṃ labdhe jñāne prayātyakṣayaparamapadaṃ yatra janmī na bhūyaḥ || 97 ||
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām adhyātma pūrva abhyāsena tena āharati punar api jñāna yogam viśālam labdhe jñāne prayāti akṣaya parama padam yatra janmī na bhūyas

original: iha martye yadi yogī vidyāyogamabhyasyamāno maraṇamupaiti aprāptayogaḥ kadācit pracalitamanasā śrīmān mānuṣyaloke pravaramunikule buddhabodhisattvakule, yogaḥ śūnyatā- karuṇābhinnaṃ viśuddhatattvaṃ viśuddhacittam ;
analyzed: iha martye yadi yogī vidyā yogam abhyasyamānaḥ maraṇam upaiti aprāpta yogaḥ kadācid pracalita manasā śrīmān mānuṣya loke pravara muni kule buddha bodhisattva kule yogaḥ śūnyatā karuṇā bhinnam

original: tena yukta iti yogayuktaḥ, na yogaparipūrṇaḥ punaḥ pūrvābhyāsena tenāharati avāpto hi jñānayogaṃ viśālamiti na prādeśikaṃ sarvākāra- miti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tena yuktaḥ iti yoga yuktaḥ na yoga paripūrṇaḥ punar pūrva abhyāsena tena āharati avāptaḥ hi jñāna yogam viśālam iti na prādeśikam sarva ākāram iti bhāvaḥ

original: labdhe jñāne paripūrṇe prayāti akṣayaparamapadamiti na vidyate kṣayo yasyetyakṣayaparamapadamiti vigrahaḥ |
analyzed: labdhe jñāne paripūrṇe prayāti akṣaya parama padam iti na vidyate kṣayaḥ yasya iti akṣaya parama padam iti vigrahaḥ

original: kimbhūtaṃ tadityāha — yatra punarjanmī utpattimānna bhavati, tat sarvaṃ buddhānāṃ padaṃ paramapadamiti |
analyzed: kimbhūtam tat iti āha yatra punarjanmī utpattimān na bhavati tat sarvam buddhānām padam parama padam iti

original: idānoṃ bauddhānāmasurāṇāṃ mlecchānāṃ jñānotpattikāla ucyate jñāna ityādinā - jñānotpattijinānāṃ ravidinasamaye cārddharātre niśānte madhyāhne cāsurāṇāṃ śaśiniśisamaye nirgame vāsava (ra) sya |
analyzed: idānom bauddhānām asurāṇām mlecchānām jñāna utpatti kālaḥ ucyate jñāne ityādinā jñāna utpatti jinānām ravi dina samaye ca arddharātre niśā ante madhyāhne ca asurāṇām śaśi niśi samaye nirgame

original: samyagjñāne vibhaṅge prabhavati vacanaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca śāntaṃ raudraṃ ca karma tribhuvananilaye pauruṣaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca || 98 ||
analyzed: samyak jñāne vibhaṅge prabhavati vacanam saṃskṛtam prākṛtam ca śāntam raudram ca karma tribhuvana nilaye pauruṣam prākṛtam ca

original: iha khalu trividho yogābhyāsaḥ bauddha āsuro bhotaśca
analyzed: iha khalu trividhaḥ yoga abhyāsaḥ bauddhaḥ āsuraḥ bhotaḥ ca

original: tatra bauddho yogaḥ śūnyatā karuṇātmakaḥ, āsuraḥ kalpanādharmaḥ, bhautiko dviprakāraḥ, śāśvatarūpa uccheda- rūpaśca
analyzed: tatra bauddhaḥ yogaḥ śūnyatā karuṇā ātmakaḥ āsuraḥ kalpanā dharmaḥ bhautikaḥ dvi prakāraḥ śāśvata rūpa uccheda rūpaḥ ca

original: evaṃ trividho yogī sa eva vidyate yasya tadyogābhyāsaratatvāditi
analyzed: evam trividhaḥ yogī saḥ eva vidyate yasya tad yoga abhyāsa rata tvāt iti

original: teṣu divābhāge bauddhayogināṃ jñānotpattiḥ, rātribhāge āsurayoginām, catuḥ sandhyārahite kāle bhauta yogināṃ jñānotpattiriti
analyzed: teṣu divābhāge bauddha yoginām jñāna utpattiḥ rātri bhāge āsura yoginām catuḥ sandhyā rahite kāle bhauta yoginām jñāna utpattiḥ iti

original: atra kālavibhāgaḥ jñānotpattijinānāṃ ravidina- samaye cārddharātre niśānte, madhyāhne cāsurāṇāṃ śaśiniśisamaye nirgame vāsava sya
analyzed: atra kāla vibhāgaḥ jñāna utpatti jinānām ravi dina samaye ca arddharātre niśā ante madhyāhne ca asurāṇām śaśi niśi samaye nirgame

original: bhautānāmanuktatvādapi sandhyārahitakāle
analyzed: bhautānām an ukta tvāt api sandhyā rahita kāle

original: atrārddharātre pūrvasandhyāyāṃ vāgjñānādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati bauddhānām, asurāṇāṃ madhyāhnasandhyāyāṃ aṣṭaṅga tasandhyāyāṃ vāgjñānādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati
analyzed: atra arddharātre pūrva sandhyāyām vāc jñāna adhiṣṭhānam bhavati bauddhānām asurāṇām madhyāhna sandhyāyām vāc jñāna adhiṣṭhānam bhavati

original: bhūtānāmapara catuḥ praharasandhyāyāṃ divābhāge śāśvatajñānādhiṣṭhānam, rātribhāge ucchedajñānādhiṣṭhānam, anayorboddhāsurayoryathāsaṃkhyam; samyagjñānaṃ bauddhānāṃ bhavati, vibhaṅgaṃ taddharmavirodhi bhavati asurāṇām
analyzed: prahara sandhyāyām divābhāge śāśvata jñāna adhiṣṭhānam rātribhāge uccheda jñāna adhiṣṭhānam anayoḥ boddha asurayoḥ yathāsaṃkhyam samyak jñānam bauddhānām bhavati vibhaṅgam tad dharma virodhi

original: samyagjñānaṃ divālokavat sarvadarśa, vibhaṅgajñānaṃ rātryālokavat kiñcit sattvānāṃ jīvamaraṇadarśīti
analyzed: samyak jñānam divā āloka vat sarva darśa vibhaṅga jñānam rātri āloka vat kiñcid sattvānām jīva maraṇa darśi iti

original: kathaṃ jñāyata ityata āha - dharmadeśanayā iti, iha samyagjñāne vibhaṅga prabhavati vacanaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ ceti
analyzed: katham jñāyate iti atas āha dharma deśanayā iti iha samyak jñāne vibhaṅga prabhavati vacanam saṃskṛtam prākṛtam ca iti

original: samyagjñānotpannānāṃ saṃskṛtavākyaṃ sarvarutātmakamiti, vibhaṅgajñānotpannānāṃ prākṛtaṃ vākyaṃ bhavati deśakānām eka' viṣayabhāṣāntareṇeti
analyzed: samyak jñāna utpannānām saṃskṛta vākyam sarva ruta ātmakam iti vibhaṅga jñāna utpannānām prākṛtam vākyam bhavati deśakānām eka viṣaya bhāṣā antareṇa iti

original: śāntakarmadeśakaṃ bauddhānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvasattvakaruṇātmakam, raudrakarmadeśakaṃ asurāṇāṃ jñānaṃ tiryaksattvāpakārimāṃsabhakṣaṇāyeti
analyzed: śānta karma deśakam bauddhānām jñānam sarva sattva karuṇā ātmakam raudra karma deśakam asurāṇām jñānam tiryaksattva apakāri māṃsa bhakṣaṇāya iti

original: paṭale ] kṣaṇalakṣaṇa-kālacakraniyamamahoddaśaḥ tribhuvananilaye pauruṣaṃ karma bauddhānāṃ jñānaṃ deśayati, kṣitau prākṛtaṃ karma asurāṇāṃ jñānaṃ deśayati
analyzed: paṭale tribhuvana nilaye pauruṣam karma bauddhānām jñānam deśayati kṣitau prākṛtam karma asurāṇām jñānam deśayati

original: bhūtānāṃ vimiśraṃ karma deśayati pṛthivyāmiti jñānadeśanāniyamaḥ
analyzed: bhūtānām vimiśram karma deśayati pṛthivyām iti jñāna deśanā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ bauddhāsurayobhuṃ ktikāla ucyate madhyāhlādityādinā - madhyāhlādarddharātraṃ dinaniśisamaye bhuktikālastayośca annaṃ gomāṃsabhojyaṃ bahuvidharasadaṃ pānamaṇḍasya śukram
analyzed: idānīm kti kālaḥ ucyate madhyāhlād ityādinā madhyāhlād arddharātram dina niśi samaye bhukti kālaḥ tayoḥ ca annam go māṃsa bhojyam bahuvidha rasa dam pānamaṇḍasya śukram

original: raktaṃ śvetaṃ ca vastraṃ raviśaśigativat svargapātālavāsaḥ dharmo'hiṃsā ca hiṃsā guruniyamavaśād vajradaityāsanaṃ ca ||99||
analyzed: raktam śvetam ca vastram ravi śaśi gati vat svarga pātāla vāsaḥ dharmaḥ hiṃsā ca hiṃsā guru niyama vaśāt vajra daitya āsanam ca

original: iha pratidine madhyāhnadārabhyāddha' rātraṃ yāvaddinasamayam (:)
analyzed: iha pratidine rātram yāvat dina samayam

original: arddharātrādārabhya madhyāhnaparyantaṃ niśisamayaḥ
analyzed: arddharātrāt ārabhya madhyāhna paryantam niśisamayaḥ

original: tasmin dinaniśisamaye svasvasamayasya parārddha bhuktikāla: tayorboddhamlecchayoryathāsaṃkhyaṃ tapasvinām, na gṛhasthānāmiti niyamaḥ
analyzed: tasmin dina niśi samaye sva sva samayasya parārddha bhukti kāla tayoḥ boddha mlecchayoḥ yathāsaṃkhyam tapasvinām na gṛhasthānām iti niyamaḥ

original: bauddhāsurayoḥ punaḥ khānapānaṃ yathāsaṃkhyam
analyzed: bauddha āsurayoḥ punar khāna pānam yathāsaṃkhyam

original: annaṃ viśiṣṭataraṃ bauddhānām, gomāṃsasahitaṃ mlecchā- nām
analyzed: annam viśiṣṭataram bauddhānām go māṃsa sahitam mlecchāḥ nām

original: pānaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bahuvidharasadaṃ miṣṭaṃ bauddhānām, kukkuṭādīnāmaṇḍasya śukrapānaṃ mlecchānāmiti
analyzed: pānam yathāsaṃkhyam bahuvidha rasa dam miṣṭam bauddhānām kukkuṭa ādīnām aṇḍasya śukra pānam mlecchānām iti

original: paridhānaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ raktavastraṃ bauddhānām, śvetaṃ mlecchānāṃ tapasvinām ; gṛhasthānāṃ na niyamaḥ
analyzed: paridhānam yathāsaṃkhyam rakta vastram bauddhānām śvetam mlecchānām tapasvinām gṛhasthānām na niyamaḥ

original: tathā maraṇānte āvāso yathāsaṃkhyam, raviśaśigativaditi raverūrdhvaṃ gatiḥ, candrasyādho gatiḥ, tayorgativat svargavāso ravigatirboddhānām, pātāla- vāso'surāṇāṃ candragativaditi
analyzed: tathā maraṇa ante āvāsaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam ravi śaśi gati vat iti raveḥ ūrdhvam gatiḥ candrasya adhas gatiḥ tayoḥ gati vat svarga vāsaḥ ravi gatiḥ boddhānām surāṇām candra gati vat iti

original: yathā mūlatantre sekoddeśe' bhagavānāha - “adhaścandrāmṛtaṃ yāti maraṇe sarvadehinām
analyzed: yathā mūlatantre seka uddeśe bhagavān āha adhas candra amṛtam yāti maraṇe sarva dehinām

original: ūrdhve sūryaṃ rajo rāhu vijñānaṃ bhāvalakṣaṇe ||
analyzed: ūrdhve sūryam rajaḥ rāhu vijñānam bhāva lakṣaṇe

original: tathā dharmo yathāsaṃkhyam
analyzed: tathā dharmaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam

original: bauddhānāṃ dharmo'hiṃsā, mlecchānāṃ hiṃsā, cakārād bhūtānām
analyzed: bauddhānām dharmaḥ hiṃsā mlecchānām hiṃsā cakārāt bhūtānām

original: guruniyamavaśād bhāvanākāle iṣṭadevatāstutikāle yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bauddhānāṃ vajrāsanaṃ praśastam, mlecchānāṃ daityāsanaṃ praśastam, cakārādaparaṃ sāmānyamiti tasya na vidhirna niṣedha iti
analyzed: guru niyama vaśāt bhāvanā kāle iṣṭadevatā stuti kāle yathāsaṃkhyam bauddhānām vajrāsanam praśastam mlecchānām daityāsanam praśastam cakārāt aparam sāmānyam iti tasya na vidhiḥ na niṣedhaḥ iti

original: atra daityānāṃ bhūtale vāmajānuprasārataḥ, vāmajānūrdhvaṃ dakṣiṇapādaḥ, dakṣiṇajānūdurdhvaprasāro vāmapādordhvam, dakṣiṇapādaścakārādadhaḥ dakṣiṇapāda ūrdhvam, pādatale'pi cakārāt pṛṣṭhe kaṭiniṣaṇṇa iti vajrāsanādivakṣyamāṇe vaktavyamiti bauddhāsura kriyāniyamaḥ
analyzed: atra daityānām bhū tale vāma jānu prasārataḥ vāma jānu ūrdhvam dakṣiṇa pādaḥ dakṣiṇa jānu ūdurdhva prasāraḥ vāma pāda ūrdhvam dakṣiṇa pādaḥ cakārāt adhas dakṣiṇa pādaḥ ūrdhvam pāda

original: bhūtānāṃ miśrakarma prabhavati vacanaṃ miśrapaiśācikaṃ ca dharmo'hiṃsā ca hiṃsā khalu guruniyamājjīvaghātādidoṣāḥ
analyzed: bhūtānām miśra karma prabhavati vacanam miśra paiśācikam ca dharmaḥ hiṃsā ca hiṃsā khalu guru niyamāt jīva ghāta ādi doṣāḥ

original: yāgādyarthaṃ pravṛttirbhavati narapate vā nivṛttiḥ kadācit khādyaṃ peyaṃ ca miśraṃ raviśaśigamanānmiśramārgaḥ paratra || 100||
analyzed: yāga ādi artham pravṛttiḥ bhavati narapate vā nivṛttiḥ kadācid khādyam peyam ca miśram ravi śaśi gamanāt miśra mārgaḥ paratra

original: paṭale ] vimalaprabhāyāṃ [adhyātma- bhūtānāṃ punaḥ pūrvoktamiśrakamaṃ
analyzed: paṭale vimalaprabhāyām adhyātma bhūtānām punar pūrva ukta miśra kamam

original: tadatra' vṛtte na vispaṣṭaṃ kathitam; tadyathā - bhūtaṃ vā ( bhūtānāṃ ) miśrakarma prabhavati vacanaṃ miśrapaiśācikaṃ ca, dharmo'hiṃsā ca hiṃsā khalu guru niyamājjīvaghātādidoṣaḥ
analyzed: tat atra vṛtte na vispaṣṭam kathitam tat yathā bhūtam vā bhūtānām miśra karma prabhavati vacanam miśra paiśācikam ca dharmaḥ hiṃsā ca hiṃsā khalu guru niyamāt jīva ghāta ādi doṣaḥ

original: yogārthaṃ pravṛttiriti yo yā gādyarthamādiśabdāt saṃgrāmārthaṃ hiṃsāpravṛttiḥ, phalārthaṃ nivṛttirahiṃsāpravṛttirbhavati
analyzed: yoga artham pravṛttiḥ iti yaḥ yā ga ādi artham ādi śabdāt saṃgrāma artham hiṃsā pravṛttiḥ phala artham nivṛttiḥ ahiṃsā pravṛttiḥ bhavati

original: narapate vā nivṛttiḥ kadāciditi
analyzed: narapate vā nivṛttiḥ kadācid iti

original: khādyaṃ peyaṃ ca miśraṃ raviśa śigamanāt miśramārgaḥ paratra iti vyāmiśramārge bhūtānāṃ sarvo veditavyaḥ, iti bhūtakriyāniyamaḥ
analyzed: khādyam peyam ca miśram ravi śa śi gamanāt miśra mārgaḥ paratra iti vyāmiśra mārge bhūtānām sarvaḥ veditavyaḥ iti bhūta kriyā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ mārgaṃ vaktukāma āha jyotirityādinā - jyotiḥ sūryācarabdhau sitadinamayanaṃ ca ttaraṃ cārddhavarṣaṃ candro jyotirniśā cāsitamayanamidaṃ dakṣiṇe dhūmamārge
analyzed: idānīm mārgam vaktu kāmaḥ āha jyotiḥ ityādinā jyotiḥ sūrya ācar abdhau sita dinam ayanam ca ttaram ca arddha varṣam candraḥ jyotiḥ niśā ca asitam ayanam idam dakṣiṇe dhūma mārge

original: aciḥ svarge surāṇāmapi bhavati tanau nāgaloke'surāṇāṃ vyāmiśro martyaloke bhavati narapate pretatiryaṅnarāṇām || 101 ||
analyzed: aciḥ svarge surāṇām api bhavati tanau nāga loke surāṇām vyāmiśraḥ martya loke bhavati narapate preta tiryak narāṇām

original: iha khalu trividho mārgaḥ – jyotirmārgo dhūmamārgo vimiśramārgaḥ
analyzed: iha khalu trividhaḥ mārgaḥ jyotiḥ mārgaḥ dhūma mārgaḥ vimiśra mārgaḥ

original: eṣu acirathe- jyotiḥ sūryaḥ
analyzed: eṣu acirathe jyotiḥ sūryaḥ

original: śi sitadinamayanamuttaraṃ divāvṛddhilakṣaṇam arddhavarṣa bāhye, adhyātmani makarādiṣaḍlagnātmakamiti, udayāstamanamiti saṃjñitam
analyzed: sita dinam ayanam uttaram divāvṛddhi lakṣaṇam arddha varṣa bāhye adhyātmani makara ādi ṣaṣ lagna ātmakam iti udaya astamanam iti saṃjñitam

original: dhūmamārgo jyoti- ścandro niśā cāra śi tamayanamidaṃ dakṣiṇe dhūmamārge karkaṭādikaṃ ṣaṇmāsadakṣiṇāyanam, yatra rātrervṛddhistad dakṣiṇāyanam ; astamanādudayaṃ yāvanniyama iti
analyzed: dhūma mārgaḥ jyotiḥ candraḥ niśā tam ayanam idam dakṣiṇe dhūma mārge karkaṭa ādikam ṣaṣ māsa dakṣiṇāyanam yatra rātreḥ vṛddhiḥ tat dakṣiṇāyanam astamanāt udayam yāvat niyamaḥ

original: atrāciḥ svarge surāṇāṃ mārgagamanāya
analyzed: atra aciḥ svarge surāṇām mārga gamanāya

original: asitamayanaṃ dhūmamārgo nāgalokagamanāyāsurāṇāmiti
analyzed: asitam ayanam dhūma mārgaḥ nāga loka gamanāya asurāṇām iti

original: vyāmiśro divā- rātridharmā martyalokagamane pretatiryaṅganarāṇāmutpattaye prakaṭita iti mārganiyamaḥ, sattvarajastamoguṇasvabhāvena pūrvajanmavāsanājaniteneti
analyzed: vyāmiśraḥ divā rātri dharmā martya loka gamane preta tiryaṅga narāṇām utpattaye prakaṭitaḥ iti mārga niyamaḥ sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ guṇa svabhāvena pūrva janma vāsanā janitena iti

original: idānīṃ sattvānāṃ vāsanāgrahamucyate śrāvakabauddhāsurabhūtakarmaratānāṃ yo yanmadhya ityādinā - yo yanmadhye praviṣṭo vrataniyamarataḥ karmapāśairnibaddha- stanmadhye svasvabhāvād bhavati narapate tatkule tadgraheṇa
analyzed: idānīm sattvānām vāsanā graham ucyate śrāvaka bauddha āsura bhūta karma ratānām yaḥ yad madhye ityādinā yaḥ yad madhye praviṣṭaḥ vrata niyama rataḥ karma pāśaiḥ nibaddhaḥ stad madhye sva

original: yāva ccittasya bhāvastrividhabhavavaśād vedanā saukhyaduḥkhaṃ tāvat saṃsāraghore bhramaṇamiha nṛpa svargamartye tvadhaśca || 102 ||

original: iha saṃsāre janma karmavāsanābalena devāsurabhūtakriyānurakto yo yanmadhye praviṣṭo bhavati vrataniyamarataḥ karmapāśanibaddhaḥ, tasya dharmasya kriyābhirbaṃddha iti; tanmadhye sva-sva- bhāvād bhavati ; narapate ityāmantraṇam

original: tatkule devāsurabhūtakule

original: iha saṃsāracittasya trividhabhavavaśāditi kāmarūpā- rūpabhavavāsanāvaśāt vedanā saukhyaduḥkhaṃ sāṃsārikam, tāvat saṃsāre duḥkhalakṣaṇaṃ bhramaṇaṃ cittasyāpi nṛpa svargamartyeṣu, adhaśca devamanuṣyanarakādiṣaḍgatiṣu bhramaṇamālayavijñānasyeti vāsanāgrahaniyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ yathā garbhe vyañjanasvarotpādo'bhūt, tathā mṛtyulakṣaṇamucyate kādyā- nityādinā - kādyān vargān samātrānapi guṇaguṇitān yān tripakṣasvarāṃśca triṃśad vai vyañjanāni trividhagativaśād rohate tāni mṛtyuḥ

original: kādyān vargān samātrān pūrvoktānapi guṇaguṇitānaśītyuttaradina sahasrabhūtān yān tripakṣasvarāṃśca hrasvadīrghaplutān pañcacatvāriṃśattraṃśadvyañjanāni

original: trividhagati- vaśāditi vāmadakṣiṇamadhyamāgativaśād rohate tān (ni) mṛtyuriti
analyzed: trividha gati vaśāt iti vāma dakṣiṇa madhyamā gati vaśāt rohate tān ni mṛtyuḥ iti

original: evaṃ dvātriṃśadvarṣapakṣānapi guṇaguṇitān candrasūryāgnibhinnān sattvarajastamobhinnāniti ṣaṇṇavativarṣe'pare sārddhadaśamāsapakṣāniti

original: pakṣā varṣaṃtrayāṇāmapi śaśini guṇāḥ kālavahnidvipakṣāḥ ūnībhūtāḥ śatābde samaviṣamagatī śe [ṣa] pakṣā ravīndvoḥ
analyzed: pakṣāḥ varṣam trayāṇām api śaśini guṇāḥ kāla vahni dvi pakṣāḥ ūnībhūtāḥ śata abde sama viṣama gatī śe ṣa pakṣāḥ ravi indvoḥ

original: lokākṣyagnyakṣisaṃkhyā dinaniśisamayān bhatṛhīnān samastān vargān mātrān ravīndvogra sati gativaśād vyañjanādīni mṛtyuḥ || 104 ||

original: vāmadakṣiṇanāḍīpakṣā' varṣaśatapakṣāṇāṃ madhye pakṣā varṣatrayāṇāṃ dvāsaptatiḥ, śaśinaḥ api guṇāstripakṣāḥ, kālavahnidvipakṣāḥ ; evaṃ saptasaptatipakṣā ūnībhūtāḥ śatābde śatā- bdapakṣarāśau caturviṃśatiśatasaṃkhye, śeṣapakṣā ravondroḥ savyāvasavyayoriti

original: lokākṣyagnyakṣisaṃkhyā iti trayoviṃśatyadhika trayoviṃśatiśatāśceti
analyzed: loka akṣi agni akṣi saṃkhyāḥ iti trayoviṃśati adhika trayoviṃśati śatāḥ ca iti

analyzed: evam dina niśi samayān bhartṛ hīnān samastān varṣa śatasya ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrān ca bhartṛ hīnān tri varṣa tri pakṣa vyañjana māsa dina hīnān vāme dakṣiṇe bhakṣate mṛtyuḥ

original: vargān mātrān ravīndrorgrasati gativaśād vyañja- nādīni mṛtyuḥ, ariṣṭādārabhya madhyamākāle bhakṣate iti
analyzed: vargān mātrān ravi indroḥ grasati gati vaśāt mṛtyuḥ ariṣṭāt ārabhya madhyamā kāle bhakṣate iti

analyzed: sārddhāḥ vai cakranāḍīḥ śaśi pada rahitāḥ vāra nāḍī vihīnāḥ prajñā upāya prabhede dina niśi samayaiḥ bhakṣate tān ca mṛtyuḥ

original: evaṃ vargān samātrān svaragaṇasahitān vyañjanānyeva vārān hīne vā madhyameṣṭa śaśiravimaraṇe vyañjane cādhidaive || 105 ||

original: paṭale ] kṣaṇalakṣaṇa-kālacakraniyamamahoddeśaḥ evaṃ sārddhā vai cakranāḍīḥ sārddhacakramaṣṭādaśarāśi saṃkhyāṃ pañcaviṃśadadhikaśataguṇitā ghaṭikā triṃśadadhikacaturviṃśatiśatasaṃkhyā iti; śaśipadāni kramo'krama' bhedena bhūtābhūteṣu vedādīni śatasaṃkhyāni, tai rahitāḥ śaśipadarahitā vāranāḍī sapta, tehīṃnāḥ samastāstrayo- viṃśatyadhikatrayoviṃśatiśatasaṃkhyāḥ, prajñopāyaprabhedaiḥ saṃhārasṛṣṭibherdedana niśisamayaikṣate tā~śca mṛtyuḥ
analyzed: paṭale kṣaṇa lakṣaṇa kālacakra niyama mahoddeśaḥ evam sārddhāḥ vai cakranāḍīḥ sārddha cakram aṣṭādaśa rāśi saṃkhyām pañcaviṃśat adhika śata guṇitā ghaṭikā triṃśat adhika

original: evaṃ vargān samātrān svaragaṇasahitān vyañjanānyeva vārān, hone vā madhyameṣṭe śaśiravimaraṇe vyañjane cādhidaive iti hīne candrāriṣṭamaraṇe, madhyame sūryāriṣṭa- maraṇe, vyañjane cādhidaiva iti madhyameṣṭamaraṇe pūrvoktaniyamaḥ
analyzed: evam vargān samātrān svara gaṇa sahitān vyañjanāni eva vārān hone vā madhyama iṣṭe śaśiravimaraṇe vyañjane ca adhidaive iti hīne candra ariṣṭa maraṇe madhyame sūrya ariṣṭa maraṇe

original: dvātriṃśaccaraktaṃ saśaśiravigatau nāḍikāccheda eṣaḥ bhūyastraśattrirātraistyajati sakuliśān skandhadhātvindriyādīn
analyzed: dvātriṃśat ca raktam sa śaśiḥ avigatau nāḍikā chedaḥ eṣaḥ skandha dhātu indriya ādīn

original: tyaktvā candrārkaṃnāḍīṃ praviśati śi (śaṃ) khinīṃ prāṇavāyurdinaikaṃ vicchedaṃ yāvadeva kṣitijalahutabhug (ṅa) mārutākāśadhātoḥ || 106 ||
