original: asau'gnirjagrī (yakṛt ) plīhā (rśa) rogānapi jalodarādīni māsayogācca hanti; ūrdhva- śvāsaṃ ca kāśaṃ (saṃ) ca trividhamapi viṣaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ kṛtrimañca netrarogādikaṃ śiraḥśūlaṃ hantīti jaṭhararogopaśamaniyamaḥ
analyzed: asau gniḥ jagrī yakṛt plīhā rogān api jalodara ādīni māsa yogāt ca hanti śvāsam ca kāśam ca trividham api viṣam sthāvaram jaṅgamam kṛtrimam ca netra roga ādikam śiraḥ śūlam hanti iti

original: kakṣāt savyāvasavyāt stanamapi balavat pīḍitaṃ prāṇarodhāt savyād vāmā na nāḍī pravahati sahasā vāmakakṣā ca savyā
analyzed: kakṣāt savyau asavyāt stanam api balavat pīḍitam prāṇa rodhāt savyāt vāmā na nāḍī pravahati sahasā vāma kakṣā ca savyā

original: māsārddhenāpyariṣṭaṃ harati maraṇadaṃ yogayuktaśca yogī pādau vajrāsanasthau dhṛtakarakamalau pṛṣṭhaśūlasya nāśam ||
analyzed: māsa arddhena api ariṣṭam harati maraṇa dam yoga yuktaḥ ca yogī pādau vajrāsana sthau dhṛta kara kamalau pṛṣṭhaśūlasya nāśam

original: idānīmariṣṭavañcanāya nāḍībandhakaraṇamucyate kakṣādityādinā - iha yadā yogī madhyamāyāmahorātraṃ prāṇaṃ praveṣṇaṃ (ṭuṃ na śaknoti, tadā vāmāriṣṭe dakṣiṇe sañcāraṃ prāṇasya karoti, dakṣiṇāriṣṭe ca vāme sañcāraṃ karoti, māsārddhaṃ māsamekaṃ yāvaditi
analyzed: idānīm ariṣṭa vañcanāya nāḍībandha karaṇam ucyate kakṣāt ityādinā iha yadā yogī madhyamāyām ahorātram prāṇam praveṣṇam na śaknoti tadā vāma ariṣṭe dakṣiṇe sañcāram prāṇasya karoti

original: anenoktena kāraṇena kakṣāt savyāvasavyāt stanamapi balavat pīḍitaṃ prāṇarodhāt
analyzed: anena uktena kāraṇena kakṣāt savya avasavyāt stanam api balavat pīḍitam prāṇa rodhāt

original: savye stane pīḍite na vāmanāḍī vahati, vāmakakṣāt pīḍite na savyā nāḍī vahati; evaṃ māsārddhenāpyariṣṭaṃ harati maraṇadaṃ yogayuktaśca yogīti, yogaḥ pūrakarecakayorekatā kumbhaka iti, tena yukto yogayukta iti; haratītyapanayatītyakāla- maraṇavañcanāniyamaḥ
analyzed: savye stane pīḍite na vāma nāḍī vahati vāma kakṣāt pīḍite na savyā nāḍī vahati evam māsa arddhena api ariṣṭam harati maraṇa dam yoga yuktaḥ ca yogī iti yogaḥ pūraka recakayoḥ

original: nātyūrdhvaṃ ; ga
analyzed: na ati ūrdhvam ga

original: nāstyūrdhvaṃ ; bho
analyzed: na asti ūrdhvam bho

original: lTe Bahi sTen Du ( nābhyūrdhva )
prāṇamevoddhataṃ cākuñcanīyaṃ
analyzed: prāṇam eva uddhatam ca ākuñcanīyam

original: paṭale ] rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ idānī pṛṣṭhaśūlanāśakaraṇamucyate- pādau vajrāsanastha (sthau ) iti vajrāsanaṃ savyorumūrdhni vāmapādaṃ vāmorumūrdhni dakṣiṇapādama, to pādau pṛṣṭhasthabāhuvajrabandhena vāmakareṇa dakṣiṇapādo dhṛto dakṣiṇena vāmapādaḥ, tau pādau dhṛtakarakamalau pṛṣṭhaśūlasya nāśaṃ kuruta iti
analyzed: paṭale rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm pṛṣṭhaśūla nāśa karaṇam ucyate pādau sthau iti vajrāsanam savya ūru mūrdhni vāma pādam vāma ūru mūrdhni dakṣiṇa pādam pādau

original: uddhava pādau śiro'dho vyapaharati tanau śleṣmarogaṃ samastaṃ prasrāvaḥ prāṇarodhāt katipayadivasairmūtrakṛcchraṃ nihanti
analyzed: pādau śiraḥ vyapaharati tanau śleṣma rogam samastam prasrāvaḥ prāṇa rodhāt katipaya divasaiḥ mūtrakṛcchram nihanti

original: pratyūṣe'nāmikābhyāṃ jalavigatamukhe dantapaṃkti praghṛṣya netrāṇāmañjanaṃ syānnayanarujaharaṃ tāḍanaṃ vā jalena ||
analyzed: pratyūṣe nāmikābhyām jala vigata mukhe dantapaṃkti praghṛṣya netrāṇām añjanam syāt nayana ruja haram tāḍanam vā jalena

original: [ ūdhava pādau śiro'dho vyapaharati tanau śleṣmarogaṃ samastamiti
analyzed: pādau śiraḥ vyapaharati tanau śleṣma rogam samastam iti

original: prasrāvaḥ • prāṇarodhāt katipayadivasaimaṃtrakṛtsnaṃ (kṛcchraṃ) nihanti
analyzed: prasrāvaḥ prāṇa rodhāt katipaya divasaiḥ maṃtra kṛtsnam kṛcchram nihanti

original: pratyūṣe anāmikābhyāṃ jalavigata- mukhe'prakṣālite dantapaṃkti pragharṣaṇa (praghṛṣya ) ghṛṣṭvā netrāṇāmañjanaṃ syānnayana rujahara bhavati
analyzed: pratyūṣe anāmikābhyām jala vigata mukhe prakṣālite danta paṃkti pragharṣaṇa praghṛṣya ghṛṣṭvā netrāṇām añjanam syāt nayana bhavati

original: pratyūṣe tāḍanaṃ vā jalena netrayo rujaharaṃ bhavatīti
analyzed: pratyūṣe tāḍanam vā jalena netrayoḥ ruja haram bhavati iti

original: supto (te) nottāra (na) nābhid dhṛ (bhidhū) takarakamalā'jīrṇaśūlaṃ nihanti gaṇḍānāmudbhave vai saha ghṛtalavaṇaiḥ svedanaṃ vṛddhināśaḥ
analyzed: te jīrṇa śūlam nihanti gaṇḍānām udbhave vai saha ghṛta lavaṇaiḥ svedanam vṛddhi nāśaḥ

original: arkakṣīrapralepastvatha bhavati kadācid dantakīṭaḥ saśūlo vyāghrībījasya dhūmo dhṛtamiha nalikādyaiśca kīṭādināśaḥ ||
analyzed: arka kṣīra pralepaḥ tu atha bhavati kadācid dantakīṭaḥ sa śūlaḥ vyāghrī bījasya dhūmaḥ dhṛtam iha nalikā ādyaiḥ ca kīṭa ādi nāśaḥ

original: supto (te)nottāra (na) nābhirvāmakaraṇe dhṛtā yā sā dhṛtaka rakamalā'jīrṇaśūlaṃ nihanti prāṇāyāmasahiteti
analyzed: na nābhiḥ vāmakaraṇe dhṛtā yā sā jīrṇa śūlam nihanti prāṇāyāma sahitā iti

original: gaṇḍānāmudbhava iti gaṇḍapiṭakādīnāmudbhavakāle saha ghṛtalavaṇai- vastrabaddhaḥ svedanaṃ vṛddhināśa eva
analyzed: gaṇḍānām udbhave iti gaṇḍa piṭaka ādīnām udbhava kāle saha ghṛta lavaṇaiḥ vastra baddhaḥ svedanam vṛddhi nāśe eva

original: akaṃkṣīrapralepastvatha gaṇḍādīnāmudbhava iti niyamaḥ;
analyzed: akaṃkṣīra pralepaḥ tu atha gaṇḍa ādīnām udbhave iti niyamaḥ

original: kadācid dantakoṭaḥ saśulo bhavati, tadā vyāghrībījadhūmo dhṛto nalikādyaiḥ koṭāvināśa eva
analyzed: kadācid dantakoṭaḥ sa śulaḥ bhavati tadā vyāghrī bīja dhūmaḥ dhṛtaḥ nalikā ādyaiḥ koṭā vināśe eva

original: vyāghrīti kaṇṭha (ṭa) kārīti sāmānya rogopaśamananiyamaḥ
analyzed: vyāghrī iti sāmānya roga upaśamana niyamaḥ

original: harati idānīṃ kuṣṭharogopaśamanāya pratividhānamucyate varṣetyādinā - varṣārddha śvetakuṣṭhaṃ harati varatanau mantriṇāṃ kiṃ tadanyat prajñāsa su (sva) cittaṃ suli ( skhali) tamapi sadā prāṇavāyonirodhāt
analyzed: harati idānīm kuṣṭha roga upaśamanāya pratividhānam ucyate varṣa ityādinā śveta kuṣṭham harati vara tanau mantriṇām kim tad anyat cittam tamapi prāṇa vāyu nirodhāt

original: saptatyabdāṃ jarāṃ vai sapalitāṃ ca dvivarṣaprapūrṇe mudrāsiddhi ( sa ) tadūrdhvaṃ bhavati katidinairmāgacittaprasaṅgāt
analyzed: saptati abdām jarām vai sa palitām ca dvi varṣa prapūrṇe sa tad ūrdhvam bhavati kati dinaiḥ māga citta prasaṅgāt

original: aso mahāyogaḥ pūrvadhūmādinimittena prāṇāyātmana ( yāmena ) sādhito'kṣarasukhakṣaṇaḥ, bodhicittaṃ mudrāsaṅgena skhalu (la) yitvā tadeva bodhicittaṃ mudrāyogena skhalitaṃ samu (su)khaṃ prāṇāpānayonirodhāt varṣārddha śvetakuṣṭhaṃ harati varatanau mantriṇāṃ ki tadanyat
analyzed: mahā yogaḥ pūrva dhūma ādi nimittena yāmena sādhitaḥ kṣara sukha kṣaṇaḥ bodhi cittam mudrā saṅgena skhalu yitvā tat eva bodhi cittam mudrā yogena skhalitam su kham prāṇa apāna yoni rodhāt

original: yadi kuṣṭhaṃ na harati tadā ṣoḍaśābdikāṃ mudrāṃ sevayati yogī [ vimalaprabhāyāṃ [adhyātma- tasya ṣaḍamāsābhyantareṇa yonimanthāne bodhicittaṃ skhalitaṃ vidhṛtaṃ sat kuṣṭharogaṃ harati, kumbhakayogena, atra nāsti sandehastathāgatavacane
analyzed: yadi kuṣṭham na harati tadā ṣoḍaśa ābdikām mudrām sevayati yogī vimalaprabhāyām adhyātma tasya ṣaṣ a māsa abhyantareṇa yoni manthāne bodhi cittam skhalitam vidhṛtam sat kuṣṭha rogam

original: na kevalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ harati, api tu saptatyabdāṃ jarāṃ vai sapalitāṃ dvivarṣaprapūrṇe mudrāsaṅge bodhicittaṃ skhalitamiti
analyzed: na kevalam kuṣṭham harati api tu saptati abdām jarām vai sa palitām dvi varṣa prapūrṇe mudrāsaṅge bodhi cittam skhalitam iti

original: anenaiva yogena yoginaḥ katipayadivasaiḥ kālacakratrivarṣatripakṣa dinaistadūrdhvamiti jarāvināśordhvaṃ mudrāsiddhirbhavati mārgacittaprasaṅgāditi kuṣṭhopaśamananiyamaḥ
analyzed: anena eva yogena yoginaḥ katipaya divasaiḥ kālacakra tri varṣa tri pakṣa dinaiḥ tad ūrdhvam iti jarā vināśa ūrdhvam mudrā siddhiḥ bhavati mārga citta prasaṅgāt iti kuṣṭha upaśamana niyamaḥ

original: yacchando hṛtpradeśe bhavati varanṛṇāṃ śrūyate śrotrarandha- stasmādūrdhvaṃ hi muṣṭī ( mūccha ) vraṃ (vra ) jati samarasaṃ tyājitaṃ caikabhūtam
analyzed: yat chandaḥ hṛd pradeśe bhavati vara nṛṇām śrūyate śrotra randhaḥ tasmāt ūrdhvam hi muṣṭī jati samarasam tyājitam ca eka bhūtam

original: yacchabdaṃ jīvaloke bhavati ca balajaṃ tattu deva śṛṇoti vijñānaṃ caiva dūrā śravaṇamapi vibho yoginā bhāvanīyam
analyzed: yat śabdam jīva loke bhavati ca bala jam tat tu deva śṛṇoti vijñānam ca eva dūrā śravaṇam api vibho yoginā bhāvanīyam

original: kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano'nyo'nyadantaṃ spṛśenna ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātastvamṛtarasasamo nābhicakre praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā paryaṅka bandham vikasita vadanaḥ nyaḥ nyat antam spṛśet naḥ ākṛṣṭaḥ bāhyavātaḥ tu amṛta rasa samaḥ nābhi cakre praviṣṭaḥ

original: santāpaṃ kṣutpipāsāṃ harati varatanau sanniruddho viṣaṃ ca śveto bindurlalāṭe su raparikarito muñcamāno'mṛtaṃ vā
analyzed: santāpam kṣudh pipāsām harati vara tanau san niruddhaḥ viṣam ca śvetaḥ binduḥ lalāṭe muñcamānaḥ mṛtam vā

original: ghrāṇe randhradvayena tvapi pitamukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇenākṛṣya vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito'pānavāyuḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇe randhra dvayena tu api bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇena ākṛṣya vegāt taḍit anala nibhaḥ pāna vāyuḥ

original: kāle nābhyāṃ sa yogād vrajati samarasaṃ candrasūryāgnimadhye annādyāṃ kṣutpipāsāṃ harati varatanau cāmaratvaṃ dadāti
analyzed: kāle nābhyām sa yogāt vrajati sama rasam candra sūrya agni madhye annādyām kṣudh pipāsām harati vara tanau ca amara tvam dadāti

original: rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ svacchāyāmātapasthāmaparamukharaveḥ stabdhadṛṣṭyāvalokya paścād vyomābhivīkṣye t samarasapuruṣo dṛśyate dhūmravarṇaḥ
analyzed: rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ svacchāyām ātapa sthām apara mukha raveḥ stabdha dṛṣṭyā avalokya paścāt samarasa puruṣaḥ dṛśyate dhūmra varṇaḥ

original: ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogādava nigatanidhi darśaye cchidrabhūmi vṛkṣacchāyāṃ praviśyattatha gaganatale bhāvitā bindumālā
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsa abhyāsa yogāt ava nigata nidhi darśaye vṛkṣa chāyām gagana tale bhāvitā bindumālā

original: yā śaktirnābhimadhyād vrajati pa rapadaṃ dvādaśāntaṃ kalāntaṃ sā nābhau sanniruddhā tadidananamitā daṇḍarūpotthitā vā
analyzed: yā śaktiḥ nābhi madhyāt vrajati dvādaśāntam kalā antam sā nābhau sat niruddhā daṇḍa rūpa utthitā vā

original: cakrāccakrāntaraṃ vai mṛdulalitagatindhāritā madhyanāḍyāṃ yāvaccoṣṇīṣarandhraṃ spṛśati haṭhatayā sūcibaddhā hyaca
analyzed: cakrāt cakra antaram vai mṛdu lalita gatin dhāritā madhyanāḍyām yāvat ca uṣṇīṣa randhram spṛśati haṭha tayā sūci baddhā

original: āpānaṃ tatra kāle paramahaṭhatayā prerayedūdūrdhvamārge uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā vrajati pa puraṃ vāyuyugme niruddhe
analyzed: āpānam tatra kāle parama haṭhatayā prerayet ūrdhva mārge uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā vrajati puram vāyu yugme niruddhe

original: evaṃ vajraprabodhāt satanu sa viṣayā khecaratvaṃ prayāti pañcābhijñāsvabhāvā bhavati punariyaṃ yogināṃ viśvamātā
analyzed: evam vajra prabodhāt sa tanu sa viṣayā khecara tvam prayāti pañca abhijñā svabhāvā bhavati punar iyam yoginām viśva mātā

original: idānīṃ prāṇāyāmaniyama ucyate- prāṇāyāmaṃ prakuryād hṛdi śirasi tathā yāvadagnirvyathā'bhūt tasmādūrdhvaṃ hi mūrcchā vrajati sukamale'yantrito vā balena
analyzed: idānīm prāṇāyāma niyamaḥ ucyate prāṇāyāmam prakuryāt hṛdi śirasi tathā yāvat agniḥ vyathā bhūt tasmāt ūrdhvam hi mūrcchā vrajati su kamale yantritaḥ vā balena

original: uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā vrajati parapuraṃ skandhadhātūn vihāya mudrāsaṅgapraṇaṣṭo na hi sukhaphalado janmanīhaiva puṃsām
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā vrajati para puram skandha dhātūn vihāya mudrā saṅga praṇaṣṭaḥ na hi sukha phala daḥ janmani iha eva puṃsām

original: iha śarīre prāṇāyāmaṃ kumbhakaṃ kuryāt mantrī hṛdi śirasi tathā yāvadagnirvyathā- bhūt tāvad hṛdayaṃ dahyate, śirasi ca vyathā bhavati
analyzed: iha śarīre prāṇāyāmam kumbhakam kuryāt mantrī hṛdi śirasi tathā yāvat agniḥ vyathā bhūt tāvat hṛdayam dahyate śirasi ca vyathā bhavati

original: tata ūrdhvaṃ na kuryāditi niyamaḥ, yadi karoti tasmādūrdhvaṃ hi mūccha vrajati sukamale, nābhikamale prāṇo mūrcchā vrajatīti
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam na kuryāt iti niyamaḥ yadi karoti tasmāt ūrdhvam hi vrajati su kamale nābhi kamale prāṇaḥ mūrcchā vrajati iti

original: ayantrito vā balenoṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā vrajati hi maraṇaṃ skandhadhātūn vihāya yataḥ, ato mudrāsaṅgapraṇaṣṭo na hi sukhaphaladaḥ prāṇāyāmo janmanīhaiva puṃsāmiti prāṇāyāma- niyamaḥ
analyzed: a yantritaḥ vā balena uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā vrajati hi maraṇam skandha dhātūn vihāya yatas atas mudrā saṅga praṇaṣṭaḥ na hi sukha phala daḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ janmani iha eva puṃsām iti prāṇāyāma

original: mudroktā bhāvānārthaṃ dinaniśisamaye neva rāgakṣayārthaṃ vāgvajraṃ tarpaṇārthaṃ na khalu madakaraṃ mantriṇāmuktamevam
analyzed: mudrā uktāḥ dina niśi samaye na iva rāga kṣaya artham vāgvajram tarpaṇa artham na khalu mada karam mantriṇām uktam evam

original: sarvāhāraḥ sukhārthaṃ pratidinasamaye'jīrṇahetorna coktaḥ śrīcaryāsiddhito maṇamapi cittau kīlanārthaṃ na rātrī
analyzed: sarva āhāraḥ sukha artham prati dina samaye jīrṇa hetoḥ na ca uktaḥ śrī caryā siddhitaḥ maṇam api cittau kīlana artham na rātrī

original: asya ślokasya vyākhyā saṃskṛtapratiṣu nopalabhyate, kintu bhoṭānuvāde sā labdhā, atra ko heturiti vivecayatā ācārya - khes ḍraba-je mahābhāgairuktaṃ yat vyākhyāyāḥ viśuddha- bhāratīya saṃskṛtapratiṣu 'idānīṃ yogināṃ mudrāsvādanāhāracāraniyama ucyate iti subodham' iti mātraṃ labhyate eva
analyzed: asya ślokasya vyākhyā saṃskṛta pratiṣu na upalabhyate kintu bhoṭa anuvāde sā labdhā atra kaḥ hetuḥ iti vivecayatā ācārya mahābhāgaiḥ uktam yat vyākhyāyāḥ viśuddha bhāratīya saṃskṛta

original: so'pyaṃśo mayā saṃskṛtapratiṣu na dṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi aṃśaḥ mayā saṃskṛta pratiṣu na dṛṣṭaḥ

original: atra khes-ḍraba-je-mahābhāgānāṃ svamatamullekhanīyamasti
analyzed: atra khes ḍraba je mahābhāgānām sva matam ullekhanīyam asti

original: tena uktaṃ yad anye'pi paṭale ] rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ idānīmavadhūtayogibhaiṣajyamucyate- akṣobhyaṃ kiñciduṣṇaṃ mukharujaśamanaṃ dantaśūlasya caiva pratyūṣe'kṣobhyanasyaṃ śirasi rujaharaṃ toyanasyaṃ tathaiva
analyzed: tena uktam yat paṭale rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm avadhūtayogibhaiṣajyam ucyate akṣobhyam kiñcid uṣṇam mukha ruja śamanam danta śūlasya ca eva pratyūṣe kṣobhyanasyam

original: karṇe netraṃ praviṣṭaṃ tva bhayarujaharaṃ mūtramuṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ bhūtārte'kṣobhyanasyaṃ trikaṭukasahitaṃ saukhyadaṃ cāpi daṣṭe
analyzed: karṇe netram praviṣṭam bhaya ruja haram mūtram uṣṇam ca śītam bhūta ārte kṣobhya nasyam trikaṭuka sahitam saukhya dam ca api daṣṭe

original: iha yadā yogino mukharogo bhavati, akṣobhyaṃ kiñciduṣṇaṃ kṛtvā mukhe dhṛtaṃ mukhara- ru jasa manaṃ bhavati
analyzed: iha yadā yoginaḥ mukha rogaḥ bhavati akṣobhyam kiñcid uṣṇam kṛtvā mukhe dhṛtam bhavati

original: dantaśūlasya caiveti cakārā d dantakīṭasya ca

analyzed: mūtram bāhye viṣṇu nṛpaḥ bhi ṅga rāja rasam adhyātmani mūtram eva

original: ātape bhūyo bhūyaḥ śoṣayitvā tataḥ pratyahaṃ karṣamātraṃ ghṛta-madhubhyāṃ bhakṣitaṃ ṣaṇmāsāvadherāyudaṃ bhavati, śākāmlatailalavaṇavarjanāditi pañcāmṛtaniyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ puṣpanasya ucyate sadhyānamityādinā- iha dhyānaṃ madhyamāyāṃ prāṇapraveśa:, tena dhyānena saha sadhyānamiti

original: puṣpaṃ strīrajaḥ, bāhye keśarājikā bhṛṅgarājaḥ, tasya rasaḥ strīpuṣpatu lyaṃ sadhyānaṃ puṣpanasyaṃ sadhyānānāṃ harati sapalitānaṅgajātān jarāṃśca ṣaṇmāsāvadheriti [ nasya ] ' niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ paśñcapradīpamucyate- gośvadantīhayanarāṇāṃ māṃsamakṣikācchadamiśraṃ madhunā miśraṃ bhuktaṃ pañcapradīpaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ bhavati; aparaṃ makṣikācchardimādhavī, tayā sārddhaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ bhavatīti niyamaḥ
analyzed: idānīm paśñca pradīpam ucyate go śva dantī haya narāṇām māṃsa makṣikā chada miśram madhunā miśram bhuktam pañca pradīpam sakala ruja haram bhavati aparam makṣikācchardimādhavī tayā

original: strīpuṣpaṃ śukramiśraṃ pūrvoktaṃ bāhyādhyātmikam apaharati jarāṃ bhakṣitaṃ ca varṣa- miti pūrvoktabhojananiyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ vātādyupasa ma ucyate- vātaghnaṃ kṣāramambu prabhavati madhuraṃ pittaśatruḥ kaṣāyaḥ śleṣmaghnaṃ sarvatiktaṃ kaṭukamapi tathā cauṣadhirvā raso vā

original: vātaghnaṃ kṣāramambu prabhavati madhuraṃ pittaśatruḥ kaṣāyadravyaṃ* śleṣmaghnaṃ sarvatiktaṃ trikaṭukasahitam, auṣadhirvā raso vā bhakṣitaṃ pītamiti

original: ājyaṃ kṣīrāhirakteḥ kvathitamapi sadā ghrāṇarogasya nāśaḥ karkoṭī lāṅgalandrī harati sahakharāṃ gaṇḍamālāṃ pralepāt // 127

original: iha sarvadravyāṣṭaguṇaṃ toyaṃ jātīpatrāṣṭaguṇaṃ toyaṃ pādāvaśeṣaṃ jātīkvāthāmbutoyaṃ kiñciduṣṇaṃ mukharujasa śa manaṃ bhavati

original: dantaśūlasya caivaṃ tailaṃ tilatailaṃ vastvambu chāga- mūtram, tena tulyaṃ pakvaṃ tailāvaśeṣaṃ trikaṭukalavaṇaiḥ sapādāṃśaiḥ pākāvaśā sā ne pradattaḥ, tatkarṇe praviṣṭaṃ karṇarogasya nāśa iti
analyzed: danta śūlasya ca evam tailam tila tailam vastu ambu chāga mūtram tena tulyam pakvam taila avaśeṣam trikaṭuka lavaṇaiḥ sa pāda aṃśaiḥ pāka avaśā sā ne pradattaḥ tat karṇe praviṣṭam

original: evamājyagoghṛtakṣīreṇāṣṭaguṇena kvāthā- vasāne ahirnāgakeśaraṃ raktaṃ kumaṃ taiḥ pādāṃśena dattairanena ghṛtena nasyaṃ ghrāṇarogasya nāśa eva

original: karkoṭī vandhyakarkoṭī lāṅgalī indrī indravāruṇī tiktā harati sahakharāṃ gardatāṃlataiḥ saha gaṇḍamālāṃ pralepāditi niyamaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ, vistareṇa vaidyaśāstre jñeya iti
analyzed: karkoṭī vandhyakarkoṭī lāṅgalī indrī indravāruṇī tiktā harati sahakharām saha gaṇḍamālām pralepāt iti niyamaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ vistareṇa vaidya śāstre jñeyaḥ iti

original: idānīṃ vajrakaṇṭhakopasa (śa) manamucyate kuryāddhastāvityādinā - kuryāddhasto pralambī samapadakamale prāṇavāyonirodhaṃ yāvad bhūmyāṃ prapāto na hi bhavati tanormuñcanaṃ ca jvarasya

original: bhūyo bhūyaḥ samādhau maraṇabhayakarān nāśayet kaṇṭakān vai hṛtpadma candramūrdhni tvamalaśaśinibhā bhāvitā viśvamātā // 128

original: iha yadā pāparogopadravo bhavati, tadā prathamaṃ jvaro bhavati, hastapādasandhiṣu vyathā bhavati, śiraśca vyathate

original: idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ jñātvā samādhimavalambayet
analyzed: idam lakṣaṇam jñātvā samādhim avalambayet

original: tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ - ni (nī ) randhre gṛhe praveśya jvaritaḥ kuryāddhastau dvau pralambo ūruparyantaṃ samapadakamale kuryāt, prāṇavāyo- nirodhaṃ kumbhakaṃ kuryāt, yāvat prayā (pā) to bhūmyāṃ na hi bhavati tanoḥ tāvajjvara rogeṇa bhūmyāṃ prapāto bhavati; athāprapāto yāvat punaḥ punaḥ prāṇāyāmaṃ kuryāditi niyamaḥ
analyzed: tatra ayam vidhiḥ randhre gṛhe praveśya jvaritaḥ kuryāt hastau dvau ūru paryantam sama pada kamale kuryāt prāṇavāyaḥ nirodham kumbhakam kuryāt yāvat bhūmyām na hi bhavati tanoḥ tāvat jvara rogeṇa

original: muñcanaṃ ca jvarasya yāvanna bhavati tāvat kāryam, jvare mukte sati na kuryāditi niyamaḥ
analyzed: muñcanam ca jvarasya yāvat na bhavati tāvat kāryam jvare mukte sati na kuryāt iti niyamaḥ

original: bhūyo bhūya. samādhau sthito maraṇabhayakarān nāśayet kaṇṭakān vai
analyzed: bhūyas samādhau sthitaḥ maraṇa bhaya karān nāśayet kaṇṭakān vai

original: hṛtpadme tvamala- śaśinibhā bhāvitā viśvamātā, prāṇāyāmena padmavaradahastā vajrapadmāsanasthā ra candra- maṇḍale dvibhujaikavaktreti niyamaḥ
analyzed: hṛd padme tu amala śaśi nibhā bhāvitā viśvamātā prāṇāyāmena padma vara da hastā vajra padma āsana sthā candra maṇḍale dvi bhujā eka vaktrā iti niyamaḥ

original: iti pāparogopasa (śa) maḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ idānīṃ pāparogopasa (śa) manārthaṃ bhaiṣajyamucyate- [adhyātma- piṣṭvā śītāmbusūryo jvaravihi (ha) tanṛṇāṃ kaṇṭakān nāśayanti ghṛṣṭaṃ tvakṣobhyamiśraṃ harati bhayakarān vā kapālaṃ jvarānte
analyzed: idānīm bhaiṣajyam ucyate adhyātma piṣṭvā śīta ambu sūryaḥ ha kaṇṭakān nāśayanti ghṛṣṭam tu akṣobhya miśram harati bhaya karān vā kapālam jvara ante

original: [141a] mantraścoṃ kārapūrvo jalaśikhimarutāṃ vajrapūrvaṃ ca nāma rakṣāṃ tenaiva kuryāt śirasi galahṛdornnābhiguhyādikeṣu // 129
analyzed: mantraḥ ca om kāra pūrvaḥ jala śikhi marutām vajra pūrvam ca nāma rakṣām tena eva kuryāt śirasi galahṛdoḥ nābhi guhya ādikeṣu

original: iha yadā pāparogacihnaṃ bhavati jvaritahastapādasandhiṣu vyathā tathā ( dā) piṣṭvā śītāmbunā masūryo jvaravihi (ha) ta' nṛṇāṃ dattāḥ kaṇṭakān nāśayanti; tathā jvarānte tṛtīya dine kaṇṭakotthānakāle pāparogeṇa mṛtasya kapālam alābhe yathālabdhaṃ pṛ (ghṛ ) ṣṭam akṣobhyamiśraṃ pītaṃ puruṣakapālaṃ puruṣeṇa, strīkapālaṃ striyā
analyzed: iha yadā pāpa roga cihnam bhavati jvarita hasta pāda sandhiṣu vyathā tathā piṣṭvā śīta ambunā nṛṇām dattāḥ kaṇṭakān nāśayanti tathā jvara ante tṛtīya dine kaṇṭaka utthāna kāle pāpa

original: alābhe yathālabdhaṃ pītaṃ harati bhayakarān kaṇṭakān dhā (vā) iti yathālabdhaṃ kapālaṃ jvarānte iti niyamaḥ
analyzed: alābhe yathālabdham pītam harati bhaya karān kaṇṭakān vā iti yathālabdham kapālam jvara ante iti niyamaḥ

original: atra masūryādīnāmabhimantraṇāya mantro bhavati

analyzed: sa ca oṃkāra pūrvaḥ iti mantraḥ ca om kāra pūrvaḥ

original: jala śikhimarutāṃ pūrvam oṃkāraḥ, jalamiti pavargasya dvitīyākṣaraṃ toyadhātuḥ pha iti, śikhītyadho ra iti, ūrdhve ekāraḥ, eṣāṃ jalaśikhimarutām ekatvaṃ phreṃ, anusvāram ākāśaṃ sarvavyāpitvāditi
analyzed: jala śikhi marutām pūrvam oṃkāraḥ jalam iti pavargasya dvitīya akṣaram toya dhātuḥ phaḥ iti śikhī iti adhas raḥ iti ūrdhve ekāraḥ eṣām jala śikhi marutām eka tvam phreṃ anusvāram ākāśam

original: tatra putrakeśaṃ jātīphalaṃ karpūraṃ nābhiḥ, aparaṃ kakṣapuṭoktamuttamaṃ dalaṃ dattvā, malayaṃ candanam, laghumityagurum, calamiti sihnakam, candramiti karpūram tena yuktaṃ

original: si(śi)khambu chāgamūtraṃ kusumarasasamaṃ kvāthayet puṣpajāntaṃ māsaikaṃ dhānyapakvaṃ bhavati mṛgasamamāsavaṃ nābhividdham || 141 ||

original: etat pakaṃ gandhaṃ supuṣpaiḥ campakādyaiḥ sugandhaiḥ katipayadivasaṃ pakṣāddhaṃ pakṣamekaṃ vā yāvad dhūpadoṣaṃ tyajati tata iṣṭaṃ bhavati|

analyzed: paṭale rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ miti jātīphalam kakkolam atha vā elā kakkola sthāne latā kastūrikā śaśī iti karpūram madam iti kastūrī eṣām sama bhāgam kṛtvā śata aṃśena

original: mṛgasamam āsavaṃ nābhividdhamiti agnipākāvasāne nābhiriti kastūrī, anuktamapi karpūram, triphalam tena sa (śa) tāṃśaṃ vedhaṃ datvā tato dhānye sthāpayet; tatastena gandhasya vedhaṃ pūrvoktaṃ kārayediti niyamaḥ|
analyzed: mṛga samam āsavam na abhividdham iti agni pāka avasāne nābhiḥ iti kastūrī anuktam api karpūram triphalam tena vedham da tvā tatas dhānye sthāpayet tatas tena gandhasya vedham pūrva uktam kārayet

original: sarvasmin gandhaśāstre dhūpapākāya trividhaṃ dhūpayantram - samam, ḍamarukākāram, mūti sarāvākṛtiḥ, madhye'ṅguladvayaṃ chidraṃ ṣaḍaṅgulamadhamaṃ re kaṣā- yogradhūpārtham ; madhyamamaṣṭāṅgulocchritam, nakhaguḍapiṇḍadhūpārtham uttamaṃ daśāṅgulaṃ śītadhūpārtham, asya yantrasya tale vālukā sahitaṃ kharparaṃ cūllikā mūrdhni datvā da (ta) pta vāli (lu) kāyāṃ dhūpagrāsaṃ datvā tadupari yantram, yantropari gandhakalkapralipta- maṅgulyarddhamucchritaṃ mṛtkapālaṃ svalpakalke nārikelaṃ datvā dhūpaṃ nirdahet daṇḍekaṃ daṇḍārddha dhūpapramāṇaṃ jñātvā|

original: tata uddhṛtya kapālaṃ phalakopari vastraṃ datvā'dhomukhaṃ sthāpayet|

original: atha kharapākena gandhe dagdhe sati niśāyāṃ śaśāṅkakiraṇaiḥ spṛśed gandham; tadabhāve jalatīre sthāpayed yāvad dagdhadoṣopasa (śa) mo bhavati|

original: gandhānāṃ vināśe kāraṇamucyate- iha śuddhāśuddhadravyāṇāmekatvaṃ vināśe kāraṇam, tathā tailaṃ śā (sā) rdrasthānam, palālam, kṣāradravyam, viṇmūtram, mūṣakasaṃsparśaḥ, vātam, atyuṣṇa sthānamiti|
analyzed: gandhānām vināśe kāraṇam ucyate iha śuddha aśuddha dravyāṇām ekatvam vināśe kāraṇam tathā tailam ārdra sthānam palālam kṣāra dravyam viṣ mūtram mūṣaka saṃsparśaḥ vātam ati uṣṇa

original: paṭale ] rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ tadvacchītamiti candanam, turuṣkam, guruśaśinam, guhyam, putrakeśāvasāne śītādidhūpo deyamiti pākānte niyamaḥ|
analyzed: paṭale rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ tadvat śītam iti candanam turuṣkam guruśaśinam guhyam putra keśa avasāne śīta ādi dhūpaḥ deyam iti pāka ante niyamaḥ

analyzed: vedhaḥ iti vedha viṣaye karpūram kastūrikā triphalam madasurā iti kastūrikā āsavaḥ guhyam yāvat bhavati iti gandha yoge niyamaḥ

original: snānayoge ca samyagiti snānaviṣaye'- vaśyaṃ guhyamiti deyaṃ snānadravyagaṇa ' madhye tvaggranthiparṇam|
analyzed: snāna yoge ca samyak iti snāna viṣaye vaśyam guhyam iti deyam snāna dravya gaṇa madhye tvac granthi parṇam

original: vanacarasahitamiti putrakeśa - sahitam, bhāgatrayaṃ pañcadaśabhāgamadhye dātavyamiti niyamaḥ|

analyzed: udvartana yoge granthiparṇam deyam snāne yathāvibhāgam iti gandhakakṣa puṭa vidhiḥ uktaḥ

original: idānīṃ nābhirbhartā' gandha ucyate śuddhābja [mi]tyādinā - śuddhābjaṃ dravyahīnaṃ madhukavirahitaṃ gandhatoyena piṣṭaṃ pakvaṃ dhūpaiḥ kaṣāyograsamadhukarajairgrāsavṛddhayā krameṇa|

original: dvau grāsau khaṇḍamiśrī malayacapalayorlohakarpūrayośca grāsasyādyāvasāne madhukamapi sitāṃ nirdahedādidhūpāt || 143 ||

original: iha yadā ekadravyeṇa gandharājaṃ kartumicchati, tadā śuddhābjamiti nakham, tadeva sāmānyena caturvidham — gajakarṇam, aśvakhuram, utpalapatram, varadara (badara ) patraṃ ceti|

original: idānīṃ garbhākhyābhiḥ pīḍitānāṃ gurviṇonāṃ bhaiṣajyamucyate kuṣṭhetyādi- kuṣṭhośīra kaseru tagarakuvalayaṃ keśaraṃ paṅkajasya piṣṭvā śītāmbunā mantritamapi kuliśairgarbhaśleṣu deyam
analyzed: idānīm garbha ākhyābhiḥ pīḍitānām gurviṇonām bhaiṣajyam ucyate kuṣṭha ityādi tagara kuvalayam kesaram paṅkajasya piṣṭvā śīta ambunā mantritam api deyam

original: garbhastambhe'ṣṭalomāni la (na) kulaśikhinaḥ pīṣayitvā pradeyaṃ dugdhājyaṃ pāyasānnaṃ dadhiguḍasahitaṃ dīyate vāsarīṇām || 149 ||
analyzed: garbhastambhe na kulaśikhinaḥ pīṣayitvā pradeyam dugdha ājyam pāyasa annam dadhi guḍa sahitam dīyate vāsarīṇām

original: iha yadā gurviṇīnāṃ garbhaśūlaṃ bhavati, tadā bhaiṣajyam - kuṣṭham, uśīram, kaserum, tagaramūlam utpalakandam, padmakeśaram; etāni dravyāṇi śītāmbunā paryuṣitena piṣṭvā abhimantritamapi kuliśairiti 'oṃ āḥ hū~ amukāyā garbhaśūlaṃ hara hara svāhā' iti mantraḥ, anenābhimantrya garbhaśūleṣu deyamiti niyamaḥ
analyzed: iha yadā gurviṇīnām garbha śūlam bhavati tadā bhaiṣajyam kuṣṭham uśīram kaserum tagara mūlam utpala kandam padma kesaram etāni dravyāṇi śīta ambunā paryuṣitena piṣṭvā abhimantritam api

original: evaṃ garbhastambhe aṣṭaromāṇi nakulasya, śikhino mayūrasya picchaṃ gṛhītvā śītāmbunā piṣṭvā pūrvavaddeyānyabhimantrya
analyzed: evam garbha stambhe aṣṭa romāṇi nakulasya śikhinaḥ mayūrasya piccham gṛhītvā śīta ambunā piṣṭvā pūrvavat deyāni abhimantrya

original: kṣīrāpahāriṇyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣatale snāpayet
analyzed: kṣīra apahāriṇyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣa tale snāpayet

original: saptamalli kairgokṣīrapūrṇaiḥ kṣīrabhaktena bali dadyā- diti garbhākhyānāṃ niyamaḥ
analyzed: saptamalli kaiḥ go kṣīra pūrṇaiḥ kṣīra bhaktena bali dadyāt iti garbha ākhyānām niyamaḥ

original: paṭale ] rasāyanadibālatantramahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ vāsarīṇāṃ vidhirucyate dugdhetyādinā-
analyzed: paṭale rasāyana di bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm vāsarīṇām vidhiḥ ucyate dugdha ityādinā

original: iha daśadinābhyantare gṛhītasya bālakasya śāntyarthaṃ dugdham, ājyam, pāyasānnaṃ dadhiguḍasahitaṃ polikā' modakāṃśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ pradīpaṃ balau dīyate vāsarīṇām, snānaṃ dhūpaṃ vakṣyamāṇamiti vāsarīṇāṃ trirātrabaliniyamaḥ
analyzed: iha daśa dina abhyantare gṛhītasya bālakasya śānti artham dugdham ājyam pāyasa annam dadhi guḍa sahitam modakān ca gandham puṣpam pradīpam balau dīyate vāsarīṇām snānam dhūpam vakṣyamāṇam iti

original: [149b] idānīṃ māsākhyānāṃ vidhirucyate pakṣe ( pakve ) tyādinā - pakvānnaṃ pañcabhinnaṃ dadhiguḍasahitaṃ polikāmodakāṃśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ pradīpaṃ snapanamapi dalaiḥ pañcarātraṃ prakuryāt
analyzed: idānīm māsa ākhyānām vidhiḥ ucyate pakṣe pakve tyādinā pakva annam pañca bhinnam dadhi guḍa sahitam gandham puṣpam pradīpam snapanam api dalaiḥ pañca rātram prakuryāt

original: godantaṃ meṣaśṛṅgaṃ mṛganakhacikuraṃ sarpanirmokadhūpaṃ bālānāṃ māsajānāṃ kathitamapi bali puṣṭihetoḥ samastam || 150 ||
analyzed: godantam meṣaśṛṅgam mṛga nakha cikuram sarpa nirmoka dhūpam bālānām māsa jānām kathitam api bali puṣṭi hetoḥ samastam

original: iha daśadinādūrdhvaṃ māsaḥ, tata ekādaśamāsān yāvat māsajātakānāṃ śāntyarthaṃ bali mātṛṇāṃ dadyāt, pakvānnaṃ pañcabhitramiti ghṛtena paktraṃ pūrikā ghṛtapūram; saumālī sevālavaṭakāniti pañcabhinnam aparamodanaṃ dadhiguḍasahitaṃ polikāmodakāṃśca
analyzed: iha daśa dināt ūrdhvam māsaḥ tatas ekādaśa māsān yāvat māsa jātakānām śānti artham bali mātṛṇām dadyāt pakva annam pañca bhitram iti ghṛtena paktram pūrikā ghṛtapūram saumālī sevā

original: gandhamiti candanam, sugandhapuṣpaṃ tilatailena pradīpaṃ ghṛtena vā
analyzed: gandham iti candanam sugandha puṣpam tila tailena pradīpam ghṛtena vā

original: snapanamapi daleriti pañcakṣīravṛkṣāṇāmaśvatthādīnāṃ patraiḥ kiñcit kvathitodakena soṣṇena bāla snāpayet, pañcarātraṃ yāvat samastaṃ kuryāt
analyzed: snapanam api daleḥ iti pañca kṣīravṛkṣāṇām aśvattha ādīnām patraiḥ kiñcid kvathita udakena sa uṣṇena bāla snāpayet pañca rātram yāvat samastam kuryāt

original: snānāvasāne bālasya dhūpaṃ dadyāt, godantam, meṣa- śṛṅgam, mānuṣyanakham, mṛgaromam, cikuram, sarpanirmocam (cakam )
analyzed: snāna avasāne bālasya dhūpam dadyāt godantam meṣa śṛṅgam mānuṣya nakham mṛga romam cikuram sarpa nirmocam cakam

original: etadekīkṛtvā (tya) tīvrāṅgāreṇa dhūpam, devatābalau pūrvoktagandhadhūpādikaṃ deyaṃ caturdikṣu grāmamadhye ceti niyamo bālānāṃ māsajātānāṃ kathitamapi puṣṭihetoḥ samastam
analyzed: etat ekīkṛtvā tīvra aṅgāreṇa dhūpam devatā balau pūrva ukta gandha dhūpa ādikam deyam catur dikṣu grāma madhye ca iti niyamaḥ bālānām māsa jātānām kathitam api puṣṭi hetoḥ samastam

original: idānīṃ saṃvatsarīṇāṃ balirucyate pañcānnamityādinā - pañcānnaṃ pañcakhādyaṃ jalacarapiśitaṃ gandhapuṣpaṃ pradīpaṃ madyaṃ pūrvoktadhūpaṃ snapanamapi tathā digbala digvibhāge
analyzed: idānīm baliḥ ucyate pañcānnam ityādinā pañca annam pañcakhādyam jalacara piśitam gandha puṣpam pradīpam madyam pūrva ukta dhūpam snapanam api tathā digbala diś vibhāge

original: bālānāṃ varṣajānāṃ prakaṭitamavanau puṣṭihetornarendra garbhād varṣatripañca prabhavati niyataṃ yoginīnāṃ prapūjā || 151 ||
analyzed: bālānām varṣa jānām prakaṭitam avanau puṣṭi hetoḥ narendra garbhāt varṣa tri pañca prabhavati niyatam yoginīnām prapūjā

original: iha daśamāsādūrdhvaṃ māsadvayaṃ varṣamiha gṛhyate; tasmāt pañcadaśavarṣāṇi yāvat varṣajātakānāṃ mā [ 150a ] nṛpoḍitānāṃ śāntyarthaṃ saṃvatsarīṇāṃ baliṃ dadyāt
analyzed: iha daśa māsāt ūrdhvam māsa dvayam varṣam iha gṛhyate tasmāt pañcadaśa varṣāṇi yāvat varṣa jātakānām nṛpa voḍitānām śānti artham balim dadyāt

original: pañcānna- miti bhaktaṃ sitaṃ potaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ haritaṃ kṛtvā haridrādibhiḥ etat pañcānnam
analyzed: pañcānnam iti bhaktam sitam potam raktam kṛṣṇam haritam kṛtvā haridrā ādibhiḥ etat pañcānnam

original: pañcakhādyamiti pakvānnaṃ pūrvoktaṃ jalacaram, matsyam, māṃsam, piśitamiti, gandhādyaṃ pūrvoktam
analyzed: pañcakhādyam iti pakva annam pūrva uktam jalacaram matsyam māṃsam piśitam iti gandha ādyam pūrva uktam

original: madyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ dhūpādikam; sarvaṃ vaṃśacaṅgeḍikāyāṃ datvā trivārān nirmañca- (cha) yet sadīpabalinā
analyzed: madyam pūrva uktam dhūpa ādikam sarvam vaṃśa caṅgeḍikāyām tri vārān sa dīpa balinā

original: digiti daśadinam
analyzed: diś iti daśa dinam

original: daśadigvibhāge indrādi-īśānaparyantam adha ūrdhvaṃ baliḥ grāmamadhye catuḥpathe dātavyeti
analyzed: daśa diś vibhāge indra ādi īśāna paryantam adhas ūrdhvam baliḥ grāma madhye catuḥpathe dātavyā iti

original: bālānāṃ varṣajātānāṃ prakaṭitamavanau puṣṭihetoḥ, narendra ityāmantraṇam
analyzed: bālānām varṣa jātānām prakaṭitam avanau puṣṭi hetoḥ narendraḥ iti āmantraṇam

original: iti saṃvatsarīṇāṃ pūjāniyamaḥ
analyzed: iti saṃvatsarīṇām pūjā niyamaḥ

original: evaṃ garbhād varṣatripañceti pañcadaśavarṣaparyantaṃ trayaḥ (tri ) ṣaṣṭiyoginīnāṃ niyataṃ pūjā kartavyā, anyathā bālānāṃ śāntyādikaṃ na bhavatīti yoginīnāṃ pūjāniyamaḥ
analyzed: evam garbhāt varṣa tri pañca iti pañcadaśa varṣa paryantam trayaḥ tri ṣaṣṭi yoginīnām niyatam pūjā kartavyā anyathā bālānām śānti ādikam na bhavati iti yoginīnām pūjā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ mātṛgṛhītānāṃ doṣalakṣaṇamucyate aṅgetyādi- aṅgāt kṣayo'kṣiśūlaṃ mukhakaracaraṇaṃ pītatāṃ yāti samyak praśrā (srā ) vaḥ pītavarṇo jvara iti ca bhavecchardiśoṣaṃ ca mūrcchā
analyzed: idānīm mātṛ gṛhītānām doṣa lakṣaṇam ucyate aṅga ityādi aṅgāt kṣiśūlam mukha kara caraṇam pīta tām yāti samyak praśrā srā vaḥ pīta varṇaḥ jvaraḥ iti ca bhavet chardi śoṣam

original: jñātvā cihnāni teṣāmapi nṛpa karaṇaṃ maṇḍale homakāryaṃ no'datte muñcayanti prakṛtiguṇavaśānmātaro bhūtajāśca || 152||
analyzed: jñātvā cihnāni teṣām api nṛpa karaṇam maṇḍale homa kāryam naḥ datte muñcayanti prakṛti guṇa vaśāt mātaraḥ bhūta jāḥ ca

original: iha yadā mātṛbhirgṛhīto bālako bhavati, tadā tasyāṅgāt kṣayo bhavati, akṣiśūlaṃ bhavati, mukhakarau caraṇau ca mukhakaracaraṇaṃ potatāṃ yāti, samyak prathā (strā) vaḥ pītavarṇo bhavati, jvaro bhavati, chardirbhavatīti, śoṣaṃ ca mūrcchā bhavati etāni mātṛdoṣacihnāni jñātvā teṣāṃ bālakānām, apiśabdāt krūragrahagṛhītānāṃ maṇḍale homādikaṃ kāryam; anyathā no'datte balau muñcayanti prakṛtiguṇavaśāt bhūtajā mātaraḥ pūrvoktā iti cikitsālakṣaṇam
analyzed: iha yadā mātṛbhiḥ gṛhītaḥ bālakaḥ bhavati tadā tasya aṅgāt kṣayaḥ bhavati akṣiśūlam bhavati mukha karau caraṇau ca mukha kara caraṇam pota tām yāti samyak prathā strā vaḥ pīta

original: idānīṃ catuḥṣaṣṭimayā kulikayā gṛhītasya mṛtyulakṣaṇamucyate śvetetyādinā- śvetāṅgaṃ yasya sarvaṃ bhavati narapate sphoṭakāścātisūkṣmā vakragrīvā sagātrā sravati sarudhiraṃ vaktraguhye gude ca
analyzed: idānīm catuḥṣaṣṭimayā kulikayā gṛhītasya mṛtyu lakṣaṇam ucyate śveta ityādinā śveta aṅgam yasya sarvam bhavati narapate sphoṭakāḥ ca ati sūkṣmāḥ vakra grīvā sa gātrā sravati sa

original: tasmin pūjāṃ na kuryādbhavati hi laghutā mantriṇāṃ mohitānāṃ mṛtyustasyāsti nūnaṃ suranarabhujagai rakṣituṃ śakyate na || 153||
analyzed: tasmin pūjām na kuryāt bhavati hi laghu tā mantriṇām mohitānām mṛtyuḥ tasya asti nūnam sura nara bhujagaiḥ rakṣitum śakyate na

original: iha catuḥṣaṣṭimā kulikā sarvāsāṃ yoginīnāṃ pratyekasandhau vyāpakarūpeṇāsthitā garbhadinamāsavarṣāṇāṃ sandhau
analyzed: iha catuḥṣaṣṭimā kulikā sarvāsām yoginīnām pratyeka sandhau vyāpaka rūpeṇa āsthitā garbha dina māsa varṣāṇām sandhau

original: tayā gṛhītasya bālakasya śvetāṅgaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati; sphoṭa- kāścātisūkṣmāḥ sarṣaparājikāmātrā bhavanti; vakrā grīvā bhavati; sagātrā śra (stra) vati rudhiram
analyzed: tayā gṛhītasya bālakasya śveta aṅgam sarvam bhavati sphoṭa kāḥ ca ati sūkṣmāḥ sarṣapa rājikā mātrāḥ bhavanti vakrā grīvā bhavati sa gātrā rudhiram

original: vaktre vā, guhye vā, gude vā
analyzed: vaktre vā guhye vā gude vā

original: īdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasmin viṣaye pūjāṃ na kuryāt
analyzed: īdṛśam lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā tasmin viṣaye pūjām na kuryāt

original: yadi karoti tadā mohitānāṃ mantriṇāṃ lobhād laghutā bhavati
analyzed: yadi karoti tadā mohitānām mantriṇām lobhāt laghu tā bhavati

original: kutaḥ ? yato nūnaṃ tasyāsti mṛtyuḥ suranarabhujagai rakṣituṃ śakyate na iti mṛtyucihnaniyamaḥ
analyzed: kutas yatas nūnam tasya asti mṛtyuḥ sura nara bhujagaiḥ rakṣitum śakyate naḥ iti mṛtyu cihna niyamaḥ

original: paṭale rasāyanādibālatantramahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ maṇḍale pūjitāḥ sukhakarā ucyante nāgetyādi- nāgā yakṣā grahā yespi ca danukulajā rākṣasā vai piśācāḥ śākinyo duṣṭanāgā nararudhiraratā ḍākinīrūpikāśca
analyzed: paṭale rasāyana ādi bāla tantra mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm maṇḍale pūjitāḥ sukha karāḥ ucyante nāga ityādi nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ grahāḥ ye api ca danu kula jāḥ rākṣasāḥ vai piśācāḥ śākinyaḥ

original: kumbhā ( kūṣmā ) ṇḍā : kṣetrapālāstvapi gaṇapatayaḥ kṣetravetālasiddhāḥ sāpasmārāḥ khagendrāḥ paramasukhakarāḥ pūjitā maṇḍale syuḥ || 154 ||
analyzed: kumbhā kūṣmā ṇḍā kṣetrapālāḥ tu api gaṇapatayaḥ kṣetra vetāla siddhāḥ sa apasmārāḥ khaga indrāḥ parama sukha karāḥ pūjitāḥ maṇḍale syuḥ

original: iha nāgādibhiḥ pīḍitānāṃ nāgādayaḥ pūjitā vakṣyamāṇamaṇḍale sukhakarā bhavanti
analyzed: iha nāga ādibhiḥ pīḍitānām nāga ādayaḥ pūjitāḥ vakṣyamāṇa maṇḍale sukha karāḥ bhavanti

original: eṣāṃ lakṣaṇānyanekāni bhūtatantroktāni mudrābandhena jñātavyāni atraiva vakṣyamāṇe kiyantīti
analyzed: eṣām lakṣaṇāni anekāni bhūtatantra uktāni mudrābandhena jñātavyāni atra eva vakṣyamāṇe kiyanti iti

original: idānīṃ krūrapūjārthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍalasthānamucyate krūrāṇāmityādi - krūrāṇāṃ pūjanārthaṃ bhavati narapate maṇḍalaṃ grāmabāhye vṛkṣasthāne śmaśāne suravarabhuvane saṅgame vā nadīnām
analyzed: idānīm krūra pūjā artham maṇḍalam maṇḍala sthānam ucyate krūrāṇām ityādi krūrāṇām pūjana artham bhavati narapate maṇḍalam grāma bāhye vṛkṣa sthāne śmaśāne suravara bhuvane

original: hastaṃ vā dvau catuṣkaṃ tridaśanavanṛpairdevatānāṃ pramāṇe- madhye tvaṣṭāracakraṃ bhavati guṇavaśānmaṇḍalādarddhabhāgam || 155 ||
analyzed: hastam vā dvau catuṣkam tri daśa nava nṛpaiḥ devatānām pramāṇe madhye tu aṣṭa āra cakram bhavati guṇa vaśāt maṇḍalāt arddha bhāgam

original: iha krūrāṇāṃ pūjanārthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ grāmabāhye bhavati
analyzed: iha krūrāṇām pūjana artham maṇḍalam grāma bāhye bhavati

original: tatraivaikavṛkṣasthāne, śmaśāne, suravarabhuvana iti śūnyadevālaye, saṅgame vā nadīnām, hastaṃ vā dvau catuṣkamiti
analyzed: tatra eva eka vṛkṣa sthāne śmaśāne suravara bhuvane iti śūnya devālaye saṅgame vā nadīnām hastam vā dvau catuṣkam iti

original: iha vibhavānurūpata ekahastaṃ maṇḍalam, dvihastam, caturhastaṃ vetyārabhya yāvad hastasahasraṃ vā tāvad vartayedācāryaḥ
analyzed: iha vibhava anurūpataḥ eka hastam maṇḍalam dvi hastam catur hastam vā iti ārabhya yāvat hasta sahasram vā tāvat vartayet ācāryaḥ

original: tridaśanavanṛpairiti iha navadevatānāṃ pramāṇam ekahastaṃ maṇḍalam, trayodaśānāṃ dvihastam; nṛpa iti ṣoḍaśānāṃ caturhastam, ityārabhya yāvad viṃśatyadhika- ṣoḍaśaśatānāṃ hastasahasraparyantaṃ vartayeta vibhavataḥ
analyzed: tri daśa nava nṛpaiḥ iti iha nava devatānām pramāṇam eka hastam maṇḍalam trayodaśānām dvi hastam nṛpaḥ iti ṣoḍaśānām catur hastam iti ārabhya yāvat ṣoḍaśa śatānām hasta sahasra paryantam

original: iha sarvamaṇḍalānāṃ madhye aṣṭāraṃ cakra vā padmaṃ bhavati maṇḍalādarddhabhāgikam
analyzed: iha sarva maṇḍalānām madhye aṣṭa āram vā padmam bhavati maṇḍalāt arddha bhāgikam

original: dvāraṃ cakrāṣṭabhāgaṃ bhavati khalu tadarddhena vedī ca hārāḥ prākārā vedikārddhāstriguṇamapi bhavet toraṇaṃ dvāramānāt
analyzed: dvāram cakra aṣṭa bhāgam bhavati khalu tad arddhena vedī ca hārāḥ prākārāḥ vedikā arddhāḥ triguṇam api bhavet toraṇam dvāra mānāt

original: vṛttaṃ kuṇḍaṃ tribhāgaṃ sitakamalamayaṃ pūritaṃ śvetaraṅgaiḥ kuryāt śrīpañcaraṅgaiḥ svakuladiśi gataṃ devatānāṃ svacihnam ||156||
analyzed: vṛttam kuṇḍam tri bhāgam sita kamala mayam pūritam śveta raṅgaiḥ kuryāt śrī pañcaraṅgaiḥ sva kula diśi gatam devatānām sva cihnam

original: dvāraṃ maṇḍalacakrāṣṭabhāgam, dvārā vedikā hārabhūmiśca pañcaprākārarekhā vedikā rddhena ratnapaṭṭikāpi, dvāramānena niryūhaṃ pakṣakaṃ kapolaṃ ceti, toraṇaṃ triguṇaṃ dvārāt iti maṇḍalalakṣaṇaniyamaḥ
analyzed: dvāram maṇḍala cakra aṣṭa bhāgam dvārāḥ vedikā hārabhūmiḥ ca pañca prākāra rekhā vedikā rddhena ratna paṭṭikā api dvāra mānena niryūham pakṣakam kapolam ca iti toraṇam triguṇam

original: iha pūrvoktena viṣṇumatena sārddhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikaṃ kutaḥ ? 'ekamūtistrayo devā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ'
analyzed: iha pūrvoktena viṣṇumatena sārddham ṣaṣ mārga ādikam kutas eka mūtiḥ trayaḥ devāḥ brahma viṣṇu maheśvarāḥ

original: ga. 'śūnyatā naṣṭadharmatā' iti nāsti bho. Chos Nid De (śūnyatā samadharmatā'sti )
analyzed: śūnyatā naṣṭa dharmatā iti na asti bho choḥ de śūnyatā sama dharmatā sti

original: * mūle ṭīkāyāṃ ca 'śūnyatā naṣṭadharmā' atha vā 'śūnyatā naṣṭadharmatā asti' iti pāṭho eva ga. pustake 'śūnyatā naṣṭadharmatā astī 'ti sthāne 'nāsti' ityeva pāṭho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: mūle ṭīkāyām ca śūnyatā naṣṭa dharmā atha vā śūnyatā naṣṭa dharma tā asti iti pāṭhaḥ eva ga pustake śūnyatā naṣṭa dharma tā asti iti sthāne na asti iti eva pāṭhaḥ ṅgīkṛtaḥ

original: ṭīkāyā bhoṭānuvāde tu 'naṣṭadharmatā' iti 'samadharmatā' ityanuvādo vihitaḥ
analyzed: ṭīkāyāḥ bhoṭa anuvāde tu naṣṭa dharmatā iti sama dharmatā iti anuvādaḥ vihitaḥ

original: kintu mūlaṃ ṭīkāṃ cādhṛtya svābhiprāyamāviṣkurvatā khes - ḍūba - je - mahābhāgena yathāsthitaṃ naṣṭadharmatā - pāṭhamaṅgīkṛtyāpi kathaṃ vaiśeṣikapakṣe 'śūnyatā naṣṭadharmatā' ityeva vākyaṃ samañjasamiti pratipāditam
analyzed: kintu mūlam ṭīkām ca ādhṛtya sva abhiprāyam āviṣkurvatā khes ḍūba je mahābhāgena yathāsthitam naṣṭa dharmatā pāṭham aṅgīkṛtya api katham vaiśeṣika pakṣe śūnyatā naṣṭa dharmatā iti

original: nityaparamāṇu saṃyogaiḥ sṛṣṭimadhigacchatā'pi tadupādānakaṃ bhautikaṃ jagad anitya- tvād vinaśyatyevāta etasya sṛṣṭijātasya naṣṭadharmatātvena śūnyatā samadhigatā bhavatyeveti khes ḍūba je mahābhāgānāṃ matasāṃrāṃśaḥ
analyzed: nitya paramāṇu saṃyogaiḥ sṛṣṭim adhigacchatā tad upādānakam bhautikam jagat anitya tvāt vinaśyati eva atas etasya sṛṣṭi jātasya naṣṭa dharmatā tvena śūnyatā samadhigatā bhavati eva iti

original: bhoṭabhāṣayā cāyamitthaṃ vivṛto bhavati -
analyzed: bhoṭa bhāṣayā ca ayam ittham vivṛtaḥ bhavati

original: sTon Pa Nid Ni dNos Po Ran Grub Dus Las Yun Rin Du gNas Pa Yan Ñams Paḥam Sig Pahi Chos Kyi Chod Pa Nid yod De.

mThar Sig sTe Mi mThon Baḥi Phyir Ro (hGrel Chen Dri Med Hod Kyi ḥGrel bŚad-'Ga', page 161A).

uparilikhitabhoṭāṃśasya saṃskṛtānuvādaḥ - svotpattitaḥ dorghakālaṃ yāvat sthitānāṃ vastūnāṃ vināśabhaṅgadharmocchedyatvarūpā vā śūnyatā'styeva yato hi svopādāne vilonobhūtāni ekīkaraṇādibhiḥ vastūni vinaśyanti, adṛśyatāṃ ca gacchanti |
analyzed: upari likhita bhoṭa aṃśasya saṃskṛta anuvādaḥ sva utpattitaḥ dorgha kālam yāvat sthitānām vastūnām vināśa bhaṅga dharma ucchedya tva rūpā vā śūnyatā sti eva yatas hi sva upādāne ekīkaraṇa

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ adhyātma- iti vacanāt kartā ātmā karma kāla: prakṛtiguṇāḥ śūnyatā naṣṭadharmā nirvāṇaṃ kāṣṭhā- vasthātaḥ' |
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām adhyātmaḥ iti vacanāt kartā ātmā karma kāla prakṛti guṇāḥ śūnyatā naṣṭa dharmā nirvāṇam kāṣṭhā vasthātaḥ

original: ebhiḥ sārddhaṃ ṣaṇmārgādikaṃ veditavyamiti niyamaḥ * |
analyzed: ebhiḥ sārddham ṣaṣ mārga ādikam veditavyam iti niyamaḥ

original: iha śarīre ṣaṇmārgāḥ ṣaḍviṣayeṣu pravartakā iti |
analyzed: iha śarīre ṣaṣ mārgāḥ ṣaṣ viṣayeṣu pravartakāḥ iti

original: pañcatattvamiti ākāśādidhātusamūham; parapadamiti ṣaṣṭho jñānadhātuḥ; akhilamiti sarvadhātve kalolībhūtam; cakārādaparaṃ mantradehamityālikālyā- tmakaṃ mantratattvamiti |
analyzed: pañcatattvam iti ākāśa ādi dhātu samūham para padam iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ jñānadhātuḥ akhilam iti sarva dhātve kalolībhūtam cakārāt aparam mantra deham iti āli kālyā tmakam mantra tattvam iti

original: vidyeti ānandādikāmatattvam; ātmeti ātmatattvaṃ nityam; sacchivatvamiti śivatattvaṃ sarvavyāpi |

original: tasya rūpaparivarjitasya trividhā [153b] pada- gatiḥ - piṇḍasthā, padasthā, rūpasthā kāyavākcittavikalpadharmiṇo tasyāstrividhapada- gateryojanamiti |
analyzed: tasya rūpa parivarjitasya trividhā gatiḥ piṇḍa sthā pada sthā rūpa sthā tasyāḥ trividha pada gateḥ yojanam iti

original: eṣāṃ ṣaṇmārgādīnāmutpādakāle yojanaṃ melāpaka (nam ) iti, mṛtyukāle tyāgabhāvaḥ teṣāṃ vighaṭanamityarthaḥ |
analyzed: eṣām ṣaṣ mārga ādīnām utpāda kāle yojanam iti mṛtyu kāle tyāga bhāvaḥ teṣām vighaṭanam iti arthaḥ

original: bindorbhedaṃ śivatvamiti iha śukrabindorbheda cyavanasukhāvasthālakṣaṇam, tadeva śivatvam; sakalatanugatamiti carācaravyāpi |
analyzed: bindoḥ bhedam śiva tvam iti iha cyavana sukha avasthā lakṣaṇam tat eva śiva tvam sakala tanu gatam iti carācara vyāpi

original: dvādaśa- grantha (nthi) bhedā iti iha prāṇināṃ tanugatā dvādaśarāśayo granthiśabdenocyante teṣāṃ dvādaśarāśīnāṃ bhedā varṣāyana' kālayugaṛtumāsapakṣadinaghaṭikāpāṇīpalaśvāsā iti |
analyzed: dvādaśa bhedāḥ iti iha prāṇinām tanu gatāḥ dvādaśa rāśayaḥ granthi śabdena ucyante teṣām dvādaśa rāśīnām bhedāḥ varṣa ayana kāla yuga ṛtu māsa pakṣa dina ghaṭikā pāṇī pala

original: etat sarvaṃ hi yatra siddhānte prabhavati niyatā deśanā sā śivasya |
analyzed: etat sarvam hi yatra siddhānte prabhavati niyatā deśanā sā śivasya

original: [iti] śivamata- niyamaḥ |
analyzed: iti śivamata niyamaḥ

ka. kha. śivatvaṃ; bho. Si Bahi De Nid ( śivatattvaṃ) |

original: kha. varṣāpana |
analyzed: kha varṣāpana

original: taṃ sphuṭīkurvatā khes - ḍraba- je- mahābhāgenoktaṃ yat gītāvaiṣṇavamate kartā'stītyanena paramāṇukartṛvādaḥ phaladāyakatvena ceśvarakartṛvādo'ṅgī- kṛtaḥ, tadanurodhena śaivamatasya samutthānaṃ prasaṅgasaṅgatameveti |
analyzed: tam sphuṭīkurvatā khes ḍraba je mahābhāgena uktam yat gītāvaiṣṇava mate kartā sti iti anena paramāṇu kartṛ vādaḥ phala dāyaka tvena ca īśvara kartṛ vādaḥ ṅgī kṛtaḥ tad

original: svaparadarśananyāyavicāramahoddeśaḥ nāstīśa: karmapāko'pi ca guṇaviṣayān bhūtavṛndaṃ hi bhuṅkte tasyābhāve phalaṃ na sphuṭamamaragurordeśanā veditavyā |
analyzed: sva para darśana nyāya vicāra mahā uddeśaḥ ca guṇa viṣayān bhūta vṛndam hi bhuṅkte tasya abhāve phalam na sphuṭam amara guroḥ deśanā veditavyā

original: kartā () sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaramacarajaṃ tāyi (ji) nāṃ bhuktiheto: svargastasya pratoṣād bhavati khalu nṛṇāṃ deśanā rahmaṇaḥ sā || 164 ||
analyzed: kartā sṛṣṭam samastam sa carama cara jam nām bhukti heto svargaḥ tasya pratoṣāt bhavati khalu nṛṇām deśanā rahmaṇaḥ sā

original: idānīṃ lokāyatamatamucyate nāstītyādi- iha dehināṃ nāstīśaḥ, kartā nāstīti karmapāko'pi ca nāsti |
analyzed: idānīm lokāyata matam ucyate na asti ityādi iha dehinām na asti īśaḥ kartā na asti iti ca na asti

original: guṇaviṣayāniti guṇāḥ sattvādayaḥ, viṣayā gandhādayaḥ; bhūtavṛndamiti pṛthivyādikam tān bhuṅkte; tasya bhūtavṛndasyābhāve maraṇānte karmaphale (phalaṃ) na |

original: harītakīguḍādisaṃyogānmadirāśaktivat bhūtānāṃ saṃyogaśaktiḥ, tasyābhāve na kaścit paralokaṃ kāyo'stīti sphuṭamamaragurobṛṃha- spaterdeśanā veditavyeti lokāyatamataniyamaḥ |
analyzed: harītakī guḍa ādi saṃyogāt madirā śakti vat bhūtānām saṃyoga śaktiḥ tasya abhāve na kaścid para lokam iti sphuṭam amara guroḥ deśanā veditavyā iti lokāyata mata niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ mlecchatāyi (ji) nāṃ' matamucyate karte ( ) tyādi - iha kartā ( ) rahmaṇā (rahamānena ) sṛṣṭaṃ samastaṃ sacaraṃ jaṅgamam, acaraṃ sthāvaraṃ vastu |
analyzed: idānīm mleccha tāyi nām matam ucyate kartā tyādi iha kartā rahmaṇā sṛṣṭam samastam sa caram jaṅgamam acaram sthāvaram vastu

original: tāyi (ji) nāmiti mlecchānāṃ śvetavāsināṃ bhuktihetoḥ |
analyzed: mlecchānām śveta vāsinām bhukti hetoḥ

original: svargastasya rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣāt, apratoṣānnarako bhavati khalu nṛṇāṃ rahmaṇaḥ |
analyzed: svargaḥ tasya rahmaṇaḥ pratoṣāt a pratoṣāt narakaḥ bhavati khalu nṛṇām rahmaṇaḥ

original: sā pūrvoktakriyeti tāyi (ji) - mataniyamaḥ |
analyzed: sā pūrva ukta kriyā iti mata niyamaḥ

original: [ 154a ] idānīṃ kṣapaṇakamatamucyate traikālyamityādinā - traikālyaṃ dravyaṣaṭkaṃ navapadavihitaṃ jīvaṣaṭkāyaleśāḥ pañcānye santi kāyā vratasamitigatirjñānacāritrabhedāḥ |
analyzed: idānīm kṣapaṇaka matam ucyate traikālyam ityādinā traikālyam dravya ṣaṭkam nava pada vihitam jīva ṣaṣ kāya leśāḥ pañca anye santi kāyāḥ vrata samiti gatiḥ jñāna cāritra bhedāḥ

original: jīvaḥ kāyapramāṇo hyaparimitabhaverbrahmacaryeṇa mokṣo yasmin mokṣapramāṇaṃ hyupari nigaditaṃ deśanā sā jinānām || 165 ||

original: iha kṣapaṇaka siddhānte syādvāde dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ nityānityavyavahāraḥ |
analyzed: iha kṣapaṇaka siddhānte syādvāde dravya paryāyābhyām nitya anitya vyavahāraḥ

analyzed: tatra traikālyam iti atītam anāgatam vartamānam ca iti dravya ṣaṭkam iti jīvaḥ pudgalaḥ kālaḥ ākāśam puṇyam dharmaḥ pāpam adharmaḥ ca iti

original: eṣāṃ madhye jīvaḥ kāla navapadavihitamiti jīvājīvāśra (sra) va saṃvaravarjanam, ākāśavat ( ākāśaṃ) ® nityam ; (nirjara) bandhamokṣagatyā gatiśceti; jovaṣaṭkāyaleśā iti pṛthvī kāyaleśāḥ (śyā), apkāyaleśāḥ (śyā), tejakāyaleśā (śyā), vāyukāyaleśāḥ (śyā), vanaspatikāyaleśāḥ (śyā), ṛśa (sa) kāyaleśāḥ (śyā) iti ||
analyzed: eṣām madhye jīvaḥ kāla nava pada vihitam iti saṃvara varjanam ākāśa vat ākāśam nityam nirjara bandha mokṣa gatyā gatiḥ ca iti jova ṣaṣ kāya leśāḥ iti pṛthvī kāya leśāḥ ap kāya

original: jīvānāṃ ṣaṭkāyaleśāḥ (śyā) |
analyzed: jīvānām ṣaṣ kāya leśāḥ śyā

original: pañcānye santi kāyā iti āhārikaḥ kāyaḥ, jyotiḥ- kāyaḥ, ne (nai) sargikakāyaḥ, upapādukakāyaḥ, caramakāyaśceti jīvānām |
analyzed: pañca anye santi kāyāḥ iti āhārikaḥ kāyaḥ jyotiḥ kāyaḥ upapāduka kāyaḥ carama kāyaḥ ca iti jīvānām

original: vratasamitigati- jñanicāritrabhedā iti kṣapaṇakānāṃ vratāni pañca - ahiṃsā prathamam, dvitoyaṃ satyam, tṛtīyaṃ dattādānam, caturthaṃ brahmacaryam, pañcamaṃ sarvaparigrahaparityāga iti; samitayaḥ pañca- īryāsamitiḥ, bhāṣāsamitiḥ paryeṣaṇāsamitiḥ, ādānanikṣepaṇasamitiḥ', nikaṭapratiṣṭhāpa- nāsamiti (utsarga samiti) riti; gatibhedāḥ pañca - naraka - tiryak - manuṣya-deva- mokṣagati- śceti; jñānabhedāḥ pañca - matiḥ, śrutiḥ (śrutaḥ) avadhiḥ, manaḥ paryeṣaṇam (paryāya: kaivalyajñānaṃ ceti |
analyzed: iti prathamam dvitoyam sarva iti

original: cāritrabhedāstrayodaśa - vratabhedāḥ pañca samitibhedāḥ pañca, kāyaguptiḥ, vāgguptiḥ cittaguptiśceti |

original: vedo'sau na svayambhūstribhuvananilaye vedaśabdo'rthavācī brahmā vaktraiścatubhiḥ prakaṭayati purā vedaśabdena cārtham |

original: āha - iha trailokyam aṇubhirjātam, nāṇubhirvinā, cakārānmokṣo'pi tat kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavati, yadanubho racitamapi śāśvatamapi nityaṃ sadā sarvakālaṃ na bhavati, saṃhāra- kālavaśāt kṣayaṃ yāsyatīti |
analyzed: āha iha trailokyam aṇubhiḥ jātam na aṇubhiḥ vinā tat katham nityam bhavati yat anubhoḥ racitam api śāśvatam api nityam sadā sarvakālam na bhavati saṃhāra kāla vaśāt kṣayam yāsyati iti

original: tatkṣayāt siddhāntānāmapi kṣa yo bhaviṣyatīti
analyzed: tad kṣayāt siddhāntānām api kṣa yaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: siddhamiti nyāyāt |
analyzed: siddham iti nyāyāt

original: kiñcānyat |
analyzed: kiñca anyat

original: iha pūrvoktānāṃ ṣaḍjīva kāya leśyānāṃ madhye vanaspatīnāṃ jīvaḥ ;
analyzed: iha pūrvoktānām ṣaḍjīva kāya leśyānām madhye vanaspatīnām jīvaḥ

original: sa ki pratyeka vanaspatikāya ekaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā karmavaśenānubhavati, athāneka ityāha- eko jīva ekaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhṇāti yasya prabhāvena vanaspatīnāṃ sa (śa) syādīnāṃ jīvitasaṃjñā |
analyzed: sa vanaspati kāyaḥ ekaḥ sukham duḥkham vā karma vaśena anubhavati atha anekaḥ iti āha ekaḥ jīvaḥ ekam pudgalam gṛhṇāti yasya prabhāvena vanaspatīnām jīvita saṃjñā

original: yadi jīvo nāsti, tadā pādapa iti kathaṃ siddham |
analyzed: yadi jīvaḥ na asti tadā pādapaḥ iti katham siddham

original: na cājīvāḥ kāṣṭhā udakaṃ pītvā puṣpādi ṛtu prakurvantīti siddham |
analyzed: na ca ājīvāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ udakam pītvā puṣpa ādi ṛtu prakurvanti iti siddham

original: āha-yadi iha pratyekapudgale pratyekam ekaiko jīvaḥ, tadā ikṣudaṇḍe khaṇḍe khaṇḍe kṛte'nekakhaṇḍāni bhavanti teṣāṃ madhye ekasmin khaṇḍe sa jīvo nityaḥ karmavaśāt saṅkucan praviṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: āha yadi iha pratyeka pudgale pratyekam ekaikaḥ jīvaḥ tadā ikṣu daṇḍe khaṇḍe khaṇḍe kṛte neka khaṇḍāni bhavanti teṣām madhye ekasmin khaṇḍe sa jīvaḥ nityaḥ karma vaśāt

original: kāni tena parityaktāni na caivaṃ yuktyā ghaṭate |
analyzed: kāni tena parityaktāni na ca evam yuktyā ghaṭate

original: vicāryamāṇaḥ kuto yatasteṣāṃ punarbhūmyāmāropitānāmaṅkurādikaṃ pratyekakhaṇḍe dṛśyate |
analyzed: vicāryamāṇaḥ kutas yatas teṣām punar bhūmyām āropitānām aṅkura ādikam pratyeka khaṇḍe dṛśyate

original: tasmād vastusvabhāvo vanaspatīnām' aṅkurādiśaktiriti siddham |
analyzed: tasmāt vastu svabhāvaḥ vanaspatīnām aṅkura ādi śaktiḥ iti siddham

original: iti kṣapaṇakamatadūṣaṇaniyamaḥ |
analyzed: iti kṣapaṇaka mata dūṣaṇa niyamaḥ

original: vistaro'neko'neka pramāṇaśāstreṇa madhyamakena nirākaraṇīyastīrthikānāṃ siddhāntaḥ |
analyzed: vistaraḥ nekaḥ pramāṇa śāstreṇa madhyamakena nirākaraṇīyaḥ tīrthikānām siddhāntaḥ

original: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vivṛtyā vā sambuddhavacanasamaḥ, sa na dūṣaṇīya iti kālacakra ādibuddhabhagavato niyamaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vivṛtyā vā sambuddha vacana samaḥ sa na dūṣaṇīyaḥ iti kālacakre ādibuddha bhagavataḥ niyamaḥ

original: tadyathā - ityādijñānahetoḥ prakaṭayati mahau deśanāṃ kālacakraḥ puṃsāṃ cittānusārāṃ mṛdukaṭhinaparāṃ vāsanāyā balena |
analyzed: tat yathā ityādi jñāna hetoḥ prakaṭayati mahau deśanām kālacakraḥ puṃsām citta anusārām mṛdu kaṭhina parām vāsanāyāḥ balena

original: cittaṃ vai bhāvarāgaiḥ sphaṭikavadupadhād rāgatāṃ yāti yasmāt tasmād dharmo na kaścit svaparakulagato yoginā dūṣaṇīyaḥ || 177||
analyzed: cittam vai bhāva rāgaiḥ sphaṭika vat upadhāt rāga tām yāti yasmāt tasmāt dharmaḥ na kaścid sva para kula gataḥ yoginā dūṣaṇīyaḥ

original: svaśaktiriti siddham |
analyzed: sva śaktiḥ iti siddham

original: kālacakratantrasya taṭṭīkāyā vimalaprabhāyāḥ kimabhiprāyakamidaṃ vacanadvayam, yathā 'yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vivṛtyā vā sambuddhavacanasamaḥ, sa na dūṣaṇīya iti kālacakra ādibuddha bhagavato niyamaḥ' iti |
analyzed: kālacakra tantrasya tat ṭīkāyāḥ vimalaprabhāyāḥ kimabhiprāyakam idam vacana dvayam yathā yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vivṛtyā vā sambuddha vacana samaḥ sa na dūṣaṇīyaḥ iti kālacakre ādibuddha bhagavataḥ

original: ' tasmād dharmo na kaścit svaparakulagato yoginā dūṣaṇīyaḥ' vacanābhyāmetābhyām āpātataḥ paramataṃ naiva kālacakriṇā dūṣaṇīyamityābhāti |
analyzed: tasmāt dharmaḥ na kaścid sva para kula gataḥ yoginā dūṣaṇīyaḥ vacanābhyām etābhyām āpātataḥ para matam na eva kālacakriṇā dūṣaṇīyam iti ābhāti

original: evaṃ sati prarvatamāne'smin svaparavicāranyāyamahoddeśe kathamiha paramatakhaṇḍanaṃ kṛtaṃ mūle ṭīkāyāṃ ca kathaṃ coktam etanmahoddeśāvasāne ṭīkāyām — 'madhyamakena nirākaraṇīyastīthikānāṃ siddhāntaḥ' iti |
analyzed: evam sati prarvatamāne smin sva para vicāra nyāya mahā uddeśe katham iha para mata khaṇḍanam kṛtam mūle ṭīkāyām ca katham ca uktam etad mahā uddeśa avasāne ṭīkāyām madhyamakena

original: āpātataḥ pratīyamānasyaitadvirodhasya nirākaraṇaṃ bhavati khes ḍraba je mahābhāgānāṃ svābhiprāyāviṣkaraṇena |
analyzed: āpātataḥ pratīyamānasya etat virodhasya nirākaraṇam bhavati khes ḍraba je mahābhāgānām sva abhiprāya āviṣkaraṇena

original: tairuktam- svapara darśananyāyavicāramahoddeśaḥ dharmaḥ sattvopakāro viṣayavirahitaścāpakā ro'pyadharmaḥ hiṃsā vedapramāṇā na hi sukhaphaladā duḥkhadā sarvakālam |
analyzed: taiḥ uktam sva para darśana nyāya vicāra mahā uddeśaḥ dharmaḥ sattva upakāraḥ viṣaya virahitaḥ ca apakāraḥ pi adharmaḥ hiṃsā veda pramāṇā na hi sukha phala dā duḥkha dā sarvakālam

original: sanmaitro mūrkhavākyāt paramasukhakarā sarvasattvānuraktā tasmāt sattvārthamekaṃ kuru nṛpa manasā bhāvanāṃ niḥsvabhāva (T) m ||178 ||
analyzed: sat maitraḥ mūrkha vākyāt parama sukha karā sarva sattva anuraktā tasmāt sattva artham ekam kuru nṛpa manasā bhāvanām

original: indro'haṃ svargaloke tridaśana ragururbhūtale cakravartī pā tāle nāgarājaḥ phaṇikulanamitaḥ sarvagaścottamo'ham |
analyzed: indraḥ ham svarga loke cakravartī tāle nāga rājaḥ phaṇi kula namitaḥ sarvagaḥ ca uttamaḥ ham

original: jñānaṃ buddho munīndro'kṣaraparamavibhuryogināṃ vajrayogo vedo'ṅkāraḥ pavitro vraja mama śaraṇaṃ sarvabhāvena rājan || 179 ||
analyzed: jñānam buddhaḥ muni indraḥ kṣara parama vibhuḥ yoginām vajra yogaḥ vedaḥ u ṅkāraḥ pavitraḥ vraja mama śaraṇam sarva bhāvena rājan

original: iti śaraṇaniyamaḥ |
analyzed: iti śaraṇa niyamaḥ

original: - idānīṃ* sūryarathasya namaskāraḥ- tvaṃ mātā tvaṃ pitā tvaṃ jagati gururapi tvaṃ ca bandhuḥ sumitraṃ tvaṃ nāthastvaṃ vidhātā hita ( hi tva ) maghaharaṇa tvaṃ padaṃ sampadāṃ ca |
analyzed: idānīm sūrya rathasya namaskāraḥ tvam mātā tvam pitā tvam jagati guruḥ api tvam ca bandhuḥ sumitram tvam nāthaḥ tvam vidhātā hita hi tvam magha haraṇa tvam padam sampadām ca

original: tvaṃ kaivalyaṃ padaṃ tvaṃ varaguṇanilayo dhvastadoṣastvameva tvaṃ donānātha cintāmaṇirapi śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ gato'haṃ jinendra * ||180||
analyzed: tvam kaivalyam padam tvam vara guṇa nilayaḥ dhvasta doṣaḥ tvam eva tvam dona anātha cintāmaṇiḥ api śaraṇam tvām gataḥ ham jinendra

original: iti śrīmadādibuddhoddhṛte śrīmahākālacakre' adhyātmanirṇayo dvitīyapaṭalaḥ ||2||
analyzed: iti śrīmat ādi buddha uddhṛte śrī mahākālacakre adhyātma nirṇayaḥ dvitīya paṭalaḥ

original: iti sūryaratho gurunamaskāreṇa mañjuśriyaṃ bhagavantaṃ stutvā pādadvayaṃ śirasi kṛtvā punaḥ svakīyāsane niṣannaḥ (ṇṇaḥ ) |
analyzed: iti sūryarathaḥ guru namaskāreṇa mañjuśriyam bhagavantam stutvā pāda dvayam śirasi kṛtvā punar svakīya āsane niṣannaḥ

original: iti śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ' laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ svaparadarśana nyāyavicāramahoddeśaḥ saptamaḥ ||7||
analyzed: iti śrī mūlatantra anusāriṇyām laghukālacakra tantrarāja ṭīkāyām dvādaśa sāhasrikāyām vimala prabhāyām sva para darśana nyāya vicāra mahoddeśaḥ saptamaḥ

original: samāpteyaṃ ṭokā adhyātmapaṭalasyeti ||2||
analyzed: samāptā iyam ṭokā adhyātma paṭalasya iti

original: pramāṇaśāstreṣu mādhyamikaśāstreṣu vā nirdiṣṭaivistṛtadūṣaṇaprakāraistairthikāḥ dūṣaṇīyāḥ |
analyzed: pramāṇa śāstreṣu mādhyamika śāstreṣu vā nirdiṣṭaiḥ aivistṛta dūṣaṇa prakāraiḥ tairthikāḥ dūṣaṇīyāḥ

original: taithiketare ye saṃvṛti vā paramārthaṃ vā aṅgīkṛtya buddhavacanānusāreṇaiva svapakṣaṃ sthāpayanti, te naiva dūṣaṇīyāḥ” |
analyzed: taithika itare ye saṃvṛti vā paramārtham vā aṅgīkṛtya buddha vacana anusāreṇa eva sva pakṣam sthāpayanti te na eva dūṣaṇīyāḥ

original: da hāda śrīmattantre prathamapaṭale bhājanībhūtalokaḥ spaṣṭoddiṣṭa [:] prabhavalayasaṃsthānamānādibhedāḥ (daḥ) |
analyzed: śrīmat tantre prathama paṭale bhājanībhūta lokaḥ prabhava laya saṃsthāna māna ādi bhedāḥ daḥ

original: taistaistulyā svatanuratulā spaṣṭadṛṣṭārthatattve- jñeyā kaiścid yadiha paṭale mudrayā mudriteva ||
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ tulyā sva tanuḥ atulā spaṣṭa dṛṣṭa artha tattve jñeyā kaiścid yat iha paṭale mudrayā mudritā iva

original: adhyātmanirṇayakaraṃ paṭalaṃ vile (li) khya śrīāna kuśalaṃ yadihāptamuccam |
analyzed: adhyātma nirṇaya karam paṭalam kuśalam yat iha āptam uccam

original: tenāstu sekasukhanirṇayakalpa rāja- bodhipratiṣṭhitamatiḥ sakalo'pi lokaḥ * ||
analyzed: tena astu seka sukha nirṇaya kalpa rāja bodhi pratiṣṭhita matiḥ sakalaḥ lokaḥ

original: śubham ||
analyzed: śubham

original: [adhyātma pravartamānaviṣayasandarbhād bahirgata iva pratīyate, athāpi dvitīyapaṭalasya antimaślokatvena bhoṭabhāṣayā; uktaṃ hi tai:- Pas”.
analyzed: adhyātma pravartamāna viṣaya sandarbhāt bahis gataḥ iva pratīyate atha api dvitīya paṭalasya antimaśloka tvena bhoṭa bhāṣayā uktam hi

original: uparilikhitabhoṭāṃśasya saṃskṛtānuvāda:- kārikāḥ, adhyātmapaṭalasya antimā kārikā ca, imā ekādaśakārikā yaśasaḥ sūryarathasya vā vacanāni santi, na tu tā mūlatantrād uddhṛtāḥ |
analyzed: upari likhita bhoṭa aṃśasya saṃskṛta anuvāda kārikāḥ adhyātma paṭalasya antimā kārikā ca imāḥ ekādaśa kārikāḥ yaśasaḥ sūryarathasya vā vacanāni santi na tu tāḥ mūla tantrāt uddhṛtāḥ

original: * dvitīyapaṭalasya puṣpikānantaraṃ 'śrīmattantre prathamapaṭale' ityārabhya 'bodhipratiṣṭhitamatiḥ pustake eva upalabhyate |
analyzed: dvitīya paṭalasya puṣpikā anantaram śrīmat tantre prathama paṭale iti ārabhya bodhi pratiṣṭhita matiḥ pustake eva upalabhyate

original: manye, lipikāreṇa svaracitaṃ śraddhayā'tra niveśitamiti |
analyzed: manye lipikāreṇa sva racitam śraddhayā niveśitam iti
